sapo_description: Henry sofre de uma rara modificação genética que o faz viajar pelo tempo involuntariamente. Numa das suas viagens ele conhece Clare e apaixonam-se. Mas será que este grande amor resiste às inconstantes e imprevisíveis viagens no tempo de Henry...

title: Saw IV
imdb_description: Directed by Darren Lynn Bousman.  With Tobin Bell, Scott Patterson, Louis Ferreira, Costas Mandylor. Despite Jigsaw's death, and in order to save the lives of two of his colleagues, Lieutenant Rigg is forced to take part in a new game, which promises to test him to the limit.
writer: Patrick Melton (screenplay), Marcus Dunstan (screenplay), Patrick Melton (story), Marcus Dunstan (story), Thomas Fenton (story)

actors: Tobin Bell, Costas Mandylor, Scott Patterson, Betsy Russell
sapo_description: Dois inspetores do FBI tentam compreender como é que o maquiavélico assassino Jigsaw, consegue continuar a matar mesmo depois da sua morte.

title: The Childhood of a Leader
imdb_description: Directed by Brady Corbet.  With Bérénice Bejo, Liam Cunningham, Stacy Martin, Robert Pattinson. A chronicle of the childhood of a post-World War I leader.
plot: A chronicle of the childhood of a post-World War I leader.
actors: Bérénice Bejo, Liam Cunningham, Stacy Martin, Robert Pattinson
sapo_description: Baseado no conto de Jean-Paul Sartre, esta é uma visão arrepiante sobre a ascensão do fascismo no séc. XX. Conta a história de um rapaz americano que vive em França em 1918 e cujo pai trabalha para o governo dos EUA. Um retrato da emergência do mal.

title: Hell or High Water
imdb_description: Directed by David Mackenzie.  With Chris Pine, Ben Foster, Jeff Bridges, Gil Birmingham. A divorced father and his ex-con older brother resort to a desperate scheme in order to save their family's ranch in West Texas.
awards: Nominated for 4 Oscars. Another 42 wins & 157 nominations.
plot: A divorced father and his ex-con older brother resort to a desperate scheme in order to save their family's ranch in West Texas.
sapo_title: Hell or High Water - Custe o Que Custar
actors: Dale Dickey, Ben Foster, Chris Pine, William Sterchi
sapo_description: Dois irmãos no Oeste americano, Toby e Tanner, planeiam um último roubo à sucursal do banco que está a penhorar a propriedade da família. Mas no seu caminho aparece um incansável Ranger texano, em busca de um último triunfo antes da reforma...

title: Until Death
imdb_description: Directed by Simon Fellows.  With Jean-Claude Van Damme, Stephen Rea, Selina Giles, Mark Dymond. Stowe is a dirty cop who is hooked on heroin, and everyone dislikes him. Because of an accident he is put into a coma, and comes out of it a better person. He wakes up wanting to put things right.
plot: Stowe is a dirty cop who is hooked on heroin, and everyone dislikes him. Because of an accident he is put into a coma, and comes out of it a better person. He wakes up wanting to put things right.
actors: Jean-Claude Van Damme, Selina Giles, Mark Dymond, William Ash
sapo_description: Jean-Claude Van Damme protagoniza, neste thriller cheio de ação que arrepia até aos ossos, o papel de Anthony Lowe, um detetive fracassado, viciado em heroína, cujos os dias parecem ir de mal a pior. Lowe está a acabar um negócio, onde dois agentes foram mortos, e o principal vilão, as drogas, o dinheiro e as cassetes de vigilância continuam sem paradeiro conhecido.

title: Pinocchio
imdb_description: Directed by Roberto Benigni.  With Roberto Benigni, Nicoletta Braschi, Carlo Giuffrè, Mino Bellei. Despite guidance from the Blue Fairy and the love of his father, a wooden puppet's curious spirit leads him into one wild adventure after another.

plot: Despite guidance from the Blue Fairy and the love of his father, a wooden puppet's curious spirit leads him into one wild adventure after another.
actors: Roberto Benigni, Nicoletta Braschi, Mino Bellei, Carlo Giuffrè
sapo_description: Roberto Benigni traz para o ecrã de forma mágica uma das histórias mais conhecidas do mundo e mais amadas. Este conto familiar começa quando um cepo de madeira cai de um carrinho e aterra à frente do carpinteiro Gepeto (Carlo Giuffrè), que acaba por esculpir para o filho um boneco a partir desse cepo.

title: Playing Mona Lisa
writer: Marni Freedman (play), Marni Freedman (screenplay), Carlos De Los Rios (screenplay)
plot: A young pianist is looking for love in all the wrong places once her fiancee drops her. Maybe her flame will be rekindled both for the piano and a new love?
actors: Alicia Witt, Harvey Fierstein, Brooke Langton, Johnny Galecki
sapo_description: Claire Goldstein (Alicia Witt) tem 23 anos e é estudante de piano clássico. Tudo indica que ela terá um futuro promissor, mas a sua vida dá uma volta quando, logo após o seu namorado lhe pedir em casamento, ele acaba o relacionamento sem nenhuma razão aparente. Ela tenta recuperar emocionalmente dos recentes imprevistos, mas as coisas continuam a não dar certo.

title: Meet Dave
imdb_description: Directed by Brian Robbins.  With Eddie Murphy, Elizabeth Banks, Gabrielle Union, Scott Caan. A crew of miniature aliens operate a spaceship that has a human form. While trying to save their planet, the aliens encounter a new problem, as their ship becomes smitten with an Earth woman.
plot: A crew of miniature aliens operate a spaceship that has a human form. While trying to save their planet, the aliens encounter a new problem, as their ship becomes smitten with an Earth woman.
actors: Eddie Murphy, Elizabeth Banks, Gabrielle Union, Scott Caan
sapo_description: Eddie Murphy tem o papel principal nesta comédia de ficção científica do realizador Brian Robbins. Os alienígenas vêm à Terra porque o seu planeta, Nil, está prestes a colapsar por falta de sal, sendo que estes esperam resolver esse problema com uma esfera do tamanho de uma bola de golfe que irá extrair todo o sal dos oceanos da Terra.

title: Partners in Action
imdb_description: Directed by Sidney J. Furie.  With Armand Assante, Douglas Smith, Larry Day, Mpho Koaho. Jack Cunningham is an ex-cop who attempts to uncover a drug ring involving some corrupt former co-workers. When Jack is framed for murder, a young teenager decides to help Jack prove his innocence. Now the two must run from the law and the dirty cops.
writer: Eddy Matalon (story), Timothy Prager (screenplay), Richard Rionda Del Castro (screenplay)
plot: Jack Cunningham is an ex-cop who attempts to uncover a drug ring involving some corrupt former co-workers. When Jack is framed for murder, a young teenager decides to help Jack prove his ...
actors: Armand Assante, Douglas Smith, Larry Day, Mpho Koaho
sapo_description: Armand Assante representa aqui o papel de um antigo polícia que se torna num combatente do crime sob disfarce neste intenso filme de ação e de alta velocidade do diretor Sidney J. Furie ('Superman IV: Em Busca da Paz').

title: The Fast and the Furious
imdb_description: Directed by Rob Cohen.  With Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Michelle Rodriguez, Jordana Brewster. Los Angeles police officer Brian O'Connor must decide where his loyalty really lies when he becomes enamored with the street racing world he has been sent undercover to destroy.

actors: Paul Walker, Vin Diesel, Michelle Rodriguez, Jordana Brewster
sapo_description: Ação a alta velocidade e corridas de carros eletrizantes preenchem esta viagem deslumbrante! O polícia novato Brian O'Conner (Paul Walker) recebe a ordem de se infiltrar numa equipa de criminosos destemidos que assaltam camiões de transporte de carros importados em plena autoestrada.

title: The Big Short
imdb_description: Directed by Adam McKay.  With Christian Bale, Steve Carell, Ryan Gosling, Brad Pitt. In 2006-7 a group of investors bet against the US mortgage market. In their research they discover how flawed and corrupt the market is.

sapo_description: Michael Burry é o dono de uma empresa de médio porte, que decide investir muito dinheiro do fundo que coordena ao apostar que o sistema imobiliário nos Estados Unidos irá quebrar em breve.

title: Invincible
imdb_description: Directed by Ericson Core.  With Mark Wahlberg, Greg Kinnear, Elizabeth Banks, Kevin Conway. Based on the story of Vince Papale, a 30-year-old bartender from South Philadelphia who overcame long odds to play for the NFL's Philadelphia Eagles in 1976.
plot: Based on the story of Vince Papale, a 30-year-old bartender from South Philadelphia who overcame long odds to play for the NFL's Philadelphia Eagles in 1976.
actors: Mark Wahlberg, Greg Kinnear, Elizabeth Banks, Kevin Conway
sapo_description: Tal como a cidade em que vive e também a sua equipa de futebol americano, o próprio Vince já teve dias mais felizes. Mas Dick Vermell (Greg Kinnear), o novo treinador dos Eagles de Filadélfia, organiza uma prova de seleção de novos talentos aberta a todos e é o barman de 30 anos, que nem sequer tinha jogado na faculdade, que brilha.

title: The Brothers Grimsby
imdb_description: Directed by Louis Leterrier.  With Sacha Baron Cohen, Mark Strong, Rebel Wilson, Freddie Crowder. A new assignment forces a top spy to team up with his football hooligan brother.
writer: Sacha Baron Cohen (story by), Phil Johnston (story by), Sacha Baron Cohen (screenplay by), Phil Johnston (screenplay by), Peter Baynham (screenplay by)
plot: A new assignment forces a top spy to team up with his football hooligan brother.
actors: Sacha Baron Cohen, Rebel Wilson, Freddie Crowder, Jon-Jon Lockwood
sapo_description: Quando um assassino do MI6 embarca numa missão perigosa que o reúne com o seu irmão feliz e tonto, os dois terão de unir forças para salvar o mundo.

title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
imdb_description: Directed by Steven Spielberg.  With Harrison Ford, Karen Allen, Paul Freeman, John Rhys-Davies. In 1936, archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before Adolf Hitler's Nazis can obtain its awesome powers.
writer: Lawrence Kasdan (screenplay by), George Lucas (story by), Philip Kaufman (story by)

actors: Harrison Ford, Karen Allen, Paul Freeman, Ronald Lacey
sapo_description: Em 1936, o arqueólogo Indiana Jones (Harrison Ford) é contratado para encontrar a Arca da Aliança, que segundo as escrituras bíblicas conteria 'Os Dez Mandamentos' que Deus revelou a Moisés no Monte Horeb. Mas como a lenda diz que o exército que a possuir será invencível, Indiana Jones terá um adversário de peso na busca pela arca perdida: o próprio Adolf Hitler.

title: The Ladykillers
imdb_description: Directed by Ethan Coen, Joel Coen.  With Tom Hanks, Marlon Wayans, Irma P. Hall, J.K. Simmons. An eccentric, if not charming Southern professor and his crew pose as a classical ensemble in order to rob a casino, all under the nose of his unsuspecting but sharp old landlady.
writer: Joel Coen (screenplay), Ethan Coen (screenplay), William Rose (movie "The Ladykillers")
plot: An eccentric, if not charming Southern professor and his crew pose as a classical ensemble in order to rob a casino, all under the nose of his unsuspecting but sharp old landlady.
actors: Tom Hanks, Irma P. Hall, Marlon Wayans, J.K. Simmons
sapo_description: Goldthwait Higginson é um professor charlatão que reúne um grupo de ladrões para o golpe das suas vidas: o assalto a um barco-casino. A sede de operações é um quarto alugado a uma velhinha, que os julga um quinteto musical.

title: Lions for Lambs
imdb_description: Directed by Robert Redford.  With Tom Cruise, Meryl Streep, Robert Redford, Michael Peña. Injuries sustained by two Army rangers behind enemy lines in Afghanistan set off a sequence of events involving a congressman, a journalist and a professor.
plot: Injuries sustained by two Army rangers behind enemy lines in Afghanistan set off a sequence of events involving a congressman, a journalist and a professor.
actors: Robert Redford, Meryl Streep, Tom Cruise, Michael Peña
sapo_description: O senador Jasper Irving pretende lançar sua nova 'estratégia completa' para a guerra dos Estados Unidos no Afeganistão e, para divulgá-la, precisa convencer a jornalista Janine Roth.

title: Fight Club
imdb_description: Directed by David Fincher.  With Brad Pitt, Edward Norton, Meat Loaf, Zach Grenier. An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.
awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 10 wins & 34 nominations.
plot: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.
actors: Edward Norton, Brad Pitt, Meat Loaf, Zach Grenier
sapo_description: Jack vive desesperado por escapar da sua vida monótona. Então conhece Tyler Durden, um carismático vendedor de sabões com uma estranha filosofia. Tyler acredita que a realização pessoal é para os fracos. Pouco depois, Jack e Tyler lutam no parque de estacionamento de um bar, um espetáculo de violência que lhes dá a sensação máxima.

title: The Assignment
imdb_description: Directed by Walter Hill.  With Michelle Rodriguez, Tony Shalhoub, Anthony LaPaglia, Caitlin Gerard. After waking up and discovering that he has undergone gender reassignment surgery, an assassin seeks to find the doctor responsible.
writer: Walter Hill (screenplay), Denis Hamill (screenplay), Denis Hamill (story), Walter Hill (story)
plot: After waking up and discovering that he has undergone gender reassignment surgery, an assassin seeks to find the doctor responsible.
actors: Michelle Rodriguez, Tony Shalhoub, Anthony LaPaglia, Caitlin Gerard
sapo_description: Um assassino é traído por gangsters e cai nas mãos de uma desonesta cirurgiã que o transforma em uma mulher. Em busca de vingança, o assassino, agora assassina, contará com a ajuda de Johnnie, uma enfermeira que também tem segredos obscuros.

title: Brubaker
imdb_description: Directed by Stuart Rosenberg.  With Robert Redford, Yaphet Kotto, Morgan Freeman, Jane Alexander. The new warden of a small prison farm in Arkansas tries to clean it up of corruption after initially posing as an inmate.
writer: W.D. Richter (screenplay), W.D. Richter (story), Arthur A. Ross (story), Thomas O. Murton (suggested by), Joe Hyams (suggested by)
plot: The new warden of a small prison farm in Arkansas tries to clean it up of corruption after initially posing as an inmate.
actors: Robert Redford, Yaphet Kotto, Jane Alexander, Murray Hamilton
sapo_description: A ação passa-se numa prisão de um dos Estados do sul. Robert Redford é um agente policial que se disfarça de preso para avaliar a corrupção no sistema prisional americano. O filme é uma crítica devastadora ao sistema penal nos Estados Unidos da América.

title: The Hot Chick
imdb_description: Directed by Tom Brady.  With Rob Schneider, Rachel McAdams, Anna Faris, Matthew Lawrence. An attractive and popular teenager who is mean-spirited toward others finds herself in the body of an older man, and must find a way to get back to her original body.
plot: An attractive and popular teenager who is mean-spirited toward others finds herself in the body of an older man, and must find a way to get back to her original body.
actors: Rob Schneider, Anna Faris, Matthew Lawrence, Eric Christian Olsen
sapo_description: Jessica Spencer é a rapariga mais popular do liceu. Quando ela acorda no corpo de um homem de trinta e poucos anos, descobre que não é fácil mudar de visual quando se é uma rapariga que precisa constantemente de uma depilação.

title: Igby Goes Down
imdb_description: Directed by Burr Steers.  With Kieran Culkin, Susan Sarandon, Jeff Goldblum, Claire Danes. A young man's peculiar upbringing renders him unable to competently cope with the struggle of growing up.
awards: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 7 wins & 15 nominations.
plot: A young man's peculiar upbringing renders him unable to competently cope with the struggle of growing up.
actors: Kieran Culkin, Claire Danes, Jeff Goldblum, Jared Harris
sapo_description: Igby Slocumb é um jovem de 17 anos que não suporta mais a vida que tem em sua casa.

title: Sister Act 2: Back in the Habit
imdb_description: Directed by Bill Duke.  With Whoopi Goldberg, Kathy Najimy, Maggie Smith, Barnard Hughes. Showgirl Deloris Van Cartier returns as Sister Mary Clarence to teach music to a group of Catholic students whose run-down school is slated for closure.
writer: Paul Rudnick (characters), James Orr, Jim Cruickshank, Judi Ann Mason
plot: Showgirl Deloris Van Cartier returns as Sister Mary Clarence to teach music to a group of Catholic students whose run-down school is slated for closure.

actors: Whoopi Goldberg, Kathy Najimy, Barnard Hughes, Mary Wickes
sapo_description: Irmã Mary Clarence para uma escola citadina problemática! Equipada com um plano musical, ela proporciona o dom do riso, o poder da música e um toque de inspiração divina à turma - antes dos espertos estudantes, descobrirem quem ela realmente é!

title: Youngblood
imdb_description: Directed by Peter Markle.  With Rob Lowe, Cynthia Gibb, Patrick Swayze, Ed Lauter. A skilled young hockey prospect hoping to attract the attention of professional scouts is pressured to show that he can fight if challenged during his stay in a Canadian minor hockey town. His on-ice activities are complicated by his relationship with the coach's daughter.
writer: Peter Markle (story), John Whitman (story), Peter Markle (screenplay)
plot: A skilled young hockey prospect hoping to attract the attention of professional scouts is pressured to show that he can fight if challenged during his stay in a Canadian minor hockey town. ...
actors: Rob Lowe, Cynthia Gibb, Patrick Swayze, Ed Lauter
sapo_description: Dean Youngblood é um jovem do interior e habilidoso jogador de hóquei que sai em busca de sucesso no desporto, no Canadá. Lá, ele consegue uma grande oportunidade e faz de tudo para tentar impressionar o técnico, que lhe mostra as violentas regras sob o gelo que podem levá-lo a ser um reconhecido jogador.

title: Snake Eyes
imdb_description: Directed by Brian De Palma.  With Nicolas Cage, Gary Sinise, John Heard, Carla Gugino. A shady police detective finds himself in the middle of a murder conspiracy at an important boxing match in an Atlantic City casino.
writer: Brian De Palma (story), David Koepp (story), David Koepp (screenplay)
plot: A shady police detective finds himself in the middle of a murder conspiracy at an important boxing match in an Atlantic City casino.
actors: Nicolas Cage, Gary Sinise, John Heard, Carla Gugino
sapo_description: Rick Santoro é um detetive de Atlantic City que tenta ajudar um velho amigo, Kevin Dunne, que agora trabalha no Ministério da Defesa. Juntos devem tentar evitar que matem o secretário da Defesa dos Estados Unidos no meio de um combate de boxe.

title: The Brothers Grimm
imdb_description: Directed by Terry Gilliam.  With Matt Damon, Heath Ledger, Monica Bellucci, Petr Ratimec. Will and Jake Grimm are traveling con-artists who encounter a genuine fairy-tale curse which requires true courage instead of their usual bogus exorcisms.
plot: Will and Jake Grimm are traveling con-artists who encounter a genuine fairy-tale curse which requires true courage instead of their usual bogus exorcisms.
actors: Petr Ratimec, Barbora Lukesová, Anna Rust, Jeremy Robson
sapo_description: Dois irmãos viajam pela Alemanha dominada pelas tropas napoleónicas, no início do século XIX, fingindo que livram os habitantes das povoações de monstros e demónios em troco de dinheiro fácil. Mas quando são chamados pelas autoridades francesas para desvendar o misterioso desaparecimento de umas jovens, os charlatões vêem-se forçados a enfrentar forças malignas reais...

title: While You Were Sleeping
imdb_description: Directed by Jon Turteltaub.  With Sandra Bullock, Bill Pullman, Peter Gallagher, Peter Boyle. A hopeless romantic Chicago Transit Authority token collector is mistaken for the fiancée of a coma patient.
awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 4 wins & 4 nominations.
plot: A hopeless romantic Chicago Transit Authority token collector is mistaken for the fiancée of a coma patient.
actors: Sandra Bullock, Bill Pullman, Peter Gallagher, Peter Boyle
sapo_description: Lucy é uma rapariga solitária e sem família que decide ficar a trabalhar no metropolitano durante o Natal em Chicago, porque não tem ninguém a quem fazer uma visita. Contudo, a sua vida mudará quando aparece no seu caminho Peter, um bonito rapaz que é assaltado e lançado para as vias do metro mesmo à frente do olhar de Lucy.

title: Hidalgo
imdb_description: Directed by Joe Johnston.  With Viggo Mortensen, Omar Sharif, Zuleikha Robinson, Louise Lombard. In 1890, a down-and-out cowboy and his horse travel to Arabia to compete in a deadly cross desert horse race.
plot: In 1890, a down-and-out cowboy and his horse travel to Arabia to compete in a deadly cross desert horse race.
actors: Viggo Mortensen, Zuleikha Robinson, Omar Sharif, Louise Lombard
sapo_description: No deserto arábico, participar na corrida do Oceano de Fogo - um desafio à sobrevivência ao longo de milhares de quilómetros - sempre foi uma honra reservada para os melhores cavalos árabes. Em 1980, no entanto, o americano Frank T. Hopkins é convidado a participar na corrida com o seu cavalo, Hidalgo. Para Frank, é uma questão de honra e orgulho, mas também a tentativa de atingir o impossível.

title: Bringing Down the House
imdb_description: Directed by Adam Shankman.  With Steve Martin, Queen Latifah, Eugene Levy, Joan Plowright. When a lonely guy meets a woman on the internet who happens to be in prison, she breaks out to get him to prove her innocence, and proceeds to wreak havoc on his middle-class life.
plot: When a lonely guy meets a woman on the internet who happens to be in prison, she breaks out to get him to prove her innocence, and proceeds to wreak havoc on his middle-class life.
actors: Steve Martin, Queen Latifah, Eugene Levy, Joan Plowright
sapo_description: Peter Sanderson (Steve Martin) é um advogado divorciado que ainda está apaixonado pela ex-mulher e não consegue perceber por que é que ela o deixou. Mas Peter está a tentar seguir em frente e aventura-se nos meandros da Internet, onde conhece uma mulher.

title: Unfaithful
imdb_description: Directed by Adrian Lyne.  With Richard Gere, Diane Lane, Olivier Martinez, Erik Per Sullivan. A New York suburban couple's marriage goes dangerously awry when the wife indulges in an adulterous fling.
writer: Claude Chabrol (film "La Femme infidèle"), Alvin Sargent (screenplay), William Broyles Jr. (screenplay)
awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 3 wins & 14 nominations.
plot: A New York suburban couple's marriage goes dangerously awry when the wife indulges in an adulterous fling.
actors: Diane Lane, Erik Per Sullivan, Richard Gere, Olivier Martinez
sapo_description: Edward e Connie Sumner são um casal feliz de meia-idade que vivem o sonho americano. Mas o casamento, já minado pela rotina da riqueza e opulência, sofre novo abalo quando a vida de Connie se cruza com a de um desconhecido, numa rua do bairro nova-iorquino de Soho. Ele vai arrastá-la para um mundo de charme, mistério e risco e torna-se a obsessão de Connie.

title: Turning Tide
imdb_description: Directed by Christophe Offenstein.  With François Cluzet, Samy Seghir, Virginie Efira, Guillaume Canet. It tells the story of Yann Kermadec whose dreams suddenly come true when he has to replace the DCNS star skipper at the last minute before the start of the Vendée Globe (a round-the-world non-stop single-handed yacht race). After several days of racing, Yann, who is in the lead, has to stop to repair a damaged rudder. This will disrupt his round-the-world journey...
writer: Jean Cottin (scenario), Christophe Offenstein (scenario), Frédéric Petitjean (from a scenario by), Pierre Marcel (from a scenario by), Marc Guilbert (from a scenario by), Frédéric Petitjean (original idea)

sapo_description: A história de Yann Kermadec que vê os seus sonhos tornarem-se realidade quando, de repente, tem de substituir o seu amigo Frank Drevil, no início da Vendée Globe, uma regata de veleiro em solitário à volta do mundo.

title: Admission
imdb_description: Directed by Paul Weitz.  With Tina Fey, Paul Rudd, Nat Wolff, Gloria Reuben. A Princeton admissions officer who is up for a major promotion takes a professional risk after she meets a college-bound alternative school kid who just might be the son she gave up years ago in a secret adoption.
writer: Karen Croner (screenplay by), Jean Hanff Korelitz (based on the novel by)
plot: A Princeton admissions officer who is up for a major promotion takes a professional risk after she meets a college-bound alternative school kid who just might be the son she gave up years ago in a secret adoption.
actors: Tina Fey, Ann Harada, Ben Levin, Dan Levy
sapo_description: Universidade de Princeton, EUA. Portia Nathan é uma das responsável pelas admissões dos alunos a bolsas universitárias, e o seu trabalho é avaliar, com o máximo rigor, milhares de candidaturas. Apesar da sua obsessão pela organização, a sua vida fica virada do avesso quando, numa visita a um liceu alternativo, ela reencontra Jonh Pressman, um antigo colega.

title: Growing Up and Other Lies
imdb_description: Directed by Darren Grodsky, Danny Jacobs.  With Adam Brody, Wyatt Cenac, Danny Jacobs, Josh Lawson. After struggling for years as an artist in New York City, Jake is calling it quits and returning home to Ohio. On his last day in the city, he persuades his three oldest friends to help him retrace their greatest adventure together: a walk down the entire length of Manhattan. But their attempt to reclaim the glory of their early 20s doesn't go quite as planned. Over the course of the day, buried ...
plot: After struggling for years as an artist in New York City, Jake is calling it quits and returning home to Ohio. On his last day in the city, he persuades his three oldest friends to help him...
actors: Adam Brody, Wyatt Cenac, Danny Jacobs, Josh Lawson
sapo_description: Depois de anos a tentar vingar como artista em Nova Iorque, Jake decide desistir do sonho e voltar para Ohio. No seu último dia na cidade, ele convence três amigos de longa data a andar por Manhattan e reviver as aventuras de quando tinham 20 anos.

title: Darling Companion
imdb_description: Directed by Lawrence Kasdan.  With Diane Keaton, Kevin Kline, Dianne Wiest, Richard Jenkins. The story of a woman who loves her dog more than her husband. And then her husband loses the dog.
plot: The story of a woman who loves her dog more than her husband. And then her husband loses the dog.
actors: Diane Keaton, Kevin Kline, Dianne Wiest, Richard Jenkins
sapo_description: Beth e sua filha Grace salvam um cão perdido no acostamento de uma estrada. Joseph, marido de Beth, odeia o animal, agora a principal companhia da esposa. Um casamento é realizado na casa de férias da família e Joseph acaba perdendo o cachorro.

title: The Way of the Gun
imdb_description: The Way of the Gun (2000) on IMDb: Movies, TV, Celebs, and more...
plot: Two criminal drifters without sympathy get more than they bargained for after kidnapping and holding for ransom the surrogate mother of a powerful and shady man.
actors: Ryan Phillippe, Benicio Del Toro, Juliette Lewis, Taye Diggs
sapo_description: Dois pequenos criminosos tentam dar um grande golpe mas veem a situação rapidamente a fugir-lhes do controlo quando raptam a mulher que serve de barriga de aluguer a um homem poderoso e muito perigoso.

title: Bad Country
imdb_description: Bad Country (2014) on IMDb: Movies, TV, Celebs, and more...
writer: Jonathan Hirschbein (screenplay), Tom Abernathy (story), Jonathan Hirschbein (story), Mike Barnett (story), Don 'Bud' Connor (story)
plot: In 1980s Louisiana a police detective (W.Dafoe) arrests a contract killer (M.Dillon). To be with his wife (Amy Smart) and newborn, he becomes an informant and assists in taking down the crime ring boss etc. FBI, blood and revenge follows.
actors: Matt Dillon, Willem Dafoe, Neal McDonough, Amy Smart
sapo_description: Bud Carter, um detetive de Baton Rouge, prende o mercenário Jesse Weiland e consegue convencê-lo a tornar-se informador para denunciar um bando de criminosos. Só que isso vai colocar-lhes a cabeça a prémio e obrigá-los a agir em conjunto para deitar abaixo o gangue.

title: Hidden Agenda
imdb_description: Directed by Marc S. Grenier.  With Dolph Lundgren, Maxim Roy, Brigitte Paquette, Ted Whittall. When the FBI can't protect a witness, it's up to ex-agent Price and his own protection program to take them under.
plot: When the FBI can't protect a witness, it's up to ex-agent Price and his own protection program to take them under.
actors: Dolph Lundgren, Maxim Roy, Brigitte Paquette, Ted Whittall
sapo_description: Quando o FBI não consegue proteger uma testemunha, recorre ao ex-agente Jason Price, cuja rede tecnológica é superior à do governo. Só que desta vez, um homem conhecido como Aniquilador infiltra-se no sistema e Price rapidamente percebe que ninguém é quem aparenta e que todos têm uma agenda oculta.

title: The Identical
imdb_description: Directed by Dustin Marcellino.  With Blake Rayne, Ray Liotta, Ashley Judd, Seth Green. Twin brothers are unknowingly separated at birth; one of them becomes an iconic rock 'n' roll star, while the other struggles to balance his love for music and pleasing his father.
plot: Twin brothers are unknowingly separated at birth; one of them becomes an iconic rock 'n' roll star, while the other struggles to balance his love for music and pleasing his father.
actors: Ray Liotta, Ashley Judd, Seth Green, Joe Pantoliano
sapo_description: Dois irmãos gémeos são separados à nascença: um deles torna-se uma estrela icónica do rock nos anos 50 enquanto o outro luta para equilibrar o seu amor pela música com o desejo de agradar um pai muito severo e religioso.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
imdb_description: Directed by Peter Jackson.  With Elijah Wood, Viggo Mortensen, Ian McKellen, Orlando Bloom. Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.
writer: J.R.R. Tolkien (novel), Fran Walsh (screenplay), Philippa Boyens (screenplay), Peter Jackson (screenplay)
plot: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.
imdb_title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (2003)
sapo_title: O Senhor Dos Anéis: O Regresso Do Rei
actors: Noel Appleby, Ali Astin, Sean Astin, David Aston
sapo_description: A batalha pela Terra-Média começou. Aragorn luta para cumprir o seu legado enquanto lidera os seus seguidores contra o poder crescente de Sauron. Frodo e Sam, guiados por Gollum, continuam a sua perigosa missão em direção aos fogos da Montanha da Condenação, para destruírem o Anel.

title: Batman
imdb_description: Directed by Tim Burton.  With Michael Keaton, Jack Nicholson, Kim Basinger, Robert Wuhl. The Dark Knight of Gotham City begins his war on crime with his first major enemy being the clownishly homicidal Joker.
writer: Bob Kane (Batman characters), Sam Hamm (story), Sam Hamm (screenplay), Warren Skaaren (screenplay)
plot: The Dark Knight of Gotham City begins his war on crime with his first major enemy being the clownishly homicidal Joker.
actors: Michael Keaton, Jack Nicholson, Kim Basinger, Robert Wuhl
sapo_description: Em Gotham City, um cavaleiro das trevas conhecido como Batman ajuda a combater o crime e a manter a salvo os cidadãos da cidade. Quando Jack Napier é transformado na encarnação do mal, o Joker, e promete dominar Gotham, só Batman poderá detê-lo antes que seja tarde demais.

title: Furious 7
imdb_description: Directed by James Wan.  With Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Dwayne Johnson, Jason Statham. Deckard Shaw seeks revenge against Dominic Toretto and his family for his comatose brother.
awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 28 wins & 31 nominations.
plot: Deckard Shaw seeks revenge against Dominic Toretto and his family for his comatose brother.

sapo_description: Depois de derrotarem Owen Shaw e o seu gangue, Dominic Toretto, Brian O´Conner, Letty Ortiz e a restante equipa ponderam regressar aos EUA e recomeçar as suas vidas de forma legal, mas o irmão mais velho de Owen decide atacá-los em busca de vingança...

title: Momentum
imdb_description: Directed by Stephen S. Campanelli.  With Olga Kurylenko, James Purefoy, Morgan Freeman, Jenna Saras. Alex, a mysterious thief, is pulled in by her former partner for one last heist. She quickly finds it was never just about the diamonds. A brutal murder sparks a cat and mouse chase between Alex and a master assassin. Now she must uncover the lies behind the heist and discover the secrets behind the men who have made her a target.
plot: Alex, a mysterious thief, is pulled in by her former partner for one last heist. She quickly finds it was never just about the diamonds. A brutal murder sparks a cat and mouse chase between...
actors: Olga Kurylenko, Morgan Freeman, James Purefoy, Jenna Saras
sapo_description: Alex Faraday é uma ex-ladra que é levada por um antigo parceiro a regressar ao ativo para um último assalto. Mas tudo muda quando há um homicídio e ela percebe que não foi chamada apenas para roubar diamantes e está perante um esquema de corrupção que envolve um senador e elementos da CIA.

title: The Client
imdb_description: Directed by Joel Schumacher.  With Susan Sarandon, Tommy Lee Jones, Brad Renfro, Mary-Louise Parker. A young boy who witnessed the suicide of a mafia lawyer hires an attorney to protect him when the District Attorney tries to use him to take down a mob family.
writer: John Grisham (novel), Akiva Goldsman (screenplay), Robert Getchell (screenplay)
awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 3 wins & 3 nominations.
plot: A young boy who witnessed the suicide of a mafia lawyer hires an attorney to protect him when the District Attorney tries to use him to take down a mob family.
actors: Susan Sarandon, Tommy Lee Jones, Mary-Louise Parker, Anthony LaPaglia
sapo_description: Um jovem de 11 anos vê um advogado da mafia a suicidar-se e torna-se um peão num jogo em que, de um lado, é ameaçado de morte se for a tribunal testemunhar e do outro é pressionado pelo Ministério Público a fazê-lo. A sua aliada é uma advogada pronta a arriscar tudo por ele.

title: Zazy
imdb_description: Directed by Matthias X. Oberg.  With Paul Boche, Philippe Brenninkmeyer, Olivia Burkhart, Claudio Caiolo. Zazy and her boyfriend Tomek stumble upon the truth behind a terrible accident, which they use to force the wealthy Marianna into giving them the life they have always desired.
plot: Zazy and her boyfriend Tomek stumble upon the truth behind a terrible accident, which they use to force the wealthy Marianna into giving them the life they have always desired.
actors: Paul Boche, Philippe Brenninkmeyer, Olivia Burkhart, Claudio Caiolo
sapo_description: Zazy (Ruby O. Fee) e o seu namorado lutam com a verdade por trás de um terrível acidente, que eles usam para forçar Marianna (Petra van de Voort), uma mulher rica, a dar-lhes a vida que sempre desejaram.

title: Kristen
plot: "Kristen" is a claustrophobic thriller/horror about Kristen Welling, a fragile woman in her late twenties, who, on January first when cleaning the mess of last night's party, gets ...
actors: Terence Schreurs, Poal Cairo, Jet Pagnier, Ronald Top
sapo_description: No dia de Ano Novo, Kristen (Terence Schreurs) chega ao bar do seu pai para limpar depois da noite anterior. Então uma figura misteriosa começa a assediá-la. Ele chama, espreita na porta, assobia... e parece saber tudo sobre Kristen.

title: Back Home
plot: Robert is a young writer passing through a difficult time in his life.
actors: Andi Vasluianu, Mirela Oprisor, Florin Zamfirescu, Sorin Cocis
sapo_description: Robert é um jovem jornalista que está a atravessar um período difícil na sua vida. Ele volta para o seu vilarejo natal por um dia… Um dia para se encontrar com o seu pai, com quem ele teve uma relação difícil, e com dois antigos colegas: Petrica, seu velho melhor amigo, agora casado e com filhos e Paula, sua namorada na adolescência. Chegou a hora de Robert mudar o seu destino.

title: The Price of Crime
writer: Massimo Gaudioso, Massimo Gaudioso, Giacomo Gensini, Alessandro Piva, Alessandro Piva
plot: The rise and fall of a Camorra clan in Naples, told through the eyes of a crime boss and his family. Thirty years of a man's life, thirty years in the history of one of the most beautiful and controversial cities on Earth: Naples.
actors: Francesco Scianna, Valentina Lodovini, Carmine Recano, Francesco Di Leva
sapo_description: A ascensão e queda de um clã da Camorra em Nápoles, contada através dos olhos de um chefe do crime e sua família. Quarenta anos de vida de um homem, quarenta anos na história de uma das mais belas e controversas cidades da Terra: Nápoles.

title: Les François
plot: This film was so nice and very interesting movie
actors: Marie-France Alvarez, Margot Bancilhon, Issame Chayle, Nozha Khouadra
sapo_description: François (Daniel Russo), um comerciante aposentado, vive sozinho em uma casa grande e, de vez em quando, ele se permite algumas aventuras de uma noite. Ele só aceita a presença de Reine (Marie-France Alvarez), a sua empregada doméstica. Um dia, um jovem chamado François (Issame Chayle) bate em sua porta. Pouco a pouco, eles constroem um vínculo inquebrável de amizade.

title: Fräulein: una fiaba d'inverno
plot: An impressive solar storm befalls the Earth causing power surges and blackouts. A deeper storm rages in the soul of Regina, a lonely spinster called 'Fräulein', after a mysterious tourist ...
actors: Christian De Sica, Lucia Mascino, Max Mazzotta, Therese Hämer
sapo_description: A maior tempestade solar atinge a Terra, causando surtos de energia e apagões. Uma tempestade muito maior irrompe dentro da alma de uma mulher sombria e solitária chamada Regina (Lucia Mascino), depois que um visitante misterioso (Christian De Sica) insiste em ficar como hóspede no seu hotel, que está fechado há anos.

title: Welcome to the Rileys
plot: On a business trip to New Orleans, a damaged man seeks salvation by caring for a wayward young woman.
actors: James Gandolfini, Kristen Stewart, Melissa Leo, Joe Chrest
sapo_description: Em 1870, o mundo ficou chocado com a França perdendo a guerra contra a Prússia. Os patriotas mais inabaláveis acabam colaborando com os ocupantes. No meio de tudo isso, Jean (Jérémie Duvall), uma criança que observa essa mudança radical no comportamento dos franceses. Somente o seu vizinho, Merlin (Bruno Lochet), ainda parece dotado de valores e senso comum.

title: Snow White and the Huntsman
imdb_description: Directed by Rupert Sanders.  With Kristen Stewart, Chris Hemsworth, Charlize Theron, Sam Claflin. In a twist to the fairy tale, the Huntsman ordered to take Snow White into the woods to be killed winds up becoming her protector and mentor in a quest to vanquish the Evil Queen.
writer: Evan Daugherty (screenplay), John Lee Hancock (screenplay), Hossein Amini (screenplay), Evan Daugherty (screen story)

plot: In a twist to the fairy tale, the Huntsman ordered to take Snow White into the woods to be killed winds up becoming her protector and mentor in a quest to vanquish the Evil Queen.
sapo_title: A Branca de Neve e o Caçador
actors: Kristen Stewart, Chris Hemsworth, Charlize Theron, Sam Claflin
sapo_description: Nova versão do lendário conto «A Branca de Neve e o Caçador», a história de branca de Neve, a única pessoa na terra mais bela que a rainha má, que fará de tudo para a destruir. A jovem Branca de Neve aprende a arte da guerra com um caçador, que supostamente teria a missão de a matar, e ameaça o reino desta rainha do maléfico. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: X-Men: First Class
imdb_description: Directed by Gavin Hood.  With Hugh Jackman, Liev Schreiber, Ryan Reynolds, Danny Huston. A look at Wolverine's early life, in particular his time with the government squad Team X and the impact it will have on his later years.
writer: Ashley Miller (screenplay by), Zack Stentz (screenplay by), Jane Goldman (screenplay by), Matthew Vaughn (screenplay by), Sheldon Turner (story by), Bryan Singer (story by)

sapo_description: Antes de os mutantes terem revelado a sua existência ao mundo, e antes mesmo de Charles Xavier (James McAvoy) e Erik Lehnsherr (Michael Fassbender) se transformarem em Professor X e Magneto, eles eram apenas dois jovens a tentar controlar os seus poderes sobre-humanos. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Fantastic Four
imdb_description: Directed by Josh Trank.  With Miles Teller, Kate Mara, Michael B. Jordan, Jamie Bell. Four young outsiders teleport to an alternate and dangerous universe which alters their physical form in shocking ways. The four must learn to harness their new abilities and work together to save Earth from a former friend turned enemy.
writer: Jeremy Slater (screenplay), Simon Kinberg (screenplay), Josh Trank (screenplay), Stan Lee (Marvel comic book), Jack Kirby (Marvel comic book)
plot: Four young outsiders teleport to an alternate and dangerous universe which alters their physical form in shocking ways. The four must learn to harness their new abilities and work together to save Earth from a former friend turned enemy.
actors: Miles Teller, Michael B. Jordan, Kate Mara, Jamie Bell
sapo_description: Reed Richard ou o Sr. Fantástico, que consegue esticar o corpo como um elástico, Susan Storm ou Mulher Invisível, que consegue tornar-se e tornar qualquer coisa invisível, Johnny Storm, o Homem-Tocha que se incendeia quando quer, e Ben Grimm, o Coisa, detentor de uma força gigantesca formam o Quarteto Fantástico. Juntos vão combater o Dr. Destino, um ex-colega de Reed que procura vingança. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Framed for Murder: A Fixer Upper Mystery
imdb_description: Directed by Mark Jean.  With Jewel Kilcher, Colin Ferguson, Erin Karpluk, Ron Lea. In the small resort town of Lighthouse Cove, everyone knows that the best man for the job is a woman. And that woman is Shannon Hughes, owner of Hughes Restoration and an expert in Victorian home restoration and renovation. Through her renovations she will find clues to uncover the house's secret past and in turn become an unlikely sleuth to help crack these unsolved mysteries. From the Fixer ...
writer: Kate Carlisle (based on the "Fixer-Upper Mysteries"), Peter Hume (story), Peter Hume (teleplay), Teena Booth (teleplay)
plot: In the small resort town of Lighthouse Cove, everyone knows that the best man for the job is a woman. And that woman is Shannon Hughes, owner of Hughes Restoration and an expert in ...
imdb_title: Framed for Murder: A Fixer Upper Mystery (TV Movie 2017)
sapo_title: Framed For Murder: A Fixer Upper Mystery
actors: Jewel Kilcher, Colin Ferguson, Erin Karpluk, Ron Lea
sapo_description: Numa estância, na pequena, cidade Lighthouse Cove, toda a gente sabe que o melhor homem para trabalhar é uma mulher. E essa mulher é Shannon Hammer, proprietária da sua própria empresa de construção Hammer Construction Company e uma especialista em restauração e renovação de casas. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Honey
imdb_description: Directed by Bille Woodruff.  With Jessica Alba, Mekhi Phifer, Romeo Miller, Missy Elliott. Honey is a sexy, tough music video choreographer who shakes up her life after her mentor gives her an ultimatum: sleep with him or be blacklisted within their industry.
plot: Honey is a sexy, tough music video choreographer who shakes up her life after her mentor gives her an ultimatum: sleep with him or be blacklisted within their industry.
actors: Jessica Alba, Mekhi Phifer, Romeo Miller, Joy Bryant
sapo_description: Jessica Alba dá vida a Honey Daniels, dançarina e coreógrafa que trabalha simultaneamente num bar e dá aulas de hip-hop até que chegue a sua grande oportunidade. Surge uma perspectiva, mas transforma-se em desilusão. Quando finalmente caminha para o sucesso, Honey vive a emoção de um sonho tornado realidade. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: The Perfect Catch
imdb_description: Directed by Steven R. Monroe.  With Nikki Deloach, Andrew W. Walker, Chance Hurstfield, Vincent Dangerfield. Jessica, a single parent, owner of a struggling diner, finds the inspiration she needed when her high school boyfriend, Chase, a professional baseball player returns to town.
writer: Hanz Wasserburger (teleplay), Gregg Rossen (teleplay), Brian Sawyer (teleplay), Hanz Wasserburger (story)
plot: Jessica, a single parent, owner of a struggling diner, finds the inspiration she needed when her high school boyfriend, Chase, a professional baseball player returns to town.
actors: Nikki Deloach, Andrew W. Walker, Chance Hurstfield, Vincent Dangerfield
sapo_description: Quando o ex-namorado da escola secundária de Jessica Parker, o jogador de beisebol da superstar Chase Taynor, volta à cidade, ela encontra a inspiração para reinventar seu café em dificuldades ... e revisita o passado para encontrar algo ainda melhor para o futuro. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Just the Way You Are
imdb_description: Directed by Kristoffer Tabori.  With Carolyn Adair, Michael Antonakos, Rukiya Bernard, Jan Bos. A successful matchmaker has suddenly lost the spark in her own marriage after 15 years, so Jennie insists her husband, Ian, to go on a blind date-with her. By rediscovering each other as "newly-mets," they get a second chance to fall in love for the first time all over again.
plot: A successful matchmaker has suddenly lost the spark in her own marriage after 15 years, so Jennie insists her husband, Ian, to go on a blind date-with her. By rediscovering each other as "...
imdb_title: Just the Way You Are (TV Movie 2015)
actors: Carolyn Adair, Michael Antonakos, Rukiya Bernard, Jan Bos
sapo_description: Quando uma “casamenteira” vê o próprio casamento perder o brilho, ela sugere ao marido um encontro cego. À medida que se aproxima o Dia da Mãe e o romance se começa a reavivar, ela pergunta-se se o seu marido, focado na carreira, vai finalmente colocar a família acima do trabalho. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Fatal Memories
imdb_description: Directed by Farhad Mann.  With Italia Ricci, Magda Apanowicz, Kevin McNulty, Zak Santiago. Psychological thriller. A woman tries to help her sister remember the events surrounding the fatal stabbing of their mother.
plot: Psychological thriller. A woman tries to help her sister remember the events surrounding the fatal stabbing of their mother.
actors: Italia Ricci, Magda Apanowicz, Kevin McNulty, Zak Santiago
sapo_description: A vida de Sarah fica virada do avesso quando a sua sobrinha Lena é libertada de um asilo. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Step Up 3D
imdb_description: Directed by Jon M. Chu.  With Sharni Vinson, Rick Malambri, Adam Sevani, Alyson Stoner. A tight-knit group of New York City street dancers find themselves pitted against the world's best hip hop dancers in a high-stakes showdown.
writer: Amy Andelson, Emily Meyer, Duane Adler (characters)
plot: A tight-knit group of New York City street dancers find themselves pitted against the world's best hip hop dancers in a high-stakes showdown.
actors: Rick Malambri, Adam Sevani, Sharni Vinson, Alyson Stoner
sapo_description: Luke é um bailarino de rua órfão, desesperado por evitar ser expulso da única casa que tem: um armazém de despejos em Nova Iorque que é o refúgio de vários bailarinos de todas as partes do mundo. Esta 'família' tem uma equipa de dança - a Casa dos Piratas. Classificação etária: M/6.

title: Step Up Revolution
imdb_description: Directed by Scott Speer.  With Kathryn McCormick, Ryan Guzman, Cleopatra Coleman, Misha Gabriel Hamilton. Emily arrives in Miami with aspirations to become a professional dancer. She sparks with Sean, the leader of a dance crew whose neighborhood is threatened by Emily's father's development plans.
plot: Emily arrives in Miami with aspirations to become a professional dancer. She sparks with Sean, the leader of a dance crew whose neighborhood is threatened by Emily's father's development plans.
actors: Cleopatra Coleman, Ryan Guzman, Misha Gabriel Hamilton, Michael 'Xeno' Langebeck
sapo_description: Emily é a filha de um rico empresário que chega a Miami com aspirações de se tornar numa dançarina profissional. Emily apaixona-se por Sean, um jovem que lidera uma equipa de dança que se especializou em flash mobs. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Machete
imdb_description: Directed by Ethan Maniquis, Robert Rodriguez.  With Danny Trejo, Michelle Rodriguez, Robert De Niro, Jessica Alba. After being set-up and betrayed by the man who hired him to assassinate a Texas Senator, an ex-Federale launches a brutal rampage of revenge against his former boss.
plot: After being set-up and betrayed by the man who hired him to assassinate a Texas Senator, an ex-Federale launches a brutal rampage of revenge against his former boss.
actors: Danny Trejo, Robert De Niro, Jessica Alba, Steven Seagal
sapo_description: Depois de perder a família num sangrento ajuste de contas com Torrez (Steven Seagal), o mais perigoso traficante de drogas de todo o México, Machete (Danny Trejo), ex-agente federal mexicano, parte para o Texas, numa tentativa de deixar o passado para trás e começar uma nova vida. Classificação etária: M/16.

title: The Theory of Everything
imdb_description: Directed by James Marsh.  With Eddie Redmayne, Felicity Jones, Tom Prior, Sophie Perry. A look at the relationship between the famous physicist Stephen Hawking and his wife.
plot: A look at the relationship between the famous physicist Stephen Hawking and his wife.
actors: Eddie Redmayne, Felicity Jones, Tom Prior, Sophie Perry
sapo_description: Nascido em Oxford (Reino Unido), a 8 de Janeiro de 1942, Stephen William Hawking é considerado um dos mais importantes astrofísicos de todos os tempos. Em 1963, enquanto estudante de Física na conceituada Universidade de Oxford, Stephen está decidido a encontrar uma 'simples, eloquente explicação' para o Universo. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: In the Line of Fire
imdb_description: Directed by Wolfgang Petersen.  With Clint Eastwood, John Malkovich, Rene Russo, Dylan McDermott. Secret Service agent Frank Horrigan couldn't save Kennedy, but he's determined not to let a clever assassin take out this president.
awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 2 wins & 13 nominations.
plot: Secret Service agent Frank Horrigan couldn't save Kennedy, but he's determined not to let a clever assassin take out this president.
actors: Clint Eastwood, John Malkovich, Rene Russo, Dylan McDermott
sapo_description: “Na Linha de Fogo” é um 'thriller' intenso de Wolfgang Petersen, o cineasta alemão que se tornou um dos mais interessantes realizadores do 'cinema de ação' norte-americano. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Street Fighter
imdb_description: Directed by Steven E. de Souza.  With Jean-Claude Van Damme, Raul Julia, Ming-Na Wen, Damian Chapa. Col. Guile and various other martial arts heroes fight against the tyranny of Dictator M. Bison and his cohorts.
plot: Col. Guile and various other martial arts heroes fight against the tyranny of Dictator M. Bison and his cohorts.
actors: Jean-Claude Van Damme, Raul Julia, Ming-Na Wen, Damian Chapa
sapo_description: Shadaloo, Sudeste asiático, 1995. À medida que a guerra civil entra no seu último mês, o general M. Bison leva a crise ao limiar de um conflito global ao tomar como reféns 63 trabalhadores das Nações Unidas, os quais ameaça matar se não for pago um resgate de 20 biliões de dólares. O coronel William E Guile recebe a missão de salvar os reféns - mas, primeiro, tem de localizá-los. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Snake in the Eagle's Shadow
imdb_description: Directed by Woo-Ping Yuen.  With Jackie Chan, Siu Tin Yuen, Jang Lee Hwang, Dean Shek. Jackie Chan is a boy who is used as a janitor at his kung-fu school. Jackie Chan can't fight and is always getting bullied by the teachers and pupils. One day an old man helps Jackie train in an art of kung-fu called the ' Snake's Fist '. Jackie doesn't get bullied again. Then Jacki creates his own style and mixes it with the Snake's Fist. His style is based on the movement and actions of a cat. ...
writer: Chi Yuan Hsi, Huo An Hsi, Lung Hsiao, See-Yuen Ng (screenplay), Chi-Kuang Tsai (screenplay)
plot: Jackie Chan is a boy who is used as a janitor at his kung-fu school. Jackie Chan can't fight and is always getting bullied by the teachers and pupils. One day an old man helps Jackie train ...
actors: Jackie Chan, Siu Tin Yuen, Jang Lee Hwang, Dean Shek
sapo_description: Conhecido em inglês pelo belo título de 'Snake On The Eagle's Shade', este é um dos grandes clássicos do cinema de artes marciais quando o género estava no apogeu e a sua vedeta, Jackie Chan, tinha 24 anos. Segundo os especialistas, foi o filme que definiu definitivamente a imagem de Chan, pois aqui pela primeira vez ele não tenta ser 'o novo Bruce Lee'. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: American Ninja 4: The Annihilation
imdb_description: Directed by Cedric Sundstrom.  With Michael Dudikoff, David Bradley, James Booth, Dwayne Alexandre. The two American Ninjas, Joe Armstrong and Sean Davidson, team up to do battle against a terrorist and his band of Ninjas.
writer: Gideon Amir (based on characters created by), James Booth, Avi Kleinberger (based on characters created by)
plot: The two American Ninjas, Joe Armstrong and Sean Davidson, team up to do battle against a terrorist and his band of Ninjas.
actors: Michael Dudikoff, David Bradley, James Booth, Dwayne Alexandre
sapo_description: O agente da CIA, Sean Davison e o seu amigo Carl são encarregados da missão de libertar uns comandos da Força Delta que se encontram presos no quartel-general de um poderoso grupo de terroristas. Sean, Carl e a bela doutora Sarah deparam-se com várias dificuldades e o veterano Joe Armstrong é convocado para resolver todos os problemas, incluindo a ameaça de uma bomba atómica em Nova Iorque. Class. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Maximum Risk

plot: Based on a true story its the untold story of Italian World War II POW"S in Jan 1946. Luca Zingaretti stars as one of over 50,000 Italian Prisoners of War detained at POW camps in the U.S. ...

sapo_description: Durante a Segunda Guerra Mundial havia cinquenta mil prisioneiros de guerra italianos nos Estados Unidos da América. title: Maid in Manhattan
imdb_description: Directed by Wayne Wang.  With Jennifer Lopez, Ralph Fiennes, Natasha Richardson, Stanley Tucci. A Senatorial candidate falls for a hotel maid, thinking she is a socialite, when he sees her trying on a wealthy woman's dress.
plot: A Senatorial candidate falls for a hotel maid, thinking she is a socialite, when he sees her trying on a wealthy woman's dress.
actors: Jennifer Lopez, Ralph Fiennes, Natasha Richardson, Stanley Tucci
sapo_description: Marisa Ventura (Jennifer Lopez) é uma mãe solteira batalhadora que trabalha num hotel de luxo em Manhattan e sonha em ter uma vida melhor, para ela e para o seu filho (Tyler Posey). Certo dia, o candidato a senador, Christopher Marshall (Ralph Fiennes), que estava hospedado no hotel, conhece Marisa e confunde-a com uma mulher rica. Depois de uma noite fascinante, os dois apaixonam-se.

title: Lady in the Water
imdb_description: Directed by M. Night Shyamalan.  With Paul Giamatti, Bryce Dallas Howard, Jeffrey Wright, Bob Balaban. Apartment building superintendent Cleveland Heep rescues what he thinks is a young woman from the pool he maintains. When he discovers that she is actually a character from a bedtime story who is trying to make the journey back to her home, he works with his tenants to protect his new friend from the creatures that are determined to keep her in our world.
plot: Apartment building superintendent Cleveland Heep rescues what he thinks is a young woman from the pool he maintains. Story, assim se chama, é uma 'Narf', uma criatura fantástica, enviada para a terra para proteger a humanidade de uns seres místicos que lhe querem causar mal.

title: Get Smart
imdb_description: Directed by Peter Segal.  With Steve Carell, Anne Hathaway, Alan Arkin, Dwayne Johnson. A highly intellectual but socially awkward spy is tasked with preventing a terrorist attack from a Russian spy agency.

title: Collateral Damage
imdb_description: Directed by Andrew Davis.  With Arnold Schwarzenegger, John Leguizamo, Francesca Neri, Elias Koteas. After his family is killed by a terrorist act, a firefighter goes in search of the one responsible.

Como as investigações oficiais do governo americano parecem não chegar a lugar algum, Brewer decide então perseguir o próprio 'The Wolf', se envolvendo em um complicado jogo que o leva até a Colômbia.

title: Dark Blue
imdb_description: Directed by Ron Shelton.  With Kurt Russell, Ving Rhames, Scott Speedman, Michael Michele. A robbery homicide investigation triggers a series of events that will cause a corrupt LAPD officer to question his tactics.

imdb_description: Directed by Oliver Stone.  With Charlie Sheen, Michael Douglas, Tamara Tunie, Franklin Cover. Porém, depressa descobre que o preço que tem a pagar é demasiado alto.

title: Force of Execution
imdb_description: Directed by Keoni Waxman.  With Steven Seagal, Ving Rhames, Danny Trejo, Bren Foster. plot: "Force of Execution" is the story about a crime lord torn between his legacy and his desire to get out of the life of crime that has built his empire, when a new player to the scene tries ...

E nem mesmo aqueles que estão a seu serviço podem cometer erros. Quando seu protegido, Roman Hurst, mata um alvo errado em meio a um trabalho de rotina, Alexander poupa sua vida, mas quebra as duas mãos de sue antigo assassino de confiança.

title: Breakdown
imdb_description: Directed by Jonathan Mostow.  With Kurt Russell, J.T. Walsh, Kathleen Quinlan, M.C. Gainey. A man searches for his missing wife after his car breaks down in the middle of the desert.

title: Stay

imdb_description: Directed by Roar Uthaug.  With Kristoffer Joner, Ane Dahl Torp, Jonas Hoff Oftebro, Edith Haagenrud-Sande. Although anticipated, no one is really ready when the mountain pass above the scenic, narrow Norwegian fjord Geiranger collapses and creates an 85-meter high violent tsunami. A geologist is one of those caught in the middle of it.
plot: Although anticipated, no one is really ready when the mountain pass above the scenic, narrow Norwegian fjord Geiranger collapses and creates an 85-meter high violent tsunami. A geologist is one of those caught in the middle of it.

title: A Perfect Day

title: Adore
imdb_description: Directed by Anne Fontaine.  With Naomi Watts, Robin Wright, Xavier Samuel, James Frecheville. A pair of childhood friends and neighbors fall for each other's sons.

Fragilizadas e ainda a recuperar das suas relações anteriores, cada uma delas acaba por se apaixonar pelo filho da outra.

title: Born to Raise Hell
imdb_description: Directed by Lauro David Chartrand-DelValle.  With Steven Seagal, Dan Badarau, Darren Shahlavi, D. Neil Mark. Fueled with vengeance, he leads us on an action packed thrill ride while avenging his friend's death.
plot: A hard core Interpol Agent is assigned to an Eastern European task force to target gun trafficking and dope running throughout the Balkans. While investigating a Russian gun dealer, his ...

title: Don't Kill It
imdb_description: Directed by Mike Mendez.  With Dolph Lundgren, Kristina Klebe, Tony Bentley, James Chalke. An ancient demon terrorizes a tiny Mississippi town.

Com a ajuda de uma agente do FBI, Woodley vai tentar capturar e destruir o demónio antes que seja tarde demais.

title: Posse
imdb_description: Directed by Mario Van Peebles.  With Mario Van Peebles, Stephen Baldwin, Charles Lane, Tommy 'Tiny' Lister. A group of mostly black infantrymen return from the Spanish-American War with a cache of gold. They travel to the West where their leader searches for the men who lynched his father.

title: Hulk Vs.
imdb_description: Directed by Sam Liu, Frank Paur.  With Fred Tatasciore, Matthew Wolf, Graham McTavish, Grey Griffin. Two stories featuring Marvel's anti-hero The Incredible Hulk and his encounters with the X-Man Wolverine and the god known as Thor.

title: Comet

title: Starman
imdb_description: Directed by John Carpenter.  With Jeff Bridges, Karen Allen, Charles Martin Smith, Richard Jaeckel. An alien takes the form of a young widow's husband and asks her to drive him from Wisconsin to Arizona. The government tries to stop them.

title: Young Guns

title: The Dead Zone

Quando acorda percebe que tem poderes psíquicos e consegue prever o futuro, só que esse dom pode ter efeitos muito negativos, principalmente quando entra em cena um candidato à presidência dos EUA.

title: La maîtresse du président

Torna-se sua amante, e encontram-se regularmente no 'Blue Room' do palácio, embora a sua esposa, Bertha, não esteja muito longe. Mas a morte do presidente Faure nos seus braços muda a vida de Steinheil por sempre.

title: People Who Are Well

Ele nunca vai admitir, mas sabe que a sua esposa que não trabalha é muito mais inteligente do que ele e é muito melhor em lidar com os problemas dos seus filhos.

title: Répercussions
plot: N/A
actors: Bruno Slagmulder, Sarah Grappin, Eric Savin, Nathalie Besançon

A sua morte súbita mudará para sempre a vida do prefeito da cidade, uma vez que uma jornalista investigativa torna o assunto pessoal e decide realizar a sua própria investigação. Acidente ou assassinato? Essa é a única pergunta para a qual ela quer ter resposta.

title: Klumpfisken

Como resultado das novas políticas de pesca e da recessão financeira global, os pequenos negócios de pesca estão a sucumbir lentamente à pressão de competir com as grandes empresas de pesca.

title: American Pie

Jim (Jason Biggs) é um desportista que não consegue parar de pensar em sexo. A sua primeira tentativa — com Nadia (Shannon Elizabeth), uma estudante estrangeira, resulta desastrosa. Classificação etária: M/16.

Classificação etária: M/12.

Ao perceberem desvendarem as ramificações, Rama é imediatamente recrutado para embarcar numa nova missão sob disfarce. Classificação etária: M/16.

title: The Grey
imdb_description: Directed by Joe Carnahan.  With Liam Neeson, Dermot Mulroney, Frank Grillo, Dallas Roberts. After their plane crashes in Alaska, six oil workers are led by a skilled huntsman to survival, but a pack of merciless wolves haunts their every step.

Quando, numa viagem para Anchorage, o avião onde segue com os colegas sofre uma avaria e despenha-se no meio da vastidão de gelo, ele sabe que resta pouca esperança a qualquer um deles. Classificação etária: M/16.

title: Hulk

title: Captive

Classificação etária: M/12.

Mas, assim que o novo grupo de dança que ele forma em conjunto com a bela e teimosa Andie West chega às etapas finais de um concurso de televisão, na reluzente cidade de Las Vegas.

title: Umrika
imdb_description: Directed by Prashant Nair.  With Aashish Bhatt, Uplaksh Kochhar, Megh Pant, Mayur More. A small village in India is invigorated when one of their own travels to America (aka, UMRIKA) and details his adventures through letters home, sparking community debate and inspiring hope. But when the letters mysteriously stop coming, his younger brother Rama (Suraj Sharma) sets out on a journey to find him. With the help of his best friend Lalu (Tony Revolori), Rama retraces his brother's path...

title: Inglourious Basterds

Ao seu cuidado está Zero Moustafa, um jovem e muito dedicado paquete que tem por ele uma admiração sem limites e que sonha seguir o seu exemplo. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Locke

E quando as coisas correm mal e o predador se transforma em presa, Zhou descobre que não tem para onde fugir, nem para onde se esconder.

Apanhado entre o combate e a coragem, Aang descobre que é o último Avatar com o poder de manipular os quatro elementos.

title: The Mission

Ela havia se apaixonado por Felipe e Mendoza não aceitou isto, pois ela tinha um relacionamento com ele.

title: Pearl Harbor
imdb_description: Directed by Michael Bay.  With Ben Affleck, Kate Beckinsale, Josh Hartnett, William Lee Scott. A tale of war and romance mixed in with history. The story follows two lifelong friends and a beautiful nurse who are caught up in the horror of an infamous Sunday morning in 1941.

É uma história acerca de uma derrota catastrófica, uma heroica vitória, valor pessoal e amor representados sobre a assombrosa ação da época da guerra.

title: Resident Evil: The Final Chapter
imdb_description: Directed by Paul W.S. Anderson.  With Milla Jovovich, Iain Glen, Ali Larter, Shawn Roberts. Alice returns to where the nightmare began: The Hive in Raccoon City, where the Umbrella Corporation is gathering its forces for a final strike against the only remaining survivors of the apocalypse.

title: Chocolat
imdb_description: Directed by Roschdy Zem.  With Omar Sy, James Thierrée, Clotilde Hesme, Olivier Gourmet. The rise and fall of the famous clown Chocolat, the first black circus performer who revolutionised the stagnant circus acts and conquered Paris of the Belle Époque with his exuberance and originality.
writer: Cyril Gely (screenplay), Olivier Gorce (adaptation), Gérard Noiriel (adaptation), Roschdy Zem (adaptation)

title: Dunkirk
imdb_description: Directed by Christopher Nolan.  With Fionn Whitehead, Barry Keoghan, Mark Rylance, Tom Hardy. Allied soldiers from Belgium, the British Empire and France are surrounded by the German Army, and evacuated during a fierce battle in World War II.

title: Same Kind of Different as Me
imdb_description: Directed by Michael Carney.  With Greg Kinnear, Renée Zellweger, Djimon Hounsou, Jon Voight. International art dealer Ron Hall must befriend a dangerous homeless man in order to save his struggling marriage to his wife, a woman whose dreams will lead all three of them on the journey of their lives.

title: Thank You for Your Service
imdb_description: Directed by Jason Hall.  With Miles Teller, Beulah Koale, Joe Cole, Scott Haze. title: Hidden Figures
imdb_description: Directed by Theodore Melfi.  With Taraji P. Henson, Octavia Spencer, Janelle Monáe, Kevin Costner. The story of a team of female African-American mathematicians who served a vital role in NASA during the early years of the U.S. space program.
writer: Allison Schroeder (screenplay by), Theodore Melfi (screenplay by), Margot Lee Shetterly (based on the book by)

title: Ocean's 11
imdb_description: Directed by Lewis Milestone.  With Frank Sinatra, Dean Martin, Sammy Davis Jr., Peter Lawford. Danny Ocean gathers a group of his World War II compatriots to pull off the ultimate Las Vegas heist. Together the eleven friends plan to rob five Las Vegas casinos in one night.

title: In Harm's Way
imdb_description: Directed by Otto Preminger.  With John Wayne, Kirk Douglas, Patricia Neal, Tom Tryon. A Naval officer, reprimanded after Pearl Harbor, is later promoted to Rear Admiral, and gets a second chance to prove himself against the Japanese.
plot: A Naval officer, reprimanded after Pearl Harbor, is later promoted to Rear Admiral, and gets a second chance to prove himself against the Japanese.
actors: John Wayne, Kirk Douglas, Patricia Neal, Tom Tryon
sapo_description: A visão épica do produtor e realizador Otto Preminger sobre o bombardeamento de Pearl Harbor, que conta em pormenor como ocorreu o devastador ataque surpresa, bem como as explosivas histórias dos bastidores.

title: Subway
writer: Luc Besson (dialogue), Luc Besson (scenario), Pierre Jolivet (scenario), Alain Le Henry (scenario), Marc Perrier (dialogue), Marc Perrier (scenario), Sophie Schmit (scenario)

actors: Isabelle Adjani, Christopher Lambert, Richard Bohringer, Michel Galabru
sapo_description: Fred é ladrão que procura refúgio nos labirínticos túneis do Metro, depois de uma perseguição.

title: The Sniper
writer: Gabriel Jeffrey Fowler (screenplay), Liam O'Flaherty (short story)

sapo_description: Um sniper asassina brutalmente jovens mulheres, todas morenas. Cabe à polícia traçar o perfil psicológico deste homicida para ajudar à sua captura.

title: Kicks
imdb_description: Directed by Justin Tipping.  With Jahking Guillory, Christopher Jordan Wallace, Christopher Meyer, Kofi Siriboe. Brandon is a 15 year old whose dream is a pair of fresh Air Jordans. Soon after he gets his hands on them, they're stolen by a local hood, causing Brandon and his two friends to go on a dangerous mission through Oakland to retrieve them.
plot: Brandon is a 15 year old whose dream is a pair of fresh Air Jordans. Soon after he gets his hands on them, they're stolen by a local hood, causing Brandon and his two friends to go on a dangerous mission through Oakland to retrieve them.
actors: Jahking Guillory, Christopher Jordan Wallace, Christopher Meyer, Kofi Siriboe
sapo_description: Brandon é um jovem de 15 anos, cujo maior sonho é ter um novo par de ténis Air Jordan. Mas pouco tempo depois de os ter na mão são roubados pelo rufia local. Brandon e os seus dois amigos, partem então numa perigosa missão para os recuperar.

title: The Trip to Spain
imdb_description: Directed by Michael Winterbottom.  With Steve Coogan, Rob Brydon, Marta Barrio, Claire Keelan. Actors Steve Coogan and Rob Brydon embark on a six-part episodic road trip through Europe. This time they're in Spain, sampling the restaurants, eateries, and sights along the way.
plot: Actors Steve Coogan and Rob Brydon embark on a six-part episodic road trip through Europe. This time they're in Spain, sampling the restaurants, eateries, and sights along the way.
actors: Steve Coogan, Rob Brydon, Marta Barrio, Claire Keelan
sapo_description: Steve Coogan e Rob Brydon estão de volta. Desta vez vão atravessar Espanha e fazer seis refeições em seis sítios diferentes, a terminar na Andaluzia. Steve, agora com 50 anos, continua atrás do amor, enquanto que Rob vive melhores dias...

title: The Bucket List
imdb_description: Directed by Rob Reiner.  With Jack Nicholson, Morgan Freeman, Sean Hayes, Beverly Todd. Two terminally ill men escape from a cancer ward and head off on a road trip with a wish list of to-dos before they die.
plot: Two terminally ill men escape from a cancer ward and head off on a road trip with a wish list of to-dos before they die.
actors: Jack Nicholson, Morgan Freeman, Sean Hayes, Beverly Todd
sapo_description: Antes de morrerem, um milionário excêntrico e um mecânico afro-americano que sofrem de cancro, decidem dar a volta ao mundo, pautada por extravagâncias.

title: God Willing
imdb_description: Se Dio vuole (2015) on IMDb: Movies, TV, Celebs, and more...
plot: A young man's decision to become a priest affects his whole family, especially his father.
actors: Marco Giallini, Alessandro Gassman, Laura Morante, Ilaria Spada
sapo_description: Tommaso e´ um respeitado cirurgia~o que entra em crise quando o filho, estudante de medicina, anuncia que quer ser padre. O carisma´tico Don Pietro é o responsável por esta decisão e Tommaso irá descobrir os segredos deste padre pouco convencional.

title: King Charles III
imdb_description: Directed by Rupert Goold.  With Tim Pigott-Smith, Oliver Chris, Richard Goulding, Charlotte Riley. Prince Charles' fictional accession to the throne following the Queen's death. When he refuses to sign a controversial bill into law, political chaos ensues: a constitutional crisis, street riots and a tank in front of Buckingham Palace.
writer: Mike Bartlett, Mike Bartlett (based on original stage play by)

title: The History of Love
imdb_description: Directed by Radu Mihaileanu.  With Gemma Arterton, Derek Jacobi, Elliott Gould, Sophie Nélisse. The story of a long-lost book that mysteriously reappears and connects an old man searching for his son with a girl seeking a cure for her mother's loneliness.

title: True Lies
imdb_description: Directed by James Cameron.  With Arnold Schwarzenegger, Jamie Lee Curtis, Tom Arnold, Bill Paxton. A fearless, globe-trotting, terrorist-battling secret agent has his life turned upside down when he discovers his wife might be having an affair with a used car salesman while terrorists smuggle nuclear war heads into the United States.

title: Wish Upon
imdb_description: Directed by John R. Leonetti.  With Joey King, Ryan Phillippe, Ki Hong Lee, Mitchell Slaggert. A teenage girl discovers a box that carries magic powers and a deadly price for using them.
plot: A teenage girl discovers a box that carries magic powers and a deadly price for using them.

title: Ambulance Girl
imdb_description: Directed by Kathy Bates.  With Kathy Bates, Robin Thomas, Gordon Pinsent, Sean McCann. The story revolves around former food writer, Jane Stern, and how she conquered clinical depression after becoming a paramedic.

Depois de mais de trinta anos de casamento, Jane e Michael Stern chegaram a um impasse na sua vida privada, e na sua carreira de sucesso em conjunto, como críticos de cozinha.

title: Spy Hard
imdb_description: Directed by Rick Friedberg.  With Leslie Nielsen, Nicollette Sheridan, Charles Durning, Marcia Gay Harden. Dick Steele, Agent WD-40 is assigned by his Director, to stop the evil General Rancor from destroying the world. WD-40 believed Rancor was dead and he teams up with the hot K.G.B. Agent Veronique Ukrinsky to find Rancor and save the world.

title: Effie Gray
imdb_description: Directed by Richard Laxton.  With Dakota Fanning, Greg Wise, Tom Sturridge, Emma Thompson. A look at the scandalous love triangle between Victorian art critic John Ruskin, his teenage bride Effie Gray, and Pre-Raphaelite painter John Everett Millais.

title: Mr. Gaga
imdb_description: Directed by Tomer Heymann.  With Ohad Naharin, Tzofia Naharin, Olivia Ancona, Avi Belleli. Mr. Gaga tells the story of Ohad Naharin, renowned choreographer and artistic director of the Batsheva Dance Company, an artistic genius who redefined the language of modern dance.

sapo_description: Após muitos anos sombrios de depressão, Luca procura formar-se ensino médio. Mata, o seu cachorro, ajuda-a a encontrar motivação e a manter uma atitude positiva em relação à vida. Para garantir ser aprovada no exame de matemática, Luca faz um acordo com um colega de classe. Ele torna-se num amigo leal e permanece ao seu lado quando as coisas se complicam para Luca nos seus momentos mais sombrios.

title: Driven Underground
imdb_description: Directed by George Erschbamer.  With Kristy Swanson, Emily Tennant, Lochlyn Munro, Rick Ravanello. Single mother Sarah Palmer hides her family in Oregon when her daughter Christy becomes a key witness in a murder against the mob.
plot: Single mother Sarah Palmer hides her family in Oregon when her daughter Christy becomes a key witness in a murder against the mob.
actors: Kristy Swanson, Emily Tennant, Lochlyn Munro, Rick Ravanello
sapo_description: A jovem mãe Sarah Palmer esconde a sua família em Oregon quando a sua filha Christy se torna numa testemunha principal num homicídio contra a máfia. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: The Fan
imdb_description: Directed by Tony Scott.  With Robert De Niro, Wesley Snipes, Ellen Barkin, John Leguizamo. An all star baseball player becomes the unhealthy focus of a down on his luck salesman.
plot: An all star baseball player becomes the unhealthy focus of a down on his luck salesman.
actors: Robert De Niro, Wesley Snipes, Ellen Barkin, John Leguizamo
sapo_description: Gil Renard, um simples vendedor de facas, leva uma vida amargurada. A sua única paixão é o basebol. O seu ídolo, Bobby Rayburn, uma super estrela mediática que acabara de se transferir para a sua equipa de sonho, os Giants. Embora posto em causa pela imprensa e pelo público, Renard, vivendo intensamente o percurso do seu ídolo, não se apercebeu que a carreira de Rayburn estava em declínio. Classificação etária: M/16.

title: The Killing Machine
imdb_description: Directed by Dolph Lundgren.  With Dolph Lundgren, Stefanie von Pfetten, Samantha Ferris, David Lewis. A Soviet-trained assassin is determined to escape his double life as a hitman and as a husband-father.

sapo_description: Havia quem o conhecesse por ICARUS, mas a maioria conheciam-no como um pai divorciado que trabalhava numa empresa de investimentos. Edward Genn, nome de código ICARUS, é um assassino treinado do KGB que trabalhou durante anos como um agente adormecido da América. Mas quando o império Soviético ruiu, viu-se isolado num país estrangeiro. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: The Company You Keep
imdb_description: Directed by Robert Redford.  With Robert Redford, Brit Marling, Stanley Tucci, Nick Nolte. A former Weather Underground activist goes on the run from a journalist who has discovered his identity.

title: Foxcatcher
imdb_description: Directed by Bennett Miller.  With Steve Carell, Channing Tatum, Mark Ruffalo, Vanessa Redgrave. U.S. Olympic wrestling champions and brothers Mark Schultz and Dave Schultz join "Team Foxcatcher", led by eccentric multi-millionaire John du Pont, as they train for the 1988 Olympic Games in Seoul, South Korea, but John's self-destructive behavior threatens to consume them all.

title: Tango & Cash
imdb_description: Directed by Andrey Konchalovskiy, Albert Magnoli.  With Sylvester Stallone, Kurt Russell, Teri Hatcher, Jack Palance. Framed by their ruthless arch-nemesis, a mismatched LAPD crime-fighting duo has to put its differences aside to even the score with the evil kingpin who put them behind bars once and for all.
plot: Framed by their ruthless arch-nemesis, a mismatched LAPD crime-fighting duo has to put its differences aside to even the score with the evil kingpin who put them behind bars once and for all.

title: Best-Selling Murder
imdb_description: Directed by Michel Poulette.  With Vanessa Ray, Adam Korson, Tara Spencer-Nairn, Tyler Hynes. After getting dropped by her publisher, celebrated novelist Hannah Ryan uses the negative forces in her life to inspire the creation of a pulp crime serial that posts new chapters to subscriber's devices every week. The two ex will discover the joys of forced housemates.

title: Agnelli

title: Down with Love

title: Quigley Down Under
imdb_description: Directed by Simon Wincer.  With Tom Selleck, Laura San Giacomo, Alan Rickman, Chris Haywood. Sharpshooter Matt Quigley is hired from Wyoming by an Australian rancher paying a very high price. But when Quigley arrives Down Under, all is not as it seems.

Mas quando percebe que sua verdadeira missão é 'eliminar' os aborígines das terras de um rico e poderoso barão do gado (Alan Rickman), Quigley rechaça o trabalho e passa de caçador a caçado.

Paul insiste que não sejam trocadas quaisquer informações pessoais, e que a relação continue puramente carnal.
