title: Direct Contact
imdb_description: Direct Contact (2009) on IMDb: Movies, TV, Celebs, and more...
writer: Danny Lerner (story), Les Weldon (screenplay), Les Weldon (story)
plot: An American prisoner in a Russian jail is given a chance at freedom if he can rescue a kidnapped American woman.
actors: Dolph Lundgren, Gina May, Michael Paré, Bashar Rahal
sapo_description: Preso e condenado algures na Europa Oriental, Mike Riggins aceita resgatar uma americana raptada pela Mafia em troca da liberdade. Nem tudo é porém como parece.

title: Old Stone
imdb_description: Directed by Johnny Ma.  With Gang Chen, Nai An, Hongwei Wang, Zebin Zhang. A psychological thriller about a taxi driver battling bureaucracy and legal manipulation in China.
plot: A psychological thriller about a taxi driver battling bureaucracy and legal manipulation in China.
actors: Gang Chen, Nai An, Hongwei Wang, Zebin Zhang
sapo_description: Depois de um acidente que coloca um homem em coma, Lao Shi,um motorista de táxi vê-se absorvido pelo processo devastador das despesas do hospital e nas burocracias chinesas ao tentar trazer justiça e humanidade ao terrível acidente em que participou.

title: Die Hard 2
imdb_description: Die Hard 2 (1990) on IMDb: Movies, TV, Celebs, and more...
writer: Walter Wager (novel), Steven E. de Souza (screenplay), Doug Richardson (screenplay)
plot: John McClane attempts to avert disaster as rogue military operatives seize control of Dulles International Airport in Washington, D.C.
actors: Bruce Willis, Bonnie Bedelia, William Atherton, Reginald VelJohnson
sapo_description: Um grupo terrorista tenta libertar um Presidente latino-americano que é transportado de avião para ser julgado nos EUA. Um polícia tenta detê-los.

title: Loch Ness
imdb_description: Directed by John Henderson.  With Ted Danson, Joely Richardson, Ian Holm, Harris Yulin. A scientist tries to prove the existence of the Loch Ness monster.
plot: A scientist tries to prove the existence of the Loch Ness monster.
actors: Ted Danson, Joely Richardson, Ian Holm, Harris Yulin
sapo_description: Determinado a resolver o mistério do Monstro do Loch Ness, o zoólogo americano Dr. Jonathan Dempsey (Ted Danson) parte para a Escócia. Utilizando tecnologia super avançada, inspeciona as águas das Terras Altas escocesas em busca do famoso monstro. Enquanto a sua procura se mostra infrutífera, ele fica convencido de que Nessie é de facto um mito e prepara-se para voltar para casa.

title: Meet the Spartans
imdb_description: Directed by Jason Friedberg, Aaron Seltzer.  With Sean Maguire, Kevin Sorbo, Carmen Electra, Ken Davitian. The heroic Spartan king Leonidas, armed with nothing but leather underwear and a cape, leads a ragtag bunch of 13 Spartan misfit warriors to defend their homeland against thousands of invading Persians whom include the Ghost Rider, Rocky Balboa, the Autobots, and an ugly hunchbacked Paris Hilton and a shaved-head Brittany Spears.
plot: The heroic Spartan king Leonidas, armed with nothing but leather underwear and a cape, leads a ragtag bunch of 13 Spartan misfit warriors to defend their homeland against thousands of ...
actors: Sean Maguire, Carmen Electra, Ken Davitian, Kevin Sorbo
sapo_description: Dos criadores de 'Date Movie' e de dois dos seis argumentistas de 'Scary Movie - Um Susto de Filme' vem esta paródia hilariante aos épicos de espada e sandália.

title: Legally Blonde
imdb_description: Directed by Robert Luketic.  With Reese Witherspoon, Luke Wilson, Selma Blair, Matthew Davis. Elle Woods, a fashionable sorority queen is dumped by her boyfriend. She decides to follow him to law school, while she is there she figures out that there is more to her than just looks.
writer: Amanda Brown (novel), Karen McCullah (screenplay), Kirsten Smith (screenplay)
awards: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 6 wins & 10 nominations.
plot: Elle Woods, a fashionable sorority queen is dumped by her boyfriend. She decides to follow him to law school, while she is there she figures out that there is more to her than just looks.
actors: Reese Witherspoon, Luke Wilson, Selma Blair, Matthew Davis
sapo_description: Elle Woods (Reese Witherspoon) tem tudo. Ela é presidente da sua república de estudantes, é havaiana e exótica, é a Miss Junho no calendário do campus, e, acima de tudo, é loira natural. Ela namora com o rapaz mais giro do campus e não quer mais do que tornar-se sua mulher. Mas, há apenas uma coisa que impede Warner de (Matthew Davis) fazer a proposta: Elle é demasiado loira.

title: Rocky
imdb_description: Directed by John G. Avildsen.  With Sylvester Stallone, Talia Shire, Burt Young, Carl Weathers. A small-time boxer gets a supremely rare chance to fight a heavy-weight champion in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.
plot: A small-time boxer gets a supremely rare chance to fight a heavy-weight champion in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.
actors: Sylvester Stallone, Talia Shire, Burt Young, Carl Weathers
sapo_description: Rocky Balboa (Sylvester Stallone) é um lutador de um clube de Filadélfia que não parece ir a lado nenhum.

title: The Terminator
imdb_description: Directed by James Cameron.  With Arnold Schwarzenegger, Linda Hamilton, Michael Biehn, Paul Winfield. A seemingly indestructible android is sent from 2029 to 1984 to assassinate a waitress, whose unborn son will lead humanity in a war against the machines, while a soldier from that war is sent to protect her at all costs.
writer: James Cameron, Gale Anne Hurd, William Wisher (additional dialogue)
plot: A seemingly indestructible android is sent from 2029 to 1984 to assassinate a waitress, whose unborn son will lead humanity in a war against the machines, while a soldier from that war is sent to protect her at all costs.
actors: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Michael Biehn, Linda Hamilton, Paul Winfield
sapo_description: Este filme firmou a reputação do coautor/realizador James Cameron e solidificou o estrelato de Arnold Schwarzenegger. O filme começa num ano de 2029 pós-apocalíptico, em que Los Angeles foi praticamente reduzida a ruínas e é controlada por máquinas dominadoras, todo-poderosas. Kyle Reese (Michael Biehn), membro da resistência humana, é teletransportado para 1984.

title: 40 Days and 40 Nights
imdb_description: Directed by Michael Lehmann.  With Josh Hartnett, Shannyn Sossamon, Paulo Costanzo, Adam Trese. After a brutal break-up, a young man vows to stay celibate during the forty days of Lent, but finds the girl of his dreams and is unable to do anything about it.
plot: After a brutal break-up, a young man vows to stay celibate during the forty days of Lent, but finds the girl of his dreams and is unable to do anything about it.
actors: Josh Hartnett, Shannyn Sossamon, Paulo Costanzo, Adam Trese
sapo_description: Dos produtores de 'Notting Hill' e 'O Diário de Bridget Jones' temos a primeira comédia americana sobre sexo, sem sexo. Josh Hartnett ('Pearl Harbor', 'Cercados') faz o papel de Matt Sullivan, um jovem de vinte e poucos anos, bem parecido e inteligente, que está a tentar ganhar o controlo sobre a sua vida, depois de o ter perdido completamente devido ao fim do seu relacionamento amoroso.

title: Epic Movie
imdb_description: Directed by Jason Friedberg, Aaron Seltzer.  With Kal Penn, Jennifer Coolidge, Fred Willard, Adam Campbell. A comedic satire of films that are large in scope, reputation and popularity.
plot: A comedic satire of films that are large in scope, reputation and popularity.
actors: Kal Penn, Adam Campbell, Jennifer Coolidge, Jayma Mays
sapo_description: Este é um filme de proporções épicas. A história centra-se em quatro já não tão jovens órfãos: um criado por um curador no Louvre (onde se esconde um assassino albino); outro é refugiado do wrestling 'libre' mexicano; outro é uma vítima recente de cobras no avião; e o quarto é um residente 'normal' de uma comunidade-'X' mutante.

title: Date Movie
imdb_description: Directed by Aaron Seltzer, Jason Friedberg.  With Alyson Hannigan, Adam Campbell, Fred Willard, Jennifer Coolidge. Spoof of romantic comedies which focuses on a man, his crush, his parents, and her father.
plot: Spoof of romantic comedies which focuses on a man, his crush, his parents, and her father.
actors: Alyson Hannigan, Adam Campbell, Sophie Monk, Eddie Griffin
sapo_description: As mentes distorcidas de dois dos seis guionistas por trás de 'Scary Movie - Um Susto de Filme' (Aaron Seltzer e Jason Friedberg) fazem, desta vez, uma sátira ao género da comédia romântica. Esta é a história da romântica incurável Julia Jones (Alyson Hannigan) que conheceu finalmente o homem dos seus sonhos, o britânico genuíno Grant Funkyerdoder (Adam Campbell).

title: Decommissioned
imdb_description: Directed by Timothy Woodward Jr..  With Johnny Messner, Vinnie Jones, Estella Warren, James Remar. A retired agent's life is turned upside down when he discovers he's the patsy for an impending CIA planned presidential assassination.
plot: A retired agent's life is turned upside down when he discovers he's the patsy for an impending CIA planned presidential assassination.
actors: Johnny Messner, Vinnie Jones, Estella Warren, James Remar
sapo_description: John Niles (Johnny Messner, 'Operação Especial'), um ex-agente da CIA, está a tentar levar uma vida normal até que um dia agentes governamentais entram-lhe pela casa a dentro, raptam a sua esposa (Estella Warren) e filho, e torturam-no até que este aceite participar numa missão suicida. Eles querem que assassine o presidente (Robert Burgi), mas John não se verga facilmente.

title: Safe House
imdb_description: Directed by Daniel Espinosa.  With Denzel Washington, Ryan Reynolds, Robert Patrick, Vera Farmiga. A young CIA agent is tasked with looking after a fugitive in a safe house. But when the safe house is attacked, he finds himself on the run with his charge.
plot: A young CIA agent is tasked with looking after a fugitive in a safe house. But when the safe house is attacked, he finds himself on the run with his charge.
actors: Denzel Washington, Ryan Reynolds, Vera Farmiga, Brendan Gleeson
sapo_description: O vencedor de dois Óscares Denzel Washington ('Dia de Treino', 'Tempo de Glória') e Ryan Reynolds ('Green Lantern - Lanterna Verde', 'X-Men Origens: Wolverine') protagonizam este thriller cheio de ação. Washington faz o papel do maior traidor da CIA, que impressiona os serviços de inteligência quando é descoberto na África do Sul.

title: RoboCop 2
imdb_description: Directed by Irvin Kershner.  With Peter Weller, John Glover, Mario Machado, Leeza Gibbons. Cyborg law enforcer RoboCop returns to protect the citizens of old Detroit but faces a deadly challenge when a rogue OCP member secretly creates a new, evil RoboCop 2.
writer: Edward Neumeier (characters), Michael Miner (characters), Frank Miller (story), Frank Miller (screenplay), Walon Green (screenplay)
plot: Cyborg law enforcer RoboCop returns to protect the citizens of old Detroit but faces a deadly challenge when a rogue OCP member secretly creates a new, evil RoboCop 2.
actors: John Glover, Mario Machado, Leeza Gibbons, John Ingle
sapo_description: Detroit está submersa no caos e o caso complica-se devido a problemas num departamento policial e uma nova droga sintética, Nuke. Apenas o RoboCop (Peter Weller) pode parar a destruição.

title: Kingdom of Heaven
imdb_description: Directed by Ridley Scott.  With Orlando Bloom, Eva Green, Liam Neeson, Martin Hancock. Balian of Ibelin travels to Jerusalem during the Crusades of the 12th century, and there he finds himself as the defender of the city and its people.
plot: Balian of Ibelin travels to Jerusalem during the Crusades of the 12th century, and there he finds himself as the defender of the city and its people.
actors: Martin Hancock, Michael Sheen, Nathalie Cox, Eriq Ebouaney
sapo_description: Balian é um humilde ferreiro francês à procura de uma razão para viver depois da morte da mulher e do filho. Quando um conceituado nobre do reino de Jerusalém lhe confessa ser o seu pai, Balian junta-se a ele na sua sagrada missão de proteger a Terra Santa.

title: Chappie
imdb_description: Directed by Neill Blomkamp.  With Sharlto Copley, Dev Patel, Hugh Jackman, Sigourney Weaver. In the near future, crime is patrolled by a mechanized police force. When one police droid, Chappie, is stolen and given new programming, he becomes the first robot with the ability to think and feel for himself.
plot: In the near future, crime is patrolled by a mechanized police force. When one police droid, Chappie, is stolen and given new programming, he becomes the first robot with the ability to think and feel for himself.
actors: Sharlto Copley, Dev Patel, Ninja, Yo-Landi Visser
sapo_description: Joanesburgo, África do Sul. Num futuro próximo, a polícia transformou-se numa força opressora robotizada que defende os interesses governamentais, sem olhar para as injustiças e dramas da população. É então que é criado um 'robot' dotado de uma programação mais avançada. Chappie 'nasce' assim para a vida como uma criança, capaz de aprender.

title: Annapolis
imdb_description: Directed by Justin Lin.  With James Franco, Jordana Brewster, Tyrese Gibson, Donnie Wahlberg. Set against the backdrop of boxing at the Naval Academy, centers on a young man from the wrong side of the tracks whose dream of attending Annapolis becomes a reality.
plot: Set against the backdrop of boxing at the Naval Academy, centers on a young man from the wrong side of the tracks whose dream of attending Annapolis becomes a reality.
actors: James Franco, Macka Foley, Jim Parrack, Donnie Wahlberg
sapo_description: Após conseguir uma vaga na cobiçada Academia Naval de Annapolis, Jake Huard acreditava que todos os seus sonhos tinham se realizado. Sem nada a perder, ele decide participar do violento torneio de boxe da Marinha, conhecido como The Brigade Championships, onde enfrentará seu arquirrival Cole.

title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
imdb_description: Directed by Steven Spielberg.  With Harrison Ford, Sean Connery, Alison Doody, Denholm Elliott. In 1938, after his father Professor Henry Jones, Sr. goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, Indiana Jones finds himself up against Adolf Hitler's Nazis again to stop them obtaining its powers.
writer: Jeffrey Boam (screenplay), George Lucas (story), Menno Meyjes (story), George Lucas (characters), Philip Kaufman (characters)
plot: In 1938, after his father Professor Henry Jones, Sr. goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, Indiana Jones finds himself up against Adolf Hitler's Nazis again to stop them obtaining its powers.
imdb_title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade (1989)
sapo_title: Indiana Jones e a Grande Cruzada
actors: Harrison Ford, Sean Connery, Denholm Elliott, Alison Doody
sapo_description: O pai de Indiana Jones, incansável perseguidor da lenda do Santo Graal, desaparece. A procura do pai e do Santo Graal lançam Indiana em mais uma aventura.

title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
imdb_description: Directed by Marc Webb.  With Andrew Garfield, Emma Stone, Jamie Foxx, Paul Giamatti. When New York is put under siege by Oscorp, it is up to Spider-Man to save the city he swore to protect as well as his loved ones.
writer: Alex Kurtzman (screenplay), Roberto Orci (screenplay), Jeff Pinkner (screenplay), Alex Kurtzman (screen story), Roberto Orci (screen story), Jeff Pinkner (screen story), James Vanderbilt (screen story), Stan Lee (Marvel comic book), Steve Ditko (Marvel comic book)

actors: Andrew Garfield, Emma Stone, Jamie Foxx, Dane DeHaan
sapo_description: Max num laboratório da OsCorp, perde o equilíbrio e cai num tanque com enguias elétricas geneticamente modificadas. Ao ser atacado, ele transforma-se num gerador elétrico vivo. Max vagueia na Times Square e acidentalmente provoca um apagão. O Homem-Aranha tenta acalmá-lo, mas a polícia atira nele, fazendo-o perder a cabeça e atacar.

title: Hart's War
imdb_description: Directed by Gregory Hoblit.  With Bruce Willis, Colin Farrell, Terrence Howard, Cole Hauser. A law student becomes a lieutenant during World War II, is captured and asked to defend a black prisoner of war falsely accused of murder.
writer: John Katzenbach (novel), Billy Ray (screenplay), Terry George (screenplay)
plot: A law student becomes a lieutenant during World War II, is captured and asked to defend a black prisoner of war falsely accused of murder.
actors: Bruce Willis, Colin Farrell, Terrence Howard, Cole Hauser
sapo_description: Tommy Hart, estudante de direito, alista-se no exército para combater ao lado dos aliados, durante a 2ª Guerra Mundial e terá de defender um prisioneiro negro acusado do homicídio de um prisioneiro branco.

title: Metro
imdb_description: Directed by Thomas Carter.  With Eddie Murphy, Michael Rapaport, Kim Miyori, Art Evans. A Hostage Negotiator teams up with a Sharpshooter to bring down a dangerous jewel thief.
plot: A Hostage Negotiator teams up with a Sharpshooter to bring down a dangerous jewel thief.
actors: Eddie Murphy, Kim Miyori, Art Evans, James Carpenter
sapo_description: Scott Roper trabalha no Departamento da Polícia como negociador em raptos de reféns. Quando um perigoso ladrão de bancos mata o seu colega e melhor amigo, Roper não hesitará em fazer tudo o que esteja nas suas mãos para o apanhar.

title: Armored
imdb_description: Directed by Nimród Antal.  With Columbus Short, Matt Dillon, Laurence Fishburne, Jean Reno. A newbie guard for an armored truck company is coerced by his veteran coworkers to steal a truck containing $42 million. But a wrinkle in their supposedly foolproof plan divides the group, leading to a potentially deadly resolution.
plot: A newbie guard for an armored truck company is coerced by his veteran coworkers to steal a truck containing $42 million. But a wrinkle in their supposedly foolproof plan divides the group, leading to a potentially deadly resolution.
actors: Matt Dillon, Jean Reno, Laurence Fishburne, Amaury Nolasco
sapo_description: Um jovem guarda tem de vigiar uma carrinha blindada e, forçado pelos seus problemas económicos, decide aceitar a oferta dos seus veteranos para roubar as carrinhas, que contêm 42 milhões de dólares. No entanto, uma mudança de planos de última hora, divide o grupo.

title: Big Momma's House
imdb_description: Directed by Raja Gosnell.  With Martin Lawrence, Nia Long, Paul Giamatti, Jascha Washington. In order to protect a beautiful woman and her son from a robber, a male FBI agent disguises himself as a large grandmother.
writer: Darryl Quarles (story), Darryl Quarles (screenplay), Don Rhymer (screenplay)
plot: In order to protect a beautiful woman and her son from a robber, a male FBI agent disguises himself as a large grandmother.
actors: Martin Lawrence, Nia Long, Paul Giamatti, Jascha Washington
sapo_description: Martin Lawrence é o talentoso agente do FBI Malcom Turner que está disposto a tudo para apanhar um criminoso foragido. Nia Long é Sherry, a antiga paixão do homem perseguido. Ao viajar para a Georgia, para visitar a sua avó, Sherry vai encontrar Malcom disfarçado como esta, uma senhora de armas do sul.

title: Son of the Pink Panther
imdb_description: Directed by Blake Edwards.  With Roberto Benigni, Herbert Lom, Claudia Cardinale, Shabana Azmi. Charles Dreyfus encounters Jacques Gambrelli, who reminds him painfully of Inspector Clouseau, the man who drove him insane. With good reason: Gambrelli is Clouseau's son.
writer: Maurice Richlin (characters), Blake Edwards (characters), Blake Edwards (story), Blake Edwards (screenplay), Madeline Sunshine (screenplay), Steven Sunshine (screenplay)
plot: Charles Dreyfus encounters Jacques Gambrelli, who reminds him painfully of Inspector Clouseau, the man who drove him insane. With good reason: Gambrelli is Clouseau's son.
actors: Roberto Benigni, Herbert Lom, Claudia Cardinale, Shabana Azmi
sapo_description: A princesa árabe Yasmin é raptada na França por terroristas que são contra seu pai, o Rei de Lugash. O inspetor Dreyfus é então chamado para cuidar do caso, e ao chegar na França, ele é atropelado por um desajeito patrulheiro chamado Jacques Gambrelli.

title: The Lone Ranger
imdb_description: Directed by Gore Verbinski.  With Johnny Depp, Armie Hammer, William Fichtner, Tom Wilkinson. Native American warrior Tonto recounts the untold tales that transformed John Reid, a man of the law, into a legend of justice.
writer: Justin Haythe (screenplay), Ted Elliott (screenplay), Terry Rossio (screenplay), Ted Elliott (screen story), Terry Rossio (screen story), Justin Haythe (screen story)
awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 4 wins & 17 nominations.
plot: Native American warrior Tonto recounts the untold tales that transformed John Reid, a man of the law, into a legend of justice.
actors: Johnny Depp, Armie Hammer, William Fichtner, Tom Wilkinson
sapo_description: Tonto, um nativo Americano de espírito guerreiro, relata as histórias inéditas que transformaram John Reid, um homem da lei, num lendário justiceiro - levando o público numa corrida desenfreada por entre surpresas épicas e momentos de tensão humorística, enquanto estes dois heróis improváveis, aprendem a trabalhar juntos no combate à ganância e corrupção.

title: Bullet
imdb_description: Directed by Nick Lyon.  With Danny Trejo, Jonathan Banks, Julia Dietze, John Savage. A tough cop takes the law into his own hands when his grandson is kidnapped.
writer: Nick Lyon, Ron Peer, Byron Lester, Matthew Joynes, Charlie Shahnaian
plot: A tough cop takes the law into his own hands when his grandson is kidnapped.
actors: Danny Trejo, Jonathan Banks, Julia Dietze, John Savage
sapo_description: Frank Marasco, um investigador, acaba entrando no caminho do cartel Kane e prende um dos integrantes. E como forma de inverter o jogo Carlito Kane e Manual Kane tomam uma decisão ousada: sequestrar a filha do governador da Califórnia e o neto de Frank, Mario. Agora, o policial terá que passar por cima de algumas leis para salvá-los.

title: Bad Boys II
imdb_description: Directed by Michael Bay.  With Will Smith, Martin Lawrence, Gabrielle Union, Jordi Mollà. Two loose-cannon narcotics cops investigate the flow of Ecstasy into Florida from a Cuban drug cartel.
writer: George Gallo (characters), Marianne Wibberley (story), Cormac Wibberley (story), Ron Shelton (story), Ron Shelton (screenplay), Jerry Stahl (screenplay)
plot: Two loose-cannon narcotics cops investigate the flow of Ecstasy into Florida from a Cuban drug cartel.
actors: Martin Lawrence, Will Smith, Jordi Mollà, Gabrielle Union
sapo_description: Dois polícias do departamento de narcóticos investigam a invasão de Extasy na Flórida.

title: Entrapment
imdb_description: Directed by Jon Amiel.  With Sean Connery, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Ving Rhames, Will Patton. An insurance agent is sent by her employer to track down and help capture an art thief.
writer: Ronald Bass (story), Michael Hertzberg (story), Ronald Bass (screenplay), William Broyles Jr. (screenplay)
plot: An insurance agent is sent by her employer to track down and help capture an art thief.
actors: Sean Connery, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Ving Rhames, Will Patton
sapo_description: Quando o conceituado ladrão de arte Robert McDougal se encontra apanhado na rede de intriga internacional montada por Gin Baker, uma investigadora de seguros, o palco está montado quer para o maior assalto quer para a maior operação policial da história.

title: The Princess Diaries 2: Royal Engagement
imdb_description: Directed by Garry Marshall.  With Anne Hathaway, Callum Blue, Julie Andrews, Hector Elizondo. Now settled in Genovia, Princess Mia faces a new revelation: she is being primed for an arranged marriage to an English suitor.
writer: Meg Cabot (characters), Gina Wendkos (story), Shonda Rhimes (story), Shonda Rhimes (screenplay)
plot: Now settled in Genovia, Princess Mia faces a new revelation: she is being primed for an arranged marriage to an English suitor.
sapo_title: O Diário da Princesa: Noivado Real
actors: Anne Hathaway, Julie Andrews, Hector Elizondo, John Rhys-Davies
sapo_description: Cinco anos após Mia decidir por se tornar a princesa de Genóvia, ela se muda para o palácio real. Logo ela é informada que não permanecerá como princesa por muito tempo, já que em breve terá que ser coroada rainha. Como a legislação genoviana estabelece que as futuras rainhas devem se casar antes de serem empossadas ao cargo, uma legião de pretendentes surge repentinamente na vida de Mia.

title: Eyjafjallajökull
imdb_description: Directed by Alexandre Coffre.  With Valérie Bonneton, Dany Boon, Denis Ménochet, Albert Delpy. For travelers around the world, the eruption of the Icelandic volcano Eyjafjallajökull is a downer. For Alain and Valerie, it's a catastrophe. For if they are to make it in time to the tiny Greek village where their daughter's wedding is taking place, the two divorcees have to swallow their pathological hatred for each other and hit the road together.
writer: Laurent Zeitoun (screenplay), Yoann Gromb (screenplay), Alexandre Coffre (screenplay), Yoann Gromb (original idea)
plot: For travelers around the world, the eruption of the Icelandic volcano Eyjafjallajökull is a downer. For Alain and Valerie, it's a catastrophe. For if they are to make it in time to the tiny...
actors: Valérie Bonneton, Dany Boon, Denis Ménochet, Albert Delpy
sapo_description: Para os viajantes de todo o mundo, a erupção do vulcão islandês Eyjafjallajökull foi uma fatalidade. Mas para Alain e Valérie foi uma “dupla Catástrofe”. Para chegarem a tempo à pequena cidade da Grécia onde se vai realizar o casamento da sua filha, este casal de divorciados, que se odeiam mutuamente, é obrigado pela força da ocasião a fazer a viagem juntos.

title: The Next Karate Kid
imdb_description: Directed by Christopher Cain.  With Pat Morita, Hilary Swank, Michael Ironside, Constance Towers. Mr. Miyagi is back and he takes a new pupil under his wing; a troubled adolescent girl.
plot: Mr. Miyagi is back and he takes a new pupil under his wing; a troubled adolescent girl.
actors: Pat Morita, Hilary Swank, Michael Ironside, Constance Towers
sapo_description: Julie perdeu os seus pais quando era apenas uma menina. Hoje vive com um ancião japonês, amigo da sua avó, e tem problemas com um grupo de rapazes da escola que brincam a defender o país de inimigos e que já não respeitam a velha ordem.

title: The Corpse of Anna Fritz
imdb_description: Directed by Hèctor Hernández Vicens.  With Alba Ribas, Cristian Valencia, Albert Carbó, Bernat Saumell. Anna Fritz, a famous and beautiful actress, has died recently. Three young men sneak into the morgue to see her naked, fascinated by her beauty.
writer: Isaac P. Creus, Hèctor Hernández Vicens
plot: Anna Fritz, a famous and beautiful actress, has died recently. Three young men sneak into the morgue to see her naked, fascinated by her beauty.
actors: Alba Ribas, Cristian Valencia, Albert Carbó, Bernat Saumell
sapo_description: Anna Fritz é uma atriz linda e famosa, que acabou de morrer e cujo corpo vai para a morgue. Três jovens decidem ir ver o corpo nu da artista, mas acabam por não resistir à tentação e como resultado mergulham num inferno sem igual, do qual será muito difícil sair.

title: Mary Shelley's Frankenstein
imdb_description: Directed by Kenneth Branagh.  With Robert De Niro, Kenneth Branagh, Helena Bonham Carter, Tom Hulce. When the brilliant but unorthodox scientist Dr. Victor Frankenstein rejects the artificial man that he has created, the Creature escapes and later swears revenge.
writer: Mary Shelley (novel), Steph Lady (screenplay), Frank Darabont (screenplay)
plot: When the brilliant but unorthodox scientist Dr. Victor Frankenstein rejects the artificial man that he has created, the Creature escapes and later swears revenge.

title: Le père Noël

Victor then follows him, and they embark on an unexpected adventure that will change their lives.

title: Norman
imdb_description: Directed by Joseph Cedar.  With Richard Gere, Lior Ashkenazi, Michael Sheen, Steve Buscemi. Norman Oppenheimer is a small time operator who befriends a young politician at a low point in his life. Three years later, when the politician becomes an influential world leader, Norman's life dramatically changes for better and worse.

title: Malapata
imdb_description: Directed by Diogo Morgado.  With Luciana Abreu, Helder Agapito, René Barbosa, Mário Bomba. Two friends who win the lottery have the worst day of their lives with constant bad luck and unexpected turn of events.
plot: Two friends who win the lottery have the worst day of their lives with constant bad luck and unexpected turn of events.

title: Knock Off
imdb_description: Directed by Hark Tsui.  With Jean-Claude Van Damme, Rob Schneider, Lela Rochon, Paul Sorvino. Action star Jean Claude Van Damme plays a fashion designer who must join forces with a C.I.A. agent to combat terrorism.
plot: Action star Jean Claude Van Damme plays a fashion designer who must join forces with a C.I.A. agent to combat terrorism.

Quando tenta provar que está inocente de falsificar mercadoria esbarra com uma conspiração da mafia russa, que tenta colocar no mercado negro do terrorismo internacional uma nova arma: uma micro- bomba.

title: Inception
imdb_description: Directed by Christopher Nolan.  With Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Ellen Page, Ken Watanabe. A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.
plot: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.
actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Ellen Page, Tom Hardy

title: Green Zone
imdb_description: Directed by Paul Greengrass.  With Matt Damon, Jason Isaacs, Greg Kinnear, Igal Naor. Discovering covert and faulty intelligence causes a U.S. Army officer to go rogue as he hunts for Weapons of Mass Destruction in an unstable region.

title: The Calling

plot: Detective Hazel Micallef hasn't had much to worry about in the sleepy town of Fort Dundas until a string of gruesome murders in the surrounding countryside brings her face to face with a serial killer driven by a higher calling.

sapo_description: A detetive Hazel Micallef não tem tido muito com que se preocupar na pacata cidadezinha de Fort Dundas até que uma série de crimes sangrentos a confronta com “serial killers” motivados por um chamamento superior.

title: Jarhead

A psychological study of operations desert shield and desert storm during the gulf war; through the eyes of a U.S marine sniper who struggles to cope with the possibility his girlfriend may be cheating on him back home.

title: Rush Hour 2
imdb_description: Directed by Brett Ratner.  With Jackie Chan, Chris Tucker, John Lone, Ziyi Zhang. Carter and Lee head to Hong Kong for vacation, but become embroiled in a counterfeit money scam.

sapo_description: James Carter, detetive da polícia de Los Angeles, chega de férias a Hong Kong para visitar o seu amigo Lee, inspetor chefe da polícia local. Só que em vez de descanso, acabam por enfrentar uma rede de contrabando que produz e a coloca em circulação milhões de dólares falsos de alta qualidade.

title: Heaven Is for Real
imdb_description: Directed by Randall Wallace.  With Greg Kinnear, Kelly Reilly, Thomas Haden Church, Connor Corum. A small-town father must find the courage and conviction to share his son's extraordinary, life-changing experience with the world.

title: Wedding Crashers
imdb_description: Directed by David Dobkin.  With Owen Wilson, Vince Vaughn, Rachel McAdams, Christopher Walken. John Beckwith and Jeremy Grey, a pair of committed womanizers who sneak into weddings to take advantage of the romantic tinge in the air, find themselves at odds with one another when John meets and falls for Claire Cleary.

Só que tudo muda quando um deles se apaixona a sério e eles têm de fazer tudo para que as suas mentiras não sejam descobertas.

title: Nowhere in Moravia
imdb_description: Directed by Miroslav Krobot.  With Tatiana Vilhelmová, Lenka Krobotová, Johana Tesarová, Ivan Trojan. German teacher Maruna runs the local pub. It doesn't look like she'll ever get married, since there aren't many suitable men in her small village. But one day, something unexpected happens here, Nowhere in Moravia.
plot: German teacher Maruna runs the local pub. It doesn't look like she'll ever get married, since there aren't many suitable men in her small village. But one day, something unexpected happens here, Nowhere in Moravia.

title: Cigarettes et bas nylon
imdb_description: Directed by Fabrice Cazeneuve.  With Adélaïde Leroux, Salomé Stévenin, Mélodie Richard, Yeelem Jappain. Eles foram transformados às pressas em campos de trânsito para as esposas francesas de alguns desses soldados, ajudando-as com suas tarefas administrativas e ensinando-lhes a como se tornar em esposas americanas perfeitas.

title: Assassinée
imdb_description: Directed by Thierry Binisti.  With Patricia Kaas, Serge Hazanavicius, Marie Vincent, Jean-Paul Comart. Cathy has been preparing herself since early morning. She is about to celebrate her daughter Eva's 20th birthday. But on this very day, Cathy's life is turned upside-down with the shocking news that her daughter has been murdered. At first devastated and lost when faced with the workings of the police and the justice system, Cathy becomes determined to fight to know the truth...

title: The Transporter
imdb_description: Directed by Louis Leterrier, Corey Yuen.  With Jason Statham, Qi Shu, Matt Schulze, François Berléand. Frank is hired to "transport" packages for unknown clients and has made a very good living doing so. But when asked to move a package that begins moving, complications arise.

Mas no seu último carregamento, uma mulher atraente, raptada por uma rede internacional de tráfico de escravos, provoca complicações mortíferas aos seus planos de entrega. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Source Code
imdb_description: Directed by Duncan Jones.  With Jake Gyllenhaal, Michelle Monaghan, Vera Farmiga, Jeffrey Wright. A soldier wakes up in someone else's body and discovers he's part of an experimental government program to find the bomber of a commuter train. A mission he has only 8 minutes to complete.
plot: A soldier wakes up in someone else's body and discovers he's part of an experimental government program to find the bomber of a commuter train. A mission he has only 8 minutes to complete.
actors: Jake Gyllenhaal, Michelle Monaghan, Vera Farmiga, Jeffrey Wright

title: 8MM
imdb_description: Directed by Joel Schumacher.  With Nicolas Cage, Joaquin Phoenix, James Gandolfini, Peter Stormare. A private investigator is hired to discover if a "snuff film" is authentic or not.

title: Are You My Daughter?
imdb_description: Directed by Karen McKinnon.  With Nicolas Billon, Marie-Sohna Condé, Fanny de Geyer d'Orth, Destin Lenord. Two friends get kidnapped by one of their ex-boyfriends. He wants revenge for being dumped and blames her best friend for interfering. Tony, a British gangster, warned Lin he would kill her if she dumped him. Lin, young and naive, never took this as a serious threat. Sinwa, her best friend, pleads with Lin to dump Tony. The action unfolds in the backstreets of Paris. Will Lin pay the ultimate ...

sapo_description: Laura Renton, nos 40, fica radiante quando a sua filha Zoe, de 20 anos, regressa para ela após ser raptada há anos atrás - mas será Zoe realmente a sua filha perdida? Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Joy
imdb_description: Directed by David O. Russell.  With Jennifer Lawrence, Robert De Niro, Bradley Cooper, Edgar Ramírez. Joy is the story of the title character, who rose to become founder and matriarch of a powerful family business dynasty.

Porém, ao mesmo tempo que ganha notoriedade e se transforma numa das mais bem-sucedidas empresárias dos EUA, vê-se obrigada a enfrentar a traição, a falsidade e a falta de generosidade dos que lhe são próximos. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: The Gilded Cage

Everybody loves this nice couple of Portuguese immigrants, Mario for being a topnotch caretaker, José, a construction site supervisor by trade, for helping to do all kinds of jobs in the house. Este casal de imigrantes portugueses é querido por todos no bairro: Maria uma excelente porteira e José um trabalhador da construção civil fora de série. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Seabiscuit
imdb_description: Directed by Gary Ross.  With Tobey Maguire, Jeff Bridges, Elizabeth Banks, Chris Cooper. True story of the undersized Depression-era racehorse whose victories lifted not only the spirits of the team behind it but also those of their nation.

Johnny 'Red' Pollard é um jovem desiludido que sabe montar a cavalo, mas que ganha a vida nos ringues de boxe; Charles Howard é um milionário que perdeu tudo depois da morte do filho; e Tom Smith é um cowboy que está a ver o seu mundo desaparecer. Classificação etária: M/6.

title: Transporter 2
imdb_description: Directed by Louis Leterrier.  With Jason Statham, Amber Valletta, Kate Nauta, Alessandro Gassman. Mercenary Frank Martin, who specializes moving goods of all kinds, surfaces again this time in Miami, Florida when he's implicated in the kidnapping of the young son of a powerful USA official.

Frank afeiçoou-se ao filho mais novo dos patrões, por isso, quando o rapaz é raptado, o ex-agente volta à sua antiga profissão para deslindar o plano dos raptores e salvá-lo. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Homefront
imdb_description: Directed by Gary Fleder.  With Jason Statham, James Franco, Winona Ryder, Kate Bosworth. A former DEA agent moves his family to a quiet town, where he soon tangles with a local meth druglord.

No entanto o mundo de Broker fica rapidamente em conflito assim que descobre um submundo de drogas e violência escondido na pequena cidade, liderado por Gator Bodine, um sociopata dealer de anfetaminas. Classificação etária: M/16.

title: Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time
imdb_description: Directed by Mike Newell.  With Jake Gyllenhaal, Gemma Arterton, Ben Kingsley, Alfred Molina. A young fugitive prince and princess must stop a villain who unknowingly threatens to destroy the world with a special dagger that enables the magic sand inside to reverse time.

Sem família, sozinho e abandonado à sua sorte, vagueia pelas ruas sobrevivendo graças apenas à generosidade alheia. Para aquela criança, cada dia é uma aventura e sobreviver um enorme desafio. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Rampart
imdb_description: Directed by Oren Moverman.  With Woody Harrelson, Ben Foster, Sigourney Weaver, Jon Bernthal. Set in 1999 Los Angeles, veteran police officer Dave Brown, the last of the renegade cops, works to take care of his family, and struggles for his own survival.

title: Swelter
imdb_description: Directed by Keith Parmer.  With Jean-Claude Van Damme, Greg Vrotsos, Abby Miller, Alfred Molina. Ten years after their casino heist, four escaped convicts trace their former partner to a desert town, where he is now a lawman with no memory of his criminal past.

title: Christmas with the Kranks
imdb_description: Directed by Joe Roth.  With Tim Allen, Jamie Lee Curtis, Dan Aykroyd, M. Emmet Walsh. With their daughter away, the Kranks decide to skip Christmas altogether until she decides to come home, causing an uproar when they have to celebrate the holiday at the last minute.
plot: With their daughter away, the Kranks decide to skip Christmas altogether until she decides to come home, causing an uproar when they have to celebrate the holiday at the last minute.

title: Earth to Echo
imdb_description: Directed by Dave Green.  With Teo Halm, Astro, Reese Hartwig, Ella Wahlestedt. After receiving a bizarre series of encrypted messages, a group of kids embark on an adventure with an alien who needs their help.
writer: Henry Gayden (screenplay by), Henry Gayden (story by), Andrew Panay (story by)

title: Zookeeper
imdb_description: Directed by Frank Coraci.  With Kevin James, Rosario Dawson, Leslie Bibb, Ken Jeong. A group of zoo animals decide to break their code of silence in order to help their lovable zookeeper find love, without opting to leave his current job for something more illustrious.
writer: Nick Bakay (screenplay), Rock Reuben (screenplay), Kevin James (screenplay), Jay Scherick (screenplay), David Ronn (screenplay), Jay Scherick (story), David Ronn (story)

title: S.W.A.T.
imdb_description: Directed by Clark Johnson.  With Samuel L. Jackson, Colin Farrell, Michelle Rodriguez, LL Cool J. An imprisoned drug kingpin offers a huge cash reward to anyone that can break him out of police custody and only the LAPD's Special Weapons and Tactics team can prevent it.

title: Biker Boyz

plot: A son of the leader of a legendary group of an urban biker gang tries to retain his championship title.

title: Stolen
imdb_description: Directed by Anders Anderson.  With Jon Hamm, Josh Lucas, Rhona Mitra, James Van Der Beek. A detective deals with the loss of his own son while trying to uncover the identity of a boy whose mummified remains are found in a box buried for fifty years.
plot: A detective deals with the loss of his own son while trying to uncover the identity of a boy whose mummified remains are found in a box buried for fifty years.

imdb_description: Directed by Aaron B. Koontz.  With Christopher Denham, Nadja Bobyleva, Catherine Curtin, Chase Williamson. A veteran war photographer with PTSD sees imminent deaths in his developed photos, questioning his already fragile sanity and putting the lives of those he loves in danger.
plot: A veteran war photographer with PTSD sees imminent deaths in his developed photos, questioning his already fragile sanity and putting the lives of those he loves in danger.
actors: Christopher Denham, Nadja Bobyleva, Catherine Curtin, Chase Williamson
sapo_description: Um fotógrafo veterano de guerra - a sofrer de stress pós traumático - vê mortes iminentes nas fotografias que revela, levando-o a questionar a sua já débil sanidade e colocando as vidas dos que ama em perigo.

title: Rings
imdb_description: Directed by F. Javier Gutiérrez.  With Matilda Anna Ingrid Lutz, Alex Roe, Johnny Galecki, Vincent D'Onofrio. A young woman finds herself on the receiving end of a terrifying curse that threatens to take her life in 7 days.
writer: David Loucka (screenplay by), Jacob Estes (screenplay by), Akiva Goldsman (screenplay by), David Loucka (story by), Jacob Estes (story by), Kôji Suzuki (based on the novel "The Ring" by)
plot: A young woman finds herself on the receiving end of a terrifying curse that threatens to take her life in 7 days.

sapo_description: Neste novo capítulo de Ring, uma jovem preocupa-se com o namorado quando ele decide explorar a subcultura que envolve uma misteriosa cassete de vídeo, dizendo-se que quem a vê, morre sete dias depois.

title: Pulp Fiction
imdb_description: Directed by Quentin Tarantino.  With John Travolta, Uma Thurman, Samuel L. Jackson, Bruce Willis. The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.
writer: Quentin Tarantino (stories), Roger Avary (stories), Quentin Tarantino
plot: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

sapo_description: Jules Winnfield e Vincent Vega são dois assassinos que pretendem recuperar uma mala roubada do chefe, o chefe da mafia Marsellus Wallace. Wallace também pediu ao Vincent para tomar conta da mulher Mia enquanto ele estiver fora da cidade. Butch Coolidge é um pugilista envelhecido que é pago por Wallace para perder o próximo combate.

title: Kindergarten Cop
imdb_description: Directed by Ivan Reitman.  With Arnold Schwarzenegger, Penelope Ann Miller, Pamela Reed, Linda Hunt. A tough cop must pose as a kindergarten teacher in order to locate a dangerous criminal's ex-wife, who may hold the key to putting him behind bars.
writer: Murray Salem (story), Murray Salem (screenplay), Herschel Weingrod (screenplay), Timothy Harris (screenplay)
plot: A tough cop must pose as a kindergarten teacher in order to locate a dangerous criminal's ex-wife, who may hold the key to putting him behind bars.
actors: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Penelope Ann Miller, Pamela Reed, Linda Hunt
sapo_description: Arnold Schwarzenegger está no seu melhor no papel de um durão detetive de Los Angeles, John Kimble, que tem como missão encontrar a mulher de um senhor da droga (Penelope Ann Miller) para que esta testemunhe em tribunal. Apenas conhecendo o nome da escola primária onde o filho do criminoso anda, Kimble terá de trabalhar à paisana...

title: Contraband
imdb_description: Directed by Baltasar Kormákur.  With Mark Wahlberg, Giovanni Ribisi, Kate Beckinsale, Robert Wahlberg. To protect his brother-in-law from a drug lord, a former smuggler heads to Panama to score millions of dollars in counterfeit bills.
writer: Aaron Guzikowski (screenplay), Arnaldur Indriðason (film "Reykjavik-Rotterdam"), Óskar Jónasson (film "Reykjavik-Rotterdam")

sapo_description: Chris Farraday (Mark Wahlberg) abandonou há muito a sua vida de crime, mas depois do seu cunhado, Andy (Caleb Landry Jones), arruinar um negócio de droga ao seu impiedoso patrão, Tim Briggs (Giovanni Ribisi), Chris vê-se obrigado a voltar àquilo que melhor faz -- contrabandear -- para saldar a dívida de Andy.

title: Red
imdb_description: Directed by Trygve Allister Diesen, Lucky McKee.  With Brian Cox, Noel Fisher, Kyle Gallner, Shiloh Fernandez. A reclusive man sets out for justice and redemption when three troublesome teens kill his dog for no good reason.
plot: A reclusive man sets out for justice and redemption when three troublesome teens kill his dog for no good reason.

sapo_description: Avery Allan Ludlow é um homem solitário. A sua única companhia, um cão de 14 anos apropriadamente chamado Red, é o centro do seu mundo. Um dia, tudo parece estar a correr bem no seu local de pesca favorito, quando surgem três rapazes com as suas espingardas. Num instante, o seu companheiro de uma vida parte, vítima de um ato malévolo e mesquinho.

title: Midnight's Children
imdb_description: Directed by Deepa Mehta.  With Rajat Kapoor, Vansh Bhardwaj, Anupam Kher, Neha Mahajan. A pair of children, born within moments of India gaining independence from Britain, grow up in the country that is nothing like their parent's generation.

sapo_description: Em cima da meia-noite de 15 de agosto de 1947, quando a Índia declara independência da Grã-Bretanha, dois recém-nascidos são trocados por uma enfermeira, num hospital de Bombaim.

title: The Diary of a Teenage Girl
imdb_description: Directed by Marielle Heller.  With Bel Powley, Alexander Skarsgård, Kristen Wiig, Christopher Meloni. A teen artist living in 1970s San Francisco enters into an affair with her mother's boyfriend.
plot: A teen artist living in 1970s San Francisco enters into an affair with her mother's boyfriend.
imdb_title: The Diary of a Teenage Girl (2015)
sapo_title: O Diário de uma Rapariga Adolescente

sapo_description: Minnie Goetze é uma garota de 15 anos aspirante a artista de histórias em quadrinho, amadurecendo em plena década de 1970 em São Francisco. Insaciavelmente curiosa pelo mundo ao redor dela, Minnie é uma típica jovem adolescente. Exceto pelo fato de dormir com o namorado da mãe dela.

title: An Education
imdb_description: Directed by Lone Scherfig.  With Carey Mulligan, Peter Sarsgaard, Alfred Molina, Olivia Williams. A coming-of-age story about a teenage girl in 1960s suburban London, and how her life changes with the arrival of a playboy nearly twice her age.

title: A United Kingdom
imdb_description: Directed by Amma Asante.  With David Oyelowo, Rosamund Pike, Tom Felton, Jack Davenport. The story of King Seretse Khama of Botswana and how his loving but controversial marriage to a British white woman, Ruth Williams, put his kingdom into political and diplomatic turmoil.

sapo_description: Seretse Khama, primeiro presidente do Botswana, causa uma polêmica de proporções nacionais ao se casar com uma mulher branca.

title: Joe Somebody
imdb_description: Directed by John Pasquin.  With Tim Allen, Julie Bowen, Kelly Lynch, Greg Germann. When Joe is beat up by a co-worker in front of his daughter on "Bring Your Child To Work Day", he decides to fight back.
plot: When Joe is beat up by a co-worker in front of his daughter on "Bring Your Child To Work Day", he decides to fight back.

title: The Faculty
imdb_description: Directed by Robert Rodriguez.  With Jordana Brewster, Clea DuVall, Laura Harris, Josh Hartnett. Students suspect that their teachers are aliens after bizarre occurrences.
writer: David Wechter (story), Bruce Kimmel (story), Kevin Williamson (screenplay)
plot: Students suspect that their teachers are aliens after bizarre occurrences.

sapo_description: Um grupo de estudantes do Liceu Harrington fazem uma terrível descoberta que confirma as suas piores suspeitas: os professores são de outro planeta. É então que eles se veem forçados a pôr as diferenças de parte e a juntarem-se para salvar a escola e a cidade de uma invasão alienígena.

title: Escapee
imdb_description: Escapee (2011) on IMDb: Movies, TV, Celebs, and more...
plot: While on a class observation trip at a local mental hospital, young psychology major Abby Jones (Christine Evangelista), has a chilling encounter with high-risk patient, Harmon (Dominic ...

sapo_description: Numa visita de estudo a um hospital psiquiátrico, uma jovem estudante de psicologia, Abby Jones, encontra um paciente violento e de alto risco, Harmon, que nessa noite vai fugir da instituição e partir ao encontro da rapariga.

title: Navy Seals
imdb_description: Directed by Lewis Teague.  With Charlie Sheen, Michael Biehn, Joanne Whalley, Rick Rossovich. An elite Navy Seals unit must set out to destroy a shipment of US-built Stinger missiles that have fallen into terrorist hands.

actors: Charlie Sheen, Michael Biehn, Joanne Whalley, Rick Rossovich
sapo_description: Enviada para salvar a tripulação de um avião norte-americano sequestrado no Médio Oriente, uma unidade de SEALs, a elite de forças especiais da marinha americana, descobre que os terroristas têm em seu poder poderosos mísseis Stinger, e que serão todos empurrados para a batalha das suas vidas.

title: The Big Lebowski
imdb_description: Directed by Joel Coen, Ethan Coen.  With Jeff Bridges, John Goodman, Julianne Moore, Steve Buscemi. "The Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire Lebowski, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.
plot: "The Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire Lebowski, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

sapo_description: Jeff Lebowski é um desempregado que se autointitula 'The Dude' e que é um entusiasta jogador de bowling. Quando ele é confundido com o multimilionário Jeffrey Lebowski por dois gangsters que querem reaver uma dívida, a sua vida já muito desalinhada vai virar-se completamente do avesso.

title: Broken Flowers
imdb_description: Directed by Jim Jarmusch.  With Bill Murray, Jessica Lange, Sharon Stone, Julie Delpy. As the extremely withdrawn Don Johnston is dumped by his latest woman, he receives an anonymous letter from a former lover informing him that he has a son who may be looking for him. A freelance sleuth neighbor moves Don to embark on a cross-country search for his old flames in search of answers.
writer: Jim Jarmusch, Bill Raden (inspired by an idea from), Sara Driver (inspired by an idea from)
plot: As the extremely withdrawn Don Johnston is dumped by his latest woman, he receives an anonymous letter from a former lover informing him that he has a son who may be looking for him. actors: Bill Murray, Julie Delpy, Heather Simms, Brea Frazier
sapo_description: Don Johnston é um solteirão convicto, que acaba de terminar mais uma relação. Ao receber uma carta anónima a informá-lo que tem um filho, ele propõe-se a reconsiderar a sua vida e parte numa viagem pela América, em busca das suas ex-namoradas para saber quem é a mãe.

title: Johnny English Strikes Again
imdb_description: Directed by David Kerr.  With Emma Thompson, Olga Kurylenko, Jake Lacy, Rowan Atkinson. After a cyber-attack reveals the identity of all of the active undercover agents in Britain, Johnny English is forced to come out of retirement to find the mastermind hacker.
plot: After a cyber-attack reveals the identity of all of the active undercover agents in Britain, Johnny English is forced to come out of retirement to find the mastermind hacker.

title: Eyewitness
imdb_description: Directed by Andrew C. Erin.  With Lindy Booth, Craig Olejnik, Jon McLaren, Alexis Maitland. It has been five years after Diana send a man to jail for the murder of her father and fiancee. Then he escapes from prison. He keeps her captive in her own home. Did Diana put an innocent man away?
writer: Nicholas Treeshin (screenplay), Hayden Baptiste (screenplay), Phillip J. Bartell (screen play by), Jim Fall (screen play by)
plot: It has been five years after Diana send a man to jail for the murder of her father and fiancee. Then he escapes from prison. He keeps her captive in her own home. Did Diana put an innocent man away?
actors: Lindy Booth, Craig Olejnik, Jon McLaren, Alexis Maitland
sapo_description: Cinco anos após enviar um homem para a prisão pelo assassinato do seu pai e do seu noivo, Diana regressa a casa e descobre que ele escapou da prisão e veio para a confrontar. No entanto, o homem não quer vingança e sim fazê-la entender que ela mandou um homem inocente para a prisão. Cativa na sua própria casa, Diana resiste, pois sabe o que testemunhou na noite do homicídio. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Love by Design
imdb_description: Directed by Michael Damian.  With Jane Seymour, David Oakes, Olivia Hallinan, David Lipper. Romanian born Danielle (Giulia Nahmany) is living the dream in NYC working at Beguile magazine under urban-diva fashion editor Vivian (Jane Seymour). But when a coworker steals her idea and her boyfriend, Danielle can't help but speak her mind to Vivian and loses her job. Now on the fashion blacklist with no place to go, Danielle heads home to Romania and back to the farm in Transylvania. After ...
writer: Janeen Damian, Michael Damian, Alexandru Adrian Marinica, Giulia Nahmany (story)
plot: Romanian born Danielle (Giulia Nahmany) is living the dream in NYC working at Beguile magazine under urban-diva fashion editor Vivian (Jane Seymour). But when a coworker steals her idea and...

sapo_description: Danielle, uma rapariga de origem romena, está a viver o sonho americano em Nova Iorque ao trabalhar na revista Beguile sob a supervisão da famosa editora de moda urbana, Vivian. Mas quando uma colega lhe rouba uma ideia e o namorado, Danielle não aguenta e conta tudo a Vivian, acabando por perder o emprego. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Love at First Glance
imdb_description: Directed by Kevin Connor.  With Amy Smart, Adrian Grenier, Jonathan Bennett, Kelly Thiebaud. After being dumped by her fiancé for being unadventurous, a woman (Amy Smart) sets out to prove him wrong by tracking down the handsome stranger (Adrian Grenier), whose cellphone she found on the subway.
plot: After being dumped by her fiancé for being unadventurous, a woman sets out to prove him wrong by tracking down the handsome stranger whose cellphone she found on the subway.
actors: Amy Smart, Adrian Grenier, Jonathan Bennett, Kelly Thiebaud

title: 30 Minutes or Less
imdb_description: Directed by Ruben Fleischer.  With Jesse Eisenberg, Danny McBride, Nick Swardson, Aziz Ansari. Two fledgling criminals kidnap a pizza delivery guy, strap a bomb to his chest, and inform him that he has mere hours to rob a bank or else...
writer: Michael Diliberti (screenplay), Michael Diliberti (story), Matthew Sullivan (story)
plot: Two fledgling criminals kidnap a pizza delivery guy, strap a bomb to his chest, and inform him that he has mere hours to rob a bank or else...

sapo_description: Nick é um jovem que entrega pizzas e leva uma vida comum e entediante, mas quando faz uma entrega a dois criminosos, acaba sequestrado e obrigado a assaltar um banco. Com uma bomba presa ao seu corpo, Nick, com a ajuda do seu amigo Chet, terá apenas 30 minutos para realizar o roubo. Class. etária: M/16. Classificação etária: M/16.

title: Freelancers
imdb_description: Directed by Jessy Terrero.  With 50 Cent, Robert De Niro, Forest Whitaker, Malcolm Goodwin. The son of a slain NYPD officer joins the force, where he falls in with his father's former partner and a team of rogue cops.
plot: The son of a slain NYPD officer joins the force, where he falls in with his father's former partner and a team of rogue cops.
actors: 50 Cent, Forest Whitaker, Robert De Niro, Malcolm Goodwin
sapo_description: Quando um oficial da Policia de Nova Iorque é assassinado em serviço, o seu filho decide inscrever-se na polícia, acabando por se associar ao antigo parceiro do seu pai e a uma equipa de polícias corruptos. Sarcone, o seu novo chefe, decide avaliar se ele tem o que é preciso através de provas e testes de lealdade, confiança e respeito. Classificação etária: M/16.

title: Dance with Me
imdb_description: Directed by Randa Haines.  With Vanessa Williams, Chayanne, Kris Kristofferson, Joan Plowright. Young Cuban Rafael just buried his mother, and comes to Houston to meet his father John for the first time. The difficult part is that John doesn't know he is Rafael's father. John runs a dance studio, and everyone prepares for the World Open Dance championship in Las Vegas. It soon becomes clear Rafael is a very good dancer, and Ruby is the biggest hope for the studio at the championship.
plot: Young Cuban Rafael just buried his mother, and comes to Houston to meet his father John for the first time. The difficult part is that John doesn't know he is Rafael's father. John runs a ...
actors: Vanessa Williams, Chayanne, Kris Kristofferson, Joan Plowright
sapo_description: Após a morte de sua mãe, o cubano Rafael Infante vai para o Houston trabalhar na decadente escola de dança de John Burnett. Lá faz limpezas e outros pequenos serviços, enquanto observa os dançarinos e se apaixona por Ruby, que sonha vencer o Campeonato Mundial Profissional Latino de Las Vegas mesmo que isso signifique abrir mão do amor. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Thick as Thieves
imdb_description: Directed by Mimi Leder.  With Rade Serbedzija, Morgan Freeman, Robert Forster, Corey Johnson. A veteran thief recruits a younger crook to help him pull off one final job in order to repay his debt to the Russian mob.
plot: A veteran thief recruits a younger crook to help him pull off one final job in order to repay his debt to the Russian mob.

sapo_description: A longa carreira de Keith Ripley (Morgan Freeman), famoso ladrão profissional, já conheceu melhores dias e Jack Monahan (Antonio Banderas), seu colega de profissão, está num momento particularmente complicado da sua vida. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Anaconda
imdb_description: Directed by Luis Llosa.  With Jon Voight, Jennifer Lopez, Eric Stoltz, Ice Cube. A "National Geographic" film crew is taken hostage by an insane hunter, who takes them along on his quest to capture the world's largest - and deadliest - snake.
writer: Hans Bauer, Jim Cash, Jack Epps Jr.
plot: A "National Geographic" film crew is taken hostage by an insane hunter, who takes them along on his quest to capture the world's largest - and deadliest - snake.

sapo_description: Reféns de um caçador obstinado, uma equipa de filmagens vê-se envolvida na tentativa de capturar a maior e mais mortífera cobra no Amazonas: a anaconda. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: The Impossible
imdb_description: Directed by J.A. Bayona.  With Naomi Watts, Ewan McGregor, Tom Holland, Oaklee Pendergast. The story of a tourist family in Thailand caught in the destruction and chaotic aftermath of the 2004 Indian Ocean tsunami.
awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 27 wins & 67 nominations.
plot: The story of a tourist family in Thailand caught in the destruction and chaotic aftermath of the 2004 Indian Ocean tsunami.
actors: Naomi Watts, Ewan McGregor, Tom Holland, Samuel Joslin
sapo_description: Ano de 2004. Maria e Henry (Naomi Watts e Ewan McGregor) decidem passar as férias de Natal na Tailândia com os três filhos de ambos. Porém, na manhã de 26 de Dezembro, as águas calmas junto ao hotel onde estão hospedados transformam-se numa onda gigante que engole tudo e todos à sua volta. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon
imdb_description: Directed by Ang Lee.  With Yun-Fat Chow, Michelle Yeoh, Ziyi Zhang, Chen Chang. A young Chinese warrior steals a sword from a famed swordsman and then escapes into a world of romantic adventure with a mysterious man in the frontier of the nation.
writer: Du Lu Wang (book), Hui-Ling Wang (screenplay), James Schamus (screenplay), Kuo Jung Tsai (screenplay)
plot: A young Chinese warrior steals a sword from a famed swordsman and then escapes into a world of romantic adventure with a mysterious man in the frontier of the nation.
actors: Yun-Fat Chow, Michelle Yeoh, Ziyi Zhang, Chen Chang
sapo_description: Filme épico sobre artes marciais chinesas que marca o regresso de um estilo de ação lendário e heroico. O realizador Ang Lee adiciona à ação do 'kung-fu' uma componente dramática e sentimental, transformando este filme numa fábula sumptuosa e mágica que nos transporta a um mundo quase onírico. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Hellboy II: The Golden Army
imdb_description: Directed by Guillermo del Toro.  With Ron Perlman, Selma Blair, Doug Jones, John Alexander. The mythical world starts a rebellion against humanity in order to rule the Earth, so Hellboy and his team must save the world from the rebellious creatures.
writer: Guillermo del Toro (screenplay), Guillermo del Toro (story), Mike Mignola (story), Mike Mignola (comic book)
awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 5 wins & 28 nominations.
plot: The mythical world starts a rebellion against humanity in order to rule the Earth, so Hellboy and his team must save the world from the rebellious creatures.
actors: Ron Perlman, Selma Blair, Doug Jones, John Alexander
sapo_description: Hellboy nasceu nas chamas do Inferno, durante a Segunda Guerra Mundial, e foi trazido para a Terra pelo malvado Rasputine para fazer o Mal. Mas os Aliados salvaram-no e criaram-no como um filho, desenvolvendo as suas capacidades sobrenaturais. Hellboy torna-se então um monstro que, apesar de vermelho, ter chifres e ser muito incompreendido, tem um coração de ouro e luta ao lado do Bem. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Streets of Fire
imdb_description: Directed by Walter Hill.  With Michael Paré, Diane Lane, Rick Moranis, Amy Madigan. A mercenary is hired to rescue his ex-girlfriend, a singer who has been kidnapped by a motorcycle gang.
plot: A mercenary is hired to rescue his ex-girlfriend, a singer who has been kidnapped by a motorcycle gang.
actors: Michael Paré, Diane Lane, Rick Moranis, Amy Madigan
sapo_description: Um dos filmes mais famosos do cinema americano de meados da década de 80, que ainda hoje convoca um 'culto' muito particular. Figuras clássicas da 'rebeldia juvenil' (os gangues, o rock and roll) num universo 'compósito', onde os anos 50 se cruzam com os 80 e com algum futurismo cronologicamente indefinível. A banda musical marcou uma geração. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Zoolander 2
imdb_description: Directed by Ben Stiller.  With Ben Stiller, Owen Wilson, Penélope Cruz, Will Ferrell. Derek and Hansel are lured into modelling again, in Rome, where they find themselves the target of a sinister conspiracy.
writer: Justin Theroux, Ben Stiller, Nicholas Stoller, John Hamburg, Drake Sather (character Derek Zoolander), Ben Stiller (character Derek Zoolander)
plot: Derek and Hansel are lured into modelling again, in Rome, where they find themselves the target of a sinister conspiracy.
actors: Justin Bieber, Jon Daly, Penélope Cruz, Ben Stiller
sapo_description: Há uma década, Zoolander e Hansel eram os modelos masculinos mais requisitados pelos grandes estilistas da época. Hoje, por mais que lhes custe aceitar, ambos sabem que já não há lugar para eles nesta indústria. O mundo da alta-costura mudou radicalmente, assim como os conceitos de beleza, hoje mais virados para a androginia. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Shanghai Noon
imdb_description: Directed by Tom Dey.  With Jackie Chan, Owen Wilson, Lucy Liu, Brandon Merrill. A Chinese man travels to the Wild West to rescue a kidnapped Princess. After teaming up with a train robber, the unlikely duo takes on a Chinese traitor and his corrupt boss.
plot: A Chinese man travels to the Wild West to rescue a kidnapped princess. After teaming up with a train robber, the unlikely duo takes on a Chinese traitor and his corrupt boss.
actors: Jackie Chan, Owen Wilson, Lucy Liu, Brandon Merrill
sapo_description: Um guarda imperial chinês, Chon Wang, viaja até ao velho Oeste para resgatar uma bela princesa. Quando conhece o cowboy fora-da-lei Roy O'Bannon, os dois têm de enfrentar a prisão, os bordéis e os piores vilões de que há memória. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Species II
imdb_description: Directed by Peter Medak.  With Natasha Henstridge, Michael Madsen, Marg Helgenberger, Mykelti Williamson. An astronaut gets infected with alien DNA during the first mission on Mars and runs amok on earth. Preston and Laura team up with a peaceful, genetically re-engineered Sil to track the monster down.
plot: An astronaut gets infected with alien DNA during the first mission on Mars and runs amok on earth. Preston and Laura team up with a peaceful, genetically re-engineered Sil to track the monster down.

Durante a viagem, Ross é infetado por um extraterrestre e começa a mudar. Classificação etária: M/16.

imdb_description: Directed by James DeMonaco.  With Ethan Hawke, Lena Headey, Max Burkholder, Adelaide Kane. A wealthy family are held hostage for harboring the target of a murderous syndicate during the Purge, a 12-hour period in which any and all crime is legal.

Este período, chamado de Noite do Crime, é marcado por milhares de assassinatos, linchamentos e outros atos de violência por todo o país.

plot: Ong Bak 3 picks up where Ong Bak 2 had left off. Tien is captured and almost beaten to death before he is saved and brought back to the Kana Khone villagers. There he is taught meditation ...

sapo_description: Tien é capturado e espancado quase até a morte, mas acaba por ser salvo e levado para a aldeia de Kana Khone, onde aprende a meditar e a lidar com seu karma. Após receber uma cura mística, tanto física como espiritual, terá de enfrentar Bhuti Sangkha, um inimigo sobrenatural, num duelo decisivo.

title: The Wrong House
imdb_description: Directed by Sam Irvin.  With Clare Kramer, Tilky Jones, Allison McAtee, Thomas Calabro. Rebecca Lassiter and her husband Brian leave New York City to move to Los Angeles and find the perfect suburban house for them and their young daughter. However, a local personal trainer named Kathleen Strickland has a secret past with this home and becomes distraught when she loses the house to the young couple in a bidding war. Shortly after moving in, Rebecca and Brian notice strange things ...
writer: Jeffrey Barmash, George Erschbamer, Barbara Fixx, Sam Irvin, Jeffrey Schenck (story by), Peter Sullivan (story by), Peter Sullivan

title: My Husband Is Missing
imdb_description: Directed by Brenton Spencer.  With Daphne Zuniga, Aaron Pearl, Nicole Muñoz, Steve Baran. Anne Bradshaw's life is turned upside down when her accountant husband Dale is kidnapped.

title: Hotel Transylvania
imdb_description: Directed by Genndy Tartakovsky.  With Adam Sandler, Kevin James, Andy Samberg, Selena Gomez. Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the count's teenaged daughter.

Hoje existe apenas um lugar onde podem finalmente descansar e viver pacificamente: o Hotel Transylvania. Criado por Drácula, é o lugar perfeito para se afastarem das vicissitudes da Humanidade. Lá, tudo é tranquilo e adequado às suas necessidades. Classificação etária: M/6.

title: Robin Hood: Men in Tights
imdb_description: Directed by Mel Brooks.  With Cary Elwes, Richard Lewis, Roger Rees, Amy Yasbeck. A spoof of Robin Hood in general and Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves (1991) in particular.

title: There's Something About Mary
imdb_description: Directed by Bobby Farrelly, Peter Farrelly.  With Cameron Diaz, Matt Dillon, Ben Stiller, Lee Evans. A man gets a chance to meet up with his dream girl from high school, even though his date with her back then was a complete disaster.

Ela era a rapariga perfeita, uma mulher de sonhos que deixava os homens doidos. Mas a sorte de Tom durou pouco e ele aleijou-se ao puxar o fecho das calças, pelo que o romance não foi longe... Classificação etária: M/12.

Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Dracula Untold
imdb_description: Directed by Gary Shore.  With Luke Evans, Dominic Cooper, Sarah Gadon, Art Parkinson. Entre as crianças está Ingeras, o filho de Vlad. Classificação etária: M/16.

title: The Call
imdb_description: Directed by Brad Anderson.  With Halle Berry, Evie Thompson, Abigail Breslin, Morris Chestnut. title: The Way of War

title: Assassins

É então que lhe aparece Deus e lhe pede que construa uma arca perante um suposto dilúvio universal iminente que se avizinha.

title: Dead Silence
imdb_description: Directed by James Wan.  With Ryan Kwanten, Amber Valletta, Donnie Wahlberg, Michael Fairman. A young widower returns to his hometown to search for answers to his wife's murder, which may be linked to the ghost of a murdered ventriloquist.

title: Manchester by the Sea
imdb_description: Directed by Kenneth Lonergan.  With Casey Affleck, Michelle Williams, Kyle Chandler, Lucas Hedges. A depressed uncle is asked to take care of his teenage nephew after the boy's father dies.

title: Gigi

title: Braveheart

Wallace, começando por liderar poucos patriotas famintos, acabou por organizar um exército de guerreiros, sedentos de liberdade. Com ele, os escoceses recuperaram a esperança, que levaria a Escócia a ser livre para sempre. Classificação etária: M/12.

Classificação etária: M/12.

Quando um cientista do CERN (o centro europeu para a investigação nuclear, sedeado em Genebra) aparece morto, marcado a ferro em brasa com o símbolo dos Illuminati, o especialista em religião de Harvard é chamado a intervir. imdb_description: Directed by Grégory Levasseur.  With Ashley Hinshaw, James Buckley, Denis O'Hare, Christa Nicola. An archaeological team attempts to unlock the secrets of a lost pyramid only to find themselves hunted by an insidious creature.

Perdidos nas escuras catacumbas, eles percebem que não estão sozinhos e, desesperados, buscam uma rapidamente uma saída antes que seja tarde demais.

imdb_description: Directed by Shawn Levy.  With Ben Stiller, Carla Gugino, Ricky Gervais, Dick Van Dyke. A newly recruited night security guard at the Museum of Natural History discovers that an ancient curse causes the animals and exhibits on display to come to life and wreak havoc.

title: Irreplaceable

title: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle

imdb_description: Directed by Pedro Amorim.  With Paulo Azevedo, Ian Velloza. Midfield is the story of an inner strength that overcomes the obvious and places us in front of our own weaknesses. The ordinary day of a stevedore. And a Sunday of an extraordinary man.

title: Almirante Reis
imdb_description: Directed by Fernando Vendrell.  With Francisco Nascimento, Augusto Portela, Ângelo Torres, Miguel Telmo.
plot: N/A
actors: Francisco Nascimento, Augusto Portela, Ângelo Torres, Miguel Telmo

As pessoas de sempre numa rua da baixa de Lisboa. Era uma vez a solidão, o amor e a raiva.

title: Trumbo
imdb_description: Directed by Peter Askin.  With Dalton Trumbo, Joan Allen, Brian Dennehy, Michael Douglas. Through a focus on the life of Dalton Trumbo (1905-1976), this film examines the effects on individuals and families of a congressional pursuit of Hollywood Communists after World War II. Trumbo was one of several writers, directors, and actors who invoked the First Amendment in refusing to answer questions under oath. They were blacklisted and imprisoned. We follow Trumbo to prison, to exile in ...

title: Loving
imdb_description: Directed by Jeff Nichols.  With Ruth Negga, Joel Edgerton, Will Dalton, Dean Mumford. The story of Richard and Mildred Loving, a couple whose arrest for interracial marriage in 1960s Virginia began a legal battle that would end with the Supreme Court's historic 1967 decision.

Ele costuma andar por um clube de Manhattan e atira-se a Francine Evans (Liza Minnelli), a bastante independente vocalista da banda USO.

title: Duplex

title: What Lies Beneath

Mas quando Claire lhe diz ouvir vozes misteriosas e ver a imagem fantasmagórica em casa deles, ele minimiza esses episódios como sendo meras alucinações.

Quando Sommersby finalmente regressa, parece um homem diferente.

Classificação etária: M/12.

E embora Jack seja um profissional de medicina, ele sabe (por experiência) que 'médico' atrai mais do que 'enfermeiro'. Classificação etária: M/12.

Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Poseidon

sapo_description: É quase meia noite do dia 31 de Dezembro quando, em alto mar no Oceano Atlântico Norte, milhares de pessoas se preparam para festejar a passagem de ano a bordo do enorme navio cruzeiro Poseidon. Quando o novo ano era aguardado com todos os requintes no salão principal, uma onda colossal embate no navio, virando-o completamente do avesso.

title: A Warrior's Tail
writer: Aleksandr Chistyakov, Maksim Fadeev (story), Maksim Fadeev, Gregory Poirier

sapo_description: Savva é um rapaz de 10 anos que vive numa pequena aldeia ameaçada por um gangue de hienas, foge para a floresta e conhece um grande lobo branco que o leva em busca de um mágico que os poderá salvar a todos.

title: Hard to Kill

actors: Steven Seagal, Kelly LeBrock, William Sadler, Frederick Coffin

Um criminoso tenta infiltrar-se na prisão de alta segurança para tentar persuadir um prisioneiro condenado à morte a revelar-lhe onde escondeu 200 milhões de dólares em ouro. No entanto, um agente infiltrado do FBI consegue que os outros prisioneiros se rebelem contra os invasores. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: A.I. Artificial Intelligence

sapo_description: Um rapaz robô altamente avançado anseia tornar-se “real” para conseguir recuperar o amor da sua mãe humana.

title: Two-Fisted Law

sapo_description: Tim Clark perde o seu rancho quando não consegue pagar uma dívida e decide apostar tudo na prospeção de prata.

title: Big Momma's House 2
imdb_description: Directed by John Whitesell.  With Martin Lawrence, Brandon T. Jackson, Jessica Lucas, Michelle Ang. Malcolm Turner and his stepson Trent go undercover at an all-girls school to flush out a killer.

sapo_description: Lawrence está de regresso como a maior, mais ousada e mais desagradável Mamã de sempre. Desta vez, Lawrence disfarça-se para evitar um desastre de segurança nacional. Mas salvar o país é o mais pequeno dos seus problemas quando aceita ser empregada da família disfuncional do suspeito.

title: Despicable Me 2
imdb_description: Directed by Pierre Coffin, Chris Renaud.  With Steve Carell, Jason Segel, Russell Brand, Julie Andrews. When a criminal mastermind uses a trio of orphan girls as pawns for a grand scheme, he finds their love is profoundly changing him for the better.

sapo_description: Há já algum tempo que Gru se deixou de vilanias. Agora, é apenas o feliz e dedicado pai de Margo, Edith e Agnes, as suas adoráveis filhas adotivas. Mas a sua vida pacata leva uma volta de 180° quando é inesperadamente sequestrado por Lucy Wilde e levado à presença de Silas Ramsbottom, líder da Liga Anti vilões, uma associação que se dedica a combater o crime à escala planetária.

title: The Return
imdb_description: Directed by Virendra Kumar Sahu.  With Richard Llewellyn, Stefan Boehm, Rachel Chambers, Jon-Paul Gates. Five years ago Frank Phoenix robbed The Firm. Betrayed by his own crew and murdered, the stolen gold was never found. Now someone is planning revenge.
plot: N/A
actors: Richard Llewellyn, Stefan Boehm, Kirsten Varley
sapo_description: Há cinco anos, Frank Phoenix roubou A Firma. Traído pela sua própria equipa e assassinado, o ouro roubado nunca foi encontrado. Agora alguém planeia uma vingança.

title: AmeriGeddon
imdb_description: Directed by Mike Norris.  With Aliya Astaphan, Rich Bentz, Giovannie Cruz, Jonny Cruz. A fictional depiction of a future wherein a globalist terrorist organization aligned with the United Nations to disable the United States' power grid and institutes Martial Law. It will take a dedicated family of patriots armed with strong survival skills and the remains of the Second Amendment to save America and reclaim its freedom.
plot: A fictional depiction of a future wherein a globalist terrorist organization aligned with the United Nations to disable the United States' power grid and institutes Martial Law. It will ...

sapo_description: Descrito como 'o filme que o sistema não quer que seja visto', ele mostra o que acontece quando um governo norte-americano num futuro não muito distante conspira com as Nações Unidas para iniciar um ataque à rede elétrica. O filme retrata um país governado pela lei marcial, ou seja, os cidadãos são privados dos seus direitos constitucionais e das suas armas.

title: Bridget Jones's Diary
imdb_description: Directed by Sharon Maguire.  With Renée Zellweger, Colin Firth, Hugh Grant, Gemma Jones. A British woman is determined to improve herself while she looks for love in a year in which she keeps a personal diary.

title: Crash and Burn
imdb_description: Crash and Burn (TV Movie 2007) on IMDb: Movies, TV, Celebs, and more...

Quando um assassinato brutal traz um volte-face violento à missão de Kevin, este teme que tudo vá por água abaixo.

title: The Adjustment Bureau
imdb_description: Directed by George Nolfi.  With Matt Damon, Emily Blunt, Lisa Thoreson, Florence Kastriner. The affair between a politician and a contemporary dancer is affected by mysterious forces keeping the lovers apart.

sapo_description: Prestes a conseguir um lugar no Senado americano, o político ambicioso David Norris (Matt Damon) conhece a bela bailarina de dança contemporânea Elise Sellas (Emily Blunt), uma mulher diferente de todas as outras. Mas ao aperceber-se de que se está a apaixonar por ela, um grupo de homens misterioso conspira para que os dois não fiquem juntos.

title: Firewall
imdb_description: Directed by Richard Loncraine.  With Harrison Ford, Virginia Madsen, Paul Bettany, Carly Schroeder. A security specialist is forced into robbing the bank that he's protecting, as a bid to pay off his family's ransom.

Um dia, depois de ter sido apresentado a um homem chamado Bill Cox que está interessado em trabalhar com ele num projeto de segurança, é apanhado numa emboscada e Cox é o homem com arma na mão...

title: Armageddon
imdb_description: Directed by Michael Bay.  With Bruce Willis, Billy Bob Thornton, Ben Affleck, Liv Tyler. After discovering that an asteroid the size of Texas is going to impact Earth in less than a month, N.A.S.A. recruits a misfit team of deep core drillers to save the planet.
