sapo_description: Depois do impacto de um meteorito nas costas da Carolina do Sul, a NASA descobre que outro meteorito do tamanho do estado de Texas se dirige para a Terra a grande velocidade para chocar contra ela num prazo de 18 dias.

title: Constantine
imdb_description: Directed by Francis Lawrence.  With Keanu Reeves, Rachel Weisz, Djimon Hounsou, Shia LaBeouf. Supernatural detective John Constantine helps a policewoman prove her sister's death was not a suicide, but something more.

sapo_description: John Constantine esteve no inferno e regressou. Nasceu com um dom que não desejava, ser capaz de reconhecer claramente os anjos e os demónios híbridos que andam pela terra sob um aspeto humano. Ao não aguentar tal fardo, tentou suicidar-se. Mas a tentativa falhou e agora patrulha a fronteira entre o céu e a terra, esperando conseguir a salvação enviando seres diabólicos para a profundezas.

title: The Trip to Italy
imdb_description: Directed by Michael Winterbottom.  With Steve Coogan, Rob Brydon, Rosie Fellner, Claire Keelan. Two men, six meals in six different places on a road trip around Italy. Liguria, Tuscany, Rome, Amalfi and ending in Capri.

title: Lovelace
imdb_description: Directed by Rob Epstein, Jeffrey Friedman.  With Amanda Seyfried, James Franco, Peter Sarsgaard, Juno Temple. The story of Linda Lovelace, who is used and abused by the porn industry at the behest of her coercive husband, before taking control of her life.
plot: The story of Linda Lovelace, who is used and abused by the porn industry at the behest of her coercive husband, before taking control of her life.
actors: Amanda Seyfried, Peter Sarsgaard, Sharon Stone, Robert Patrick
sapo_description: Cinebiografia de Linda Lovelace (Amanda Seyfried), retratando como foi de uma garota de família tradicional à protagonista do clássico do gênero pornô 'Garganta Profunda'. Ela entrou no meio através de seu abusivo marido Chuck Traynor, mas acabou não seguindo a carreira de atriz pornô, chegando até mesmo a militar contra a indústria pornográfica após se casar com Larry Marchiano.

title: Always Shine

sapo_description: Anna e Beth são duas amigas que decidem ir passar o fim de semana às montanhas de Big Sur, na Califórnia, para tentar reatar e fortalecer a amizade, abalada por anos de competição e inveja. O resultado inesperado, trazendo à tona verdades ocultas sobre as duas, o seu relacionamento, e mudando a vida delas para sempre.

title: Crystal Inferno
imdb_description: Directed by Eric Summer.  With Claire Forlani, Jamie Bamber, Riley Jackson, Isaac Rouse. Disaster hits when two teenagers are caught in a fire on the 20th floor of a skyscraper. Their parents are on the 60th. Will they survive the flames?
plot: Disaster hits when two teenagers are caught in a fire on the 20th floor of a skyscraper. Their parents are on the 60th. Will they survive the flames?
actors: Claire Forlani, Jamie Bamber, Riley Jackson, Isaac Rouse
sapo_description: Dois adolescentes estão num incêndio no 20º andar de um arranha-céu. Seus pais estão no 60º.

title: Astérix and Obélix: God Save Britannia

sapo_description: 50 A.C. Júlio César decide avançar com as suas tropas e invadir a Britânia. A vitória é rápida e total. Ou melhor, quase total. Para seu descontentamento, uma pequena aldeia bretã consegue resistir. Mas as forças bretãs enfraquecem a cada dia que passa. É então que Cordélia, a grande rainha, decide enviar Jolitorax à Gália onde, segundo a lenda, vive o mais irredutível e temeroso povo.

title: Resident Evil
imdb_description: Directed by Paul W.S. Anderson.  With Milla Jovovich, Michelle Rodriguez, Ryan McCluskey, Oscar Pearce. A special military unit fights a powerful, out-of-control supercomputer and hundreds of scientists who have mutated into flesh-eating creatures after a laboratory accident.
plot: A special military unit fights a powerful, out-of-control supercomputer and hundreds of scientists who have mutated into flesh-eating creatures after a laboratory accident.

sapo_description: Depois de um acidente num laboratório, uma unidade militar especial é recrutada para lutar contra um poderoso e descontrolado supercomputador e centenas de cientistas mutantes que se alimentam de carne humana.

title: The Messengers
imdb_description: Directed by Danny Pang, Oxide Chun Pang.  With Dylan McDermott, Penelope Ann Miller, Kristen Stewart, John Corbett. An ominous darkness invades a seemingly serene sunflower farm in North Dakota, and the Solomon family is torn apart by suspicion, mayhem and murder.
plot: An ominous darkness invades a seemingly serene sunflower farm in North Dakota, and the Solomon family is torn apart by suspicion, mayhem and murder.
actors: Kristen Stewart, Dylan McDermott, Penelope Ann Miller, John Corbett
sapo_description: Para fugir ao ritmo frenético de Chicago, a família Solomon decide instalar-se numa serena casa de campo no Dakota do Norte cheia de girassóis. Só que o filho mais novo começa a ter comportamentos estranhos e a casa perfeita revela estar no centro de forças maléficas incontroláveis.

title: Memoirs of a Geisha
imdb_description: Directed by Rob Marshall.  With Ziyi Zhang, Ken Watanabe, Michelle Yeoh, Suzuka Ohgo. Nitta Sayuri reveals how she transcended her fishing-village roots and became one of Japan's most celebrated geisha.
plot: Nitta Sayuri reveals how she transcended her fishing-village roots and became one of Japan's most celebrated geisha.
actors: Suzuka Ohgo, Togo Igawa, Mako, Samantha Futerman
sapo_description: Na primeira metade do século XX, Chiyo, uma rapariga de nove anos de uma aldeia de pescadores, é vendida para se tornar geisha num bordel próximo de Kyoto. Mais tarde, é resgatada pela dona de um bordel rival, que a torna numa das mais conhecidas e influentes geishas de todo o Japão.

title: Heidi
imdb_description: With Jason Robards, Jane Seymour, Patricia Neal, Siân Phillips. After charming her reclusive grandfather and falling in love with the beautiful mountain he calls home, Heidi is uprooted and sent to Frankfurt where she befriends Klara, a young girl confined to a wheelchair.
plot: A story of a young girl who lives in the Swiss Alps with her goat herding Grandfather.
actors: Anuk Steffen, Anna Schinz, Lilian Naef, Bruno Ganz
sapo_description: Heidi, uma pequena órfã, vive uma alegre infância junto do avô nos Alpes Suíços. Até que um dia, a sua tia a leva para uma rica mansão de Frankfurt para ser dama de companhia de Clara, uma menina de cadeira de rodas. Embora de mundos muito diferentes, Clara e Heidi desenvolvem uma marcante amizade.

title: Monster House
imdb_description: Directed by Gil Kenan.  With Mitchel Musso, Sam Lerner, Spencer Locke, Ryan Newman. Three teens discover that their neighbor's house is really a living, breathing, scary monster.
writer: Dan Harmon (screenplay), Rob Schrab (screenplay), Pamela Pettler (screenplay), Dan Harmon (story), Rob Schrab (story)

title: The Quick and the Dead
imdb_description: Directed by Sam Raimi.  With Sharon Stone, Gene Hackman, Russell Crowe, Leonardo DiCaprio. A female gunfighter returns to a frontier town where a dueling tournament is being held, which she enters in an effort to avenge her father's death.
plot: A female gunfighter returns to a frontier town where a dueling tournament is being held, which she enters in an effort to avenge her father's death.
actors: Sharon Stone, Gene Hackman, Russell Crowe, Leonardo DiCaprio
sapo_description: Uma pistoleira regressa à cidade de Redemption para competir num duelo mortal e vingar a morte do pai.

title: Sahara
imdb_description: Directed by Breck Eisner.  With Matthew McConaughey, Penélope Cruz, Steve Zahn, Jude Akuwudike. Master explorer Dirk Pitt goes on the adventure of a lifetime of seeking out a lost Civil War battleship known as the "Ship of Death" in the deserts of West Africa while helping a WHO doctor being hounded by a ruthless dictator.
writer: Clive Cussler (novel), Thomas Dean Donnelly (screenplay), Joshua Oppenheimer (screenplay), John C. Richards (screenplay), James V. Hart (screenplay)
plot: Master explorer Dirk Pitt goes on the adventure of a lifetime of seeking out a lost Civil War battleship known as the "Ship of Death" in the deserts of West Africa while helping a WHO doctor being hounded by a ruthless dictator.
actors: Jude Akuwudike, Mark Aspinall, Rakie Ayola, Christopher Bello
sapo_description: O explorador Dirk Pitt embarca na aventura da sua vida em busca do mítico Navio da Morte, naufragado perto do Norte de África durante a Guerra Civil Americana, enquanto ajuda Eva Rojas, uma médica da Organização Mundial de Saúde, que está convicta de que a embarcação esconde mais que um tesouro...

title: Inside Man
imdb_description: Directed by Spike Lee.  With Denzel Washington, Clive Owen, Jodie Foster, Christopher Plummer. A police detective, a bank robber, and a high-power broker enter high-stakes negotiations after the criminal's brilliant heist spirals into a hostage situation.
plot: A police detective, a bank robber, and a high-power broker enter high-stakes negotiations after the criminal's brilliant heist spirals into a hostage situation.
actors: Denzel Washington, Clive Owen, Jodie Foster, Christopher Plummer
sapo_description: Dalton planeou o assalto perfeito a um grande banco de Nova Iorque. Nem o mais pequeno fator lhe parece ter escapado e consegue estar sempre um passo à frente das autoridades. Num tenso jogo de emoções, talvez nem tudo seja o que parece...

title: The Space Between Us
imdb_description: Directed by Peter Chelsom.  With Gary Oldman, Asa Butterfield, Carla Gugino, Britt Robertson. The first human born on Mars travels to Earth for the first time, experiencing the wonders of the planet through fresh eyes. He embarks on an adventure with a street smart girl to discover how he came to be.
writer: Allan Loeb (screenplay by), Stewart Schill (story by), Richard Barton Lewis (story by), Allan Loeb (story by)
plot: The first human born on Mars travels to Earth for the first time, experiencing the wonders of the planet through fresh eyes. He embarks on an adventure with a street smart girl to discover how he came to be.
actors: Gary Oldman, Janet Montgomery, Trey Tucker, Scott Takeda
sapo_description: O primeiro humano nascido em Marte viaja à Terra pela primeira vez aos 16 anos e vive extasiado todas maravilhas do planeta. Quando foge dos seus protetores e parte em busca do pai, segue viagem com a rapariga por quem se apaixonou mas que não sabe a verdade sobre ele.

title: Brimstone
imdb_description: Directed by Martin Koolhoven.  With Dakota Fanning, Guy Pearce, Carice van Houten, Kit Harington. From the moment the new reverend climbs the pulpit, Liz knows she and her family are in great danger.
plot: From the moment the new reverend climbs the pulpit, Liz knows she and her family are in great danger.
country: Netherlands, France, Germany, Belgium, Sweden, UK, USA
actors: Dakota Fanning, Guy Pearce, Kit Harington, Carice van Houten
sapo_description: No velho Oeste, a jovem muda Liz vive com o marido e os filhos, mas a sua vida vai mudar de forma radical com a chegada de um novo pastor à comunidade, obsessivo e violento, que leva a que ela rapidamente perceba que a sua família vai correr um enorme perigo.

title: Un petit mensonge
plot: N/A
actors: Frédéric van den Driessche, Julie Judd, Gaëla Le Devehat, Micky Sébastian
sapo_description: Eric (Frédéric Van Den Driessche) parece um homem de família feliz. Mas ele também tem um caso com duas outras mulheres com filhos: Chloé e Hugo, cujo desejo é ter um pai. Quando as crianças se envolvem nos romances de seus pais, as suas palavras vão abalar profundamente as suas próprias vidas... para o melhor ou para o pior.

title: A Good Day to Die Hard
imdb_description: Directed by John Moore.  With Bruce Willis, Jai Courtney, Sebastian Koch, Mary Elizabeth Winstead. John McClane travels to Russia to help out his seemingly wayward son, Jack, only to discover that Jack is a CIA operative working undercover, causing the father and son to team up against underworld forces.
writer: Skip Woods, Roderick Thorp (certain original characters by)
plot: John McClane travels to Russia to help out his seemingly wayward son, Jack, only to discover that Jack is a CIA operative working undercover, causing the father and son to team up against underworld forces.
imdb_title: A Good Day to Die Hard (2013)
sapo_title: Die Hard: Nunca é Bom Dia Para Morrer
actors: Bruce Willis, Jai Courtney, Sebastian Koch, Mary Elizabeth Winstead
sapo_description: Bruce Willis está de regresso com a mais icónica personagem de toda a sua carreira: John McClane, o herói que, nos anos 80/90, conquistou meio mundo com a sua coragem e determinação. Desta vez, o detetive sai da sua 'zona de conforto' e viaja para Moscovo, Rússia, onde pretende encontrar-se com Jack (Jai Courtney), o filho que não vê há algum tempo e com quem está determinado a reforçar os laços. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Just Married
imdb_description: Directed by Shawn Levy.  With Ashton Kutcher, Brittany Murphy, Christian Kane, David Moscow. A young newlywed couple honeymoon in Europe, where obstacles challenge their ability to sustain the marriage.
plot: A young newlywed couple honeymoon in Europe, where obstacles challenge their ability to sustain the marriage.
actors: Ashton Kutcher, Brittany Murphy, Christian Kane, David Moscow
sapo_description: Sarah e Tom decidem casar, contra a vontade dos pais e amigos de Sarah, e vão fazer uma viagem pela Europa e assim comemorar a Lua-de-Mel. Em princípio tudo corre maravilhosamente bem até que os pais de Sarah, numa tentativa de boicote, convencem o ex-namorado de Sarah a ir atrás dela... Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Something Borrowed
imdb_description: Directed by Luke Greenfield.  With Ginnifer Goodwin, Kate Hudson, Colin Egglesfield, John Krasinski. Friendships are tested and secrets come to the surface when terminally single Rachel falls for Dex, her best friend Darcy's fiancé.
plot: Friendships are tested and secrets come to the surface when terminally single Rachel falls for Dex, her best friend Darcy's fiancé.
actors: Ginnifer Goodwin, Kate Hudson, Colin Egglesfield, John Krasinski
sapo_description: Advogada num dos mais importantes escritórios de Manhattan, Rachel é bonita, jovem e emancipada. Apenas uma nuvem negra teima em pairar sobre aquele cenário risonho: a paixão que, desde os tempos da faculdade, esconde por Dex que, por sinal, é namorado de Darcy (Kate Hudson), a sua extravagante melhor amiga. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: El Mariachi
imdb_description: Directed by Robert Rodriguez.  With Carlos Gallardo, Consuelo Gómez, Jaime de Hoyos, Peter Marquardt. A traveling mariachi is mistaken for a murderous criminal and must hide from a gang bent on killing him.
plot: A traveling mariachi is mistaken for a murderous criminal and must hide from a gang bent on killing him.
actors: Carlos Gallardo, Consuelo Gómez, Jaime de Hoyos, Peter Marquardt
sapo_description: Quando se vê 'El Mariachi' não se imagina que foi rodado com um orçamento de sete mil dólares, por um realizador de 23 anos, e que o tempo de filmagem foi apenas de duas semanas. Robert Rodriguez coloca no centro do écran um jovem mariachi, cujo sonho é cantar e tocar guitarra, seguindo a tradição familiar. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Desperado
imdb_description: Directed by Robert Rodriguez.  With Antonio Banderas, Salma Hayek, Joaquim de Almeida, Cheech Marin. A gunslinger is embroiled in a war with a local drug runner.
plot: A gunslinger is embroiled in a war with a local drug runner.
actors: Antonio Banderas, Salma Hayek, Joaquim de Almeida, Cheech Marin
sapo_description: 'Desperado' segue a saga (há quem o considere um 'remake') de 'El Mariachi' (1992), desta vez com Antonio Banderas no papel do protagonista e com um orçamento milionário (o primeiro foi rodado com apenas sete mil dólares e as filmagens demoraram apenas duas semanas), mas com o mesmo Robert Rodriguez à frente da realização. Classificação etária: M/16.

title: Tekken
imdb_description: Directed by Dwight H. Little.  With Jon Foo, Kelly Overton, Cary-Hiroyuki Tagawa, Ian Anthony Dale. Jin Kazama witnesses the death of his mother Jun by Tekken in the slums known as Anvil. After finding a Tekken ID he decides to seek out vengeance for his mother's death.
plot: Jin Kazama witnesses the death of his mother Jun by Tekken in the slums known as Anvil. After finding a Tekken ID he decides to seek out vengeance for his mother's death.
actors: Jon Foo, Kelly Overton, Cary-Hiroyuki Tagawa, Ian Anthony Dale
sapo_description: No ano 2039 os melhores lutadores de todo o mundo vão competir no último e maior evento desportivo de todos os tempos, o torneio Punho de Ferro, patrocinado pela Tekken.

title: Bad Grandpa
imdb_description: Directed by Jeff Tremaine.  With Johnny Knoxville, Jackson Nicoll, Gregorio, Georgina Cates. 86-year-old Irving Zisman takes a trip from Nebraska to North Carolina to take his 8 year-old grandson, Billy, back to his real father.
writer: Johnny Knoxville (screenplay), Spike Jonze (screenplay), Jeff Tremaine (screenplay), Johnny Knoxville (story), Spike Jonze (story), Jeff Tremaine (story), Fax Bahr (story), Adam Small (story)
awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 2 wins & 9 nominations.
plot: 86-year-old Irving Zisman takes a trip from Nebraska to North Carolina to take his 8 year-old grandson, Billy, back to his real father.
actors: Johnny Knoxville, Jackson Nicoll, Gregorio, Georgina Cates
sapo_description: Johnny Knoxville regressa ao seu papel de Jackass caracterizado como um avô de 86 anos, numa jornada através da América com o seu neto de 8 anos. As duas gerações de desordeiros prometem muitas partidas e situações divertidas...

title: Hall Pass
imdb_description: Directed by Bobby Farrelly, Peter Farrelly.  With Owen Wilson, Jason Sudeikis, Christina Applegate, Jenna Fischer. Rick and Fred, two husbands who are having difficulty in their marriages, are given a Hall Pass by their wives: for one week, they can do whatever they want.
writer: Pete Jones (screenplay), Peter Farrelly (screenplay), Kevin Barnett (screenplay), Bobby Farrelly (screenplay), Pete Jones (story)
plot: Rick and Fred, two husbands who are having difficulty in their marriages, are given a Hall Pass by their wives: for one week, they can do whatever they want.
actors: Owen Wilson, Jason Sudeikis, Jenna Fischer, Christina Applegate
sapo_description: Rick e Fred têm ambos casamentos de longa data. Quando começam a mostrar sinais de cansaço, as suas mulheres pensam num plano para revitalizar os casamentos: darem aos maridos um livre-trânsito - uma semana de liberdade para fazerem o que quiserem.

title: Tangled
imdb_description: Directed by Nathan Greno, Byron Howard.  With Mandy Moore, Zachary Levi, Donna Murphy, Ron Perlman. The magically long-haired Rapunzel has spent her entire life in a tower, but now that a runaway thief has stumbled upon her, she is about to discover the world for the first time, and who she really is.
writer: Dan Fogelman (screenplay by), Jacob Grimm (based upon the fairy tale "Rapunzel" by), Wilhelm Grimm (based upon the fairy tale "Rapunzel" by)
awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 9 wins & 40 nominations.
plot: The magically long-haired Rapunzel has spent her entire life in a tower, but now that a runaway thief has stumbled upon her, she is about to discover the world for the first time, and who she really is.
actors: Mandy Moore, Zachary Levi, Donna Murphy, Ron Perlman
sapo_description: A mágica Rapunzel de cabelos longos passou a sua vida inteira numa torre, mas agora que um ladrão fugitivo tropeçou sobre ela, está a ponto de descobrir o mundo pela primeira vez, e quem realmente é...

title: Furry Vengeance
imdb_description: Directed by Roger Kumble.  With Brendan Fraser, Brooke Shields, Ricky Garcia, Eugene Cordero. In the Oregon wilderness, a real-estate developer's new housing subdivision faces a unique group of protestors: local woodland creatures who don't want their homes disturbed.
plot: In the Oregon wilderness, a real-estate developer's new housing subdivision faces a unique group of protestors: local woodland creatures who don't want their homes disturbed.
actors: Brendan Fraser, Ricky Garcia, Eugene Cordero, Patrice O'Neal
sapo_description: Dan Sanders muda-se com a família para a floresta de Oregon, para supervisionar um empreendimento supostamente ecológico.

title: Cars 2
imdb_description: Directed by John Lasseter, Brad Lewis.  With Owen Wilson, Larry the Cable Guy, Michael Caine, Emily Mortimer. Star race car Lightning McQueen and his pal Mater head overseas to compete in the World Grand Prix race. But the road to the championship becomes rocky as Mater gets caught up in an intriguing adventure of his own: international espionage.
writer: John Lasseter (original story by), Brad Lewis (original story by), Dan Fogelman (original story by), Ben Queen (screenplay by)
awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 1 win & 18 nominations.
plot: Star race car Lightning McQueen and his pal Mater head overseas to compete in the World Grand Prix race. But the road to the championship becomes rocky as Mater gets caught up in an intriguing adventure of his own: international espionage.
actors: Larry the Cable Guy, Owen Wilson, Michael Caine, Emily Mortimer
sapo_description: O carro Relâmpago McQueen e seu colega Mater preparam-se para competir na corrida Grand Prix Mundial. Mas o caminho para o campeonato irá ser sinuoso quando Mater se vê envolvido em uma aventura intrigante de sua autoria: Espionagem internacional.

title: Delivery Man
imdb_description: Directed by Ken Scott.  With Vince Vaughn, Chris Pratt, Cobie Smulders, Jack Reynor. An affable underachiever finds out he's fathered 533 children through anonymous donations to a fertility clinic 20 years ago. Now he must decide whether or not to come forward when 142 of them file a lawsuit to reveal his identity.
writer: Ken Scott (written for the screen by), Ken Scott (original screenplay "Starbuck"), Martin Petit (original screenplay "Starbuck")
plot: An affable underachiever finds out he's fathered 533 children through anonymous donations to a fertility clinic 20 years ago. Now he must decide whether or not to come forward when 142 of them file a lawsuit to reveal his identity.
actors: Vince Vaughn, Chris Pratt, Cobie Smulders, Andrzej Blumenfeld
sapo_description: Um homem descobre que é pai de 533 crianças, graças a doações anónimas a clínicas de fertilidade 20 anos antes. Agora ele tem de decidir se revela a sua identidade, quando 142 dos seus filhos põem uma ação em tribunal para saberem quem é o pai.

title: Super 8
imdb_description: Directed by J.J. Abrams.  With Elle Fanning, AJ Michalka, Kyle Chandler, Joel Courtney. During the summer of 1979, a group of friends witness a train crash and investigate subsequent unexplained events in their small town.
plot: During the summer of 1979, a group of friends witness a train crash and investigate subsequent unexplained events in their small town.
actors: Joel Courtney, Jessica Tuck, Joel McKinnon Miller, Ryan Lee
sapo_description: No Verão de 1979, um grupo de amigos na pequena localidade do Ohio, testemunha um catastrófico desastre de comboio enquanto filmavam um filme em super 8. Mas depressa se apercebem que afinal não foi um acidente.

title: Non-Stop
imdb_description: Directed by Jaume Collet-Serra.  With Liam Neeson, Julianne Moore, Scoot McNairy, Michelle Dockery. An air marshal springs into action during a transatlantic flight after receiving a series of text messages demanding $150 million into an off-shore account, or someone will die every 20 minutes.
writer: John W. Richardson (screenplay), Christopher Roach (screenplay), Ryan Engle (screenplay), John W. Richardson (story), Christopher Roach (story)
plot: An air marshal springs into action during a transatlantic flight after receiving a series of text messages demanding $150 million into an off-shore account, or someone will die every 20 minutes.
actors: Liam Neeson, Julianne Moore, Scoot McNairy, Michelle Dockery
sapo_description: Durante um voo transatlântico entre Nova Iorque e Londres, o Air Marshall Bill Marks recebe uma série de misteriosos SMS, ordenando-lhe que instrua o governo a transferir 150 milhões de USD para uma conta ou um passageiro será morto a cada 20 minutos.

title: Mud
imdb_description: Directed by Jeff Nichols.  With Matthew McConaughey, Tye Sheridan, Jacob Lofland, Sam Shepard. Two young boys encounter a fugitive and form a pact to help him evade the vigilantes that are on his trail and to reunite him with his true love.
plot: Two young boys encounter a fugitive and form a pact to help him evade the vigilantes that are on his trail and to reunite him with his true love.
actors: Matthew McConaughey, Reese Witherspoon, Tye Sheridan, Jacob Lofland
sapo_description: Intrigados com a história de Mud, Ellis e Neckbone decidem ajudar o homem que, apesar de acusado de homicídio e ter caçadores de recompensas no seu encalce, justifica os seus crimes com o seu grande amor, que aguarda na cidade para fugir com ele.

title: Terminus
writer: Marc Furmie (screenplay by), Shiyan Zheng (screenplay by), Gabriel Dowrick (screenplay by)
plot: Following a near-fatal accident, David Chamberlain makes an unprecedented discovery that will not only determine the fate of his family, but of mankind.
actors: Jai Koutrae, Kendra Appleton, Todd Lasance, Bren Foster
sapo_description: Uma invasão de alienígenas ameaça o planeta Terra com um ultimato. O destino da humanidade está por um fio quando o presidente dos Estados Unidos tem de decidir se podem ou não confiar nestes seres.

title: Project Almanac
imdb_description: Directed by Dean Israelite.  With Amy Landecker, Sofia Black-D'Elia, Virginia Gardner, Jonny Weston. A group of teens discover secret plans of a time machine, and construct one. However, things start to get out of control.
plot: A group of teens discover secret plans of a time machine, and construct one. However, things start to get out of control.
actors: Jonny Weston, Sofia Black-D'Elia, Sam Lerner, Allen Evangelista
sapo_description: Um grupo de amigos descobre os planos para a construção de uma máquina do tempo, eles constroem a máquina e usam-na para resolver problemas e obter benefícios. Mas, à medida que o futuro deles começa a desmoronar com desastres, eles começam a perceber os efeitos irreversíveis causados pelas suas viagens no tempo, os jovens devem resolver este problema de uma vez por todas.

title: Mythica: The Necromancer
imdb_description: Directed by A. Todd Smith.  With Melanie Stone, Adam Johnson, Jake Stormoen, Nicola Posener. Mallister takes Thane prisoner and forces Marek and her team on a quest.
writer: Jason Faller, Liska Ostojic, Justin Partridge
plot: Mallister takes Thane prisoner and forces Marek and her team on a quest.
actors: Melanie Stone, Adam Johnson, Jake Stormoen, Nicola Posener
sapo_description: Quando o seu amigo mais leal é feito refém por Peregus Malister, o cruel mestre da Thieves Guild, Marek deve embarcar numa missão corrupta para servir a sua equipa de possíveis heróis. Mas quando a missão os leva para as garras de Szorlok - o seu maior inimigo - Marek deve sacrificar as suas ambições e talvez a sua própria alma antes que os seus amigos sejam mortos para impedir que Szorlok consiga o Darkspore.

title: CHIPS
imdb_description: Directed by Dax Shepard.  With Michael Peña, Dax Shepard, Vincent D'Onofrio, Rosa Salazar. A rookie officer is teamed with a hardened pro at the California Highway Patrol, though the newbie soon learns his partner is really an undercover Fed investigating a heist that may involve some crooked cops.
writer: Rick Rosner (based on the television series created by), Dax Shepard
plot: A rookie officer is teamed with a hardened pro at the California Highway Patrol, though the newbie soon learns his partner is really an undercover Fed investigating a heist that may involve some crooked cops.
actors: Michael Peña, Dax Shepard, Vincent D'Onofrio, Rosa Salazar
sapo_description: Um polícia novato e um veterano vão ter que trabalhar juntos, mas acabam por chocar nas suas diferenças.

title: The Lego Batman Movie
imdb_description: Directed by Chris McKay.  With Will Arnett, Michael Cera, Rosario Dawson, Ralph Fiennes. A cooler-than-ever Bruce Wayne must deal with the usual suspects as they plan to rule Gotham City, while discovering that he has accidentally adopted a teenage orphan who wishes to become his sidekick.
writer: Seth Grahame-Smith (screenplay by), Chris McKenna (screenplay by), Erik Sommers (screenplay by), Jared Stern (screenplay by), John Whittington (screenplay by), Seth Grahame-Smith (story by), Bob Kane (Batman created by), Bill Finger (Batman created by), Jerry Siegel (Superman created by), Joe Shuster (Superman created by), William Moulton Marston (Wonder Woman created by), Ole Kirk Christiansen (based on LEGO Construction Toys created by), Godtfred Kirk Christiansen (based on LEGO Construction Toys created by), Jens Nygaard Knudsen (based on LEGO Construction Toys created by)
plot: A cooler-than-ever Bruce Wayne must deal with the usual suspects as they plan to rule Gotham City, while discovering that he has accidentally adopted a teenage orphan who wishes to become his sidekick.
actors: Will Arnett, Michael Cera, Rosario Dawson, Ralph Fiennes
sapo_description: Existem várias mudanças a nascer em Gotham e se desejar salvar a cidade dos ataques do vilão Joker, Batman terá que aprender a abandonar o seu trabalho como vigilante solitário e a trabalhar com outros e talvez, apenas talvez, aprenda a relaxar...

title: Enter The Warriors Gate
imdb_description: Directed by Matthias Hoene.  With Mark Chao, Ni Ni, Dave Bautista, Sienna Guillory. A teenager is magically transported to China and learns to convert his video game skills into those of a Kung Fu warrior.
plot: A teenager is magically transported to China and learns to convert his video game skills into those of a Kung Fu warrior.
actors: Mark Chao, Ni Ni, Dave Bautista, Sienna Guillory
sapo_description: Um adolescente apaixonado por videojogos é acidentalmente transportado para o Universo mágico da China medieval com a missão de restabelecer a paz entre dois impérios, salvar a vida de uma princesa e se tornar num guerreiro e mestre de Kung Fu.

title: Kingsman: The Golden Circle
imdb_description: Directed by Matthew Vaughn.  With Taron Egerton, Colin Firth, Mark Strong, Channing Tatum. When their headquarters are destroyed and the world is held hostage, the Kingsman's journey leads them to the discovery of an allied spy organization in the United States. These two elite secret organizations must band together to defeat a common enemy.
writer: Jane Goldman, Matthew Vaughn, Mark Millar (based on the comic book "The Secret Service" by), Dave Gibbons (based on the comic book "The Secret Service" by)
plot: When their headquarters are destroyed and the world is held hostage, the Kingsman's journey leads them to the discovery of an allied spy organization in the United States. These two elite secret organizations must band together to defeat a common enemy.
actors: Taron Egerton, Edward Holcroft, Gordon Alexander, Mark Strong
sapo_description: Quando a sua sede é destruída e o mundo tido como refém, a jornada de Kingsman leva-os à descoberta de uma outra organização de espionagem nos EUA. Agora, estas duas organizações secretas têm de se unir, para derrotar um implacável inimigo comum.

title: Murder by Contract
imdb_description: Directed by Irving Lerner.  With Vince Edwards, Phillip Pine, Herschel Bernardi, Caprice Toriel. Claude is a ruthless and efficient contract killer - until he finds his next target is a woman.
plot: Claude is a ruthless and efficient contract killer - until he finds his next target is a woman.
actors: Vince Edwards, Phillip Pine, Herschel Bernardi, Caprice Toriel
sapo_description: Claude é um eficiente e letal assassino por contrato, mas quando descobre que o o seu próximo alvo é uma mulher começa a duvidar da sua capacidade para completar o trabalho.

title: Autumn Sonata
imdb_description: Directed by Ingmar Bergman.  With Ingrid Bergman, Liv Ullmann, Lena Nyman, Halvar Björk. A married daughter who longs for her mother's love is visited by the latter, a successful concert pianist.
awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 10 wins & 6 nominations.
plot: A married daughter who longs for her mother's love is visited by the latter, a successful concert pianist.
actors: Ingrid Bergman, Liv Ullmann, Lena Nyman, Halvar Björk
sapo_description: Eva escreve uma carta à sua mãe, Charlotte, uma pianista profissional que não vê há sete anos. A mãe chega e, após os primeiros momentos de afetividade, o encontro das duas mulheres muda de tom e transforma-se numa longa e dolorosa experiência.

title: Barbara
imdb_description: Directed by Mathieu Amalric.  With Jeanne Balibar, Mathieu Amalric, Vincent Peirani, Aurore Clément. A director wants to make a biopic about the female singer Barbara.
writer: Mathieu Amalric (screenplay), Philippe Di Folco (screenplay), Renaud Legrand (original idea), Pierre Léon (original idea)
plot: A director wants to make a biopic about the female singer Barbara.
actors: Jeanne Balibar, Mathieu Amalric, Vincent Peirani, Aurore Clément
sapo_description: Uma atriz, Brigitte, irá interpretar num filme a icónica cantora Barbara. Brigitte trabalha a personagem: a sua voz, as músicas, os gestos e as falas.

title: The Other Side of Hope
imdb_description: Directed by Aki Kaurismäki.  With Ville Virtanen, Kati Outinen, Tommi Eronen, Dome Karukoski. A poker-playing restaurateur and former traveling salesman befriends a group of refugees newly arrived to Finland.
plot: A poker-playing restaurateur and former traveling salesman befriends a group of refugees newly arrived to Finland.
actors: Ville Virtanen, Kati Outinen, Dome Karukoski, Tommi Korpela
sapo_description: A história de Khaled, um refugiado sírio na Finlândia. Quando as autoridades decidem extraditá-lo, este decide ficar ilegalmente em Helsínquia e é contratado por um caixeiro-viajante. Mas o destino depressa intervém, podendo conduzi-lo ao cemitério.

title: The Day After
imdb_description: Directed by Sang-soo Hong.  With Yunhee Cho, Ki Joabang, Min-hee Kim, Sae-byeok Kim. The married Bongwan leaves home in the dark morning and sets off to work. The memories of the woman who left weigh down on him. That day Bongwan's wife finds a love note, bursts into the office, and mistakes Areum for the woman who left.
plot: The married Bongwan leaves home in the dark morning and sets off to work. The memories of the woman who left weigh down on him. That day Bongwan's wife finds a love note, bursts into the office, and mistakes Areum for the woman who left.
actors: Yunhee Cho, Ki Joabang, Min-hee Kim, Sae-byeok Kim
sapo_description: É o primeiro dia de Areum numa pequena editora. Bongwan, o seu chefe, acabou recentemente a relação com a rapariga que estava no lugar de Areum.

title: The Dancer
imdb_description: Directed by Stéphanie Di Giusto.  With Soko, Gaspard Ulliel, Mélanie Thierry, Lily-Rose Depp. Loïe Fuller was the toast of the Folies Bergères at the turn of the 20th century and an inspiration for Toulouse-Lautrec and the Lumière Brothers. The film revolves around her complicated relationship with protégé and rival Isadora Duncan.
writer: Thomas Bidegain (collaboration), Giovanni Lista (novel), Stéphanie Di Giusto (adaptation), Stéphanie Di Giusto (dialogue), Stéphanie Di Giusto (screenplay), Sarah Thibau (adaptation), Sarah Thibau (dialogue), Sarah Thibau (screenplay)
plot: Loïe Fuller was the toast of the Folies Bergères at the turn of the 20th century and an inspiration for Toulouse-Lautrec and the Lumière Brothers. The film revolves around her complicated relationship with protégé and rival Isadora Duncan.
actors: Soko, Gaspard Ulliel, Mélanie Thierry, Lily-Rose Depp
sapo_description: Nada no passado de Loïe Fuller fazia prever que ela se tornaria num ícone da Belle Epoque, muito menos numa bailarina da Ópera de Paris. Mas Loïe deslumbra a capital francesa com Serpentine, a sua dança revolucionária, tornando-se num ícone.

title: The Layover
plot: Two friends on a road trip compete for the affections of a handsome man when their flight is redirected due to a hurricane.
actors: Kate Upton, Alexandra Daddario, Matt Barr, Matt Jones
sapo_description: Duas amigas em viagem disputam a atenção de um jovem atraente, quando o seu vôo é redirecionado por causa de um furacão.

title: The Sense of an Ending
imdb_description: Directed by Ritesh Batra.  With Jim Broadbent, Charlotte Rampling, Harriet Walter, Michelle Dockery. A man becomes haunted by his past and is presented with a mysterious legacy that causes him to re-think his current situation in life.
writer: Julian Barnes (novel), Nick Payne (adaptation), Nick Payne (screenplay)
plot: A man becomes haunted by his past and is presented with a mysterious legacy that causes him to re-think his current situation in life.
actors: Jim Broadbent, Charlotte Rampling, Harriet Walter, Michelle Dockery
sapo_description: Tony Webster tem uma existência tranquila até que segredos do passado, já enterrados, o obrigam a enfrentar lembranças de quando era jovem: a verdade sobre o seu primeiro amor e as devastadoras consequências de decisões tomadas há muitos anos.

title: Maya the Bee: The Honey Games
imdb_description: Directed by Noel Cleary, Sergio Delfino, Alexs Stadermann.  With Coco Jack Gillies, Benson Jack Anthony, Richard Roxburgh, Justine Clarke. When an overenthusiastic Maya accidentally embarrasses the Empress of Buzztropolis, she is forced to unite with a team of misfit bugs and compete in the Honey Games for a chance to save her hive.
writer: Noel Cleary (story), Fin Edquist (story), Kevin Peaty (addtl. story artist), Alexs Stadermann (story)
alias_titles: Abelha Maia: Os Jogos do Mel (V.P.)
plot: When an overenthusiastic Maya accidentally embarrasses the Empress of Buzztropolis, she is forced to unite with a team of misfit bugs and compete in the Honey Games for a chance to save her hive.
imdb_title: Maya the Bee: The Honey Games (2018)
sapo_title: Abelha Maia: Os Jogos do Mel
director: Noel Cleary, Sergio Delfino, Alexs Stadermann(co-director)
actors: Coco Jack Gillies, Benson Jack Anthony, Richard Roxburgh, Justine Clarke
sapo_description: A Abelha Maia está muito entusiasmada, mas acaba por causar uma situação embaraçosa à Imperatriz de Buzztropolis. Por causa deste descuido, Maia terá de se desculpar juntando-se a um grupo de insetos inadaptados e competir nos Jogos do Mel.

title: Seven Years in Tibet
imdb_description: Directed by Jean-Jacques Annaud.  With Brad Pitt, David Thewlis, BD Wong, Mako. True story of Heinrich Harrer, an Austrian mountain climber who became friends with the Dalai Lama at the time of China's takeover of Tibet.
awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 3 wins & 7 nominations.
plot: True story of Heinrich Harrer, an Austrian mountain climber who became friends with the Dalai Lama at the time of China's takeover of Tibet.
actors: Brad Pitt, David Thewlis, BD Wong, Mako
sapo_description: Um alpinista austríaco empreende uma viagem pelo Tibete testemunhando um marcante momento da sua história.

title: USS Indianapolis: Men of Courage
imdb_description: Directed by Mario Van Peebles.  With Nicolas Cage, Tom Sizemore, Thomas Jane, Matt Lanter. During World War II, an American navy ship is sunk by a Japanese submarine leaving 300 crewmen stranded in shark infested waters.
writer: Cam Cannon, Richard Rionda Del Castro
plot: During World War II, an American navy ship is sunk by a Japanese submarine leaving 300 crewmen stranded in shark infested waters.
actors: Nicolas Cage, Tom Sizemore, Thomas Jane, Matt Lanter
sapo_description: Em Julho de 1945, o navio de guerra USS Indianapolis entregou secretamente uma das duas bombas atómicas que viriam a pôr fim ao conflito. Atacado pelo Japão, o navio naufragou e a tripulação vê-se presa em águas infestadas de tubarões.

title: The River Wild
imdb_description: Directed by Curtis Hanson.  With Meryl Streep, Kevin Bacon, David Strathairn, Joseph Mazzello. Rafting expert Gail takes on a pair of armed killers while navigating a spectacularly violent river.

Ela e um decidido repórter de investigação querem dar a conhecer aquilo que descobriram, se viverem até poder fazê-lo.

Mas este é um desafio especial porque esta vila é a vila natal de Mina e o adorado restaurante local pertence agora a Clay Hart, uma velha paixão de liceu. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Deadly Sorority
imdb_description: Directed by Shawn Tolleson.  With Greer Grammer, Chloe Babcook, Steve Bacic, Moira Kelly. Suspicion actually starts to center on Sam, who will now have to find the killer in order to save her life.
plot: Best friends Samantha and Kristina go their separate ways for the first time when Kristina gets into the hottest sorority on campus. But the real separation comes when Kristina is murdered....

Classificação etária: M/12.

title: God Don't Make the Laws
imdb_description: God Don't Make the Laws (2011) on IMDb: Movies, TV, Celebs, and more...

In 2028 Detroit, when Alex Murphy, a loving husband, father and good cop, is critically injured in the line of duty, the multinational conglomerate OmniCorp sees their chance for a part-man, part-robot police officer.
writer: Joshua Zetumer, Edward Neumeier, Michael Miner, Edward Neumeier, Michael Miner
plot: In 2028 Detroit, when Alex Murphy, a loving husband, father and good cop, is critically injured in the line of duty, the multinational conglomerate OmniCorp sees their chance for a part-man, part-robot police officer.
actors: Joel Kinnaman, Gary Oldman, Michael Keaton, Abbie Cornish
sapo_description: Em 2028, após ser fatalmente ferido em ação, o agente Alex Murphy é salvo pela empresa que domina o mercado da tecnologia robótica. Regressa às ruas de Detroit assoladas pelo crime, com um conjunto de novas capacidades como o primeiro polícia ciborgue.

title: Earthtastrophe
imdb_description: Directed by Nick Lyon.  With Andrew J Katers, Alexa Mansour, Tonya Kay, Evan Sloan. In a white hot flash of light, and with no warning, one minute our moon is there, the next it's gone. Then, a second flash. And that's the last thing anyone on Earth can remember. 11 months later, it's not post- apocalyptic; it's apocalyptic as Earth has been sucked through a wormhole, literally ripping our planet from the inside out. With bizarre disasters and civilization collapsing, our heroes...
plot: In a white hot flash of light, and with no warning, one minute our moon is there, the next it's gone. Then, a second flash. And that's the last thing anyone on Earth can remember. 11 months...
actors: Andrew J Katers, Alexa Mansour, Tonya Kay, Evan Sloan
sapo_description: Num brilhante flash de luz e sem aviso, a nossa lua desaparece. Depois um segundo flash. E é a ultima coisa que toda a gente na Terra se lembra. Onze meses depois, não se vive um cenário pós-apocalíptico, mas sim um estado apocalíptico já que a Terra foi sugada para um buraco.

title: My Super Ex-Girlfriend
imdb_description: Directed by Ivan Reitman.  With Uma Thurman, Luke Wilson, Anna Faris, Rainn Wilson. When a regular guy dumps a superhero for her neediness, she uses her powers to make his life a living hell.

title: Rocky V
imdb_description: Directed by John G. Avildsen.  With Sylvester Stallone, Talia Shire, Burt Young, Sage Stallone. Reluctantly retired from boxing, and back from riches to rags, Rocky takes on a new protege who betrays him, as the champ's son must adjust to his family's new life after bankruptcy.

sapo_description: Rocky Balboa (Sylvester Stallone) regressa a casa, depois de um combate com o pugilista soviético Ivan Drago. Pouco depois, descobre que tantos anos de boxe provocaram uma lesão irreparável no seu cérebro. Para cúmulo, o seu contabilista e o seu cunhado delapidaram a sua fortuna e, além disso, deve uma grande soma de dinheiro aos Serviços Internos.

title: The Hundred-Foot Journey
imdb_description: Directed by Lasse Hallström.  With Helen Mirren, Om Puri, Manish Dayal, Charlotte Le Bon. The Kadam family leaves India for France where they open a restaurant directly across the road from Madame Mallory's Michelin-starred eatery.

A família Kadam, chefiada pelo pai, instala-se na antiga aldeia de Lumière, no Sul de França. Repleta de charme, ela é tão pitoresca como elegante, o lugar perfeito para se instalarem e abrirem um restaurante indiano, o Maison Mumbai.

title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop
imdb_description: Directed by Steve Carr.  With Kevin James, Keir O'Donnell, Jayma Mays, Raini Rodriguez. When a shopping mall is taken over by a gang of organized crooks, it's up to a mild-mannered security guard to save the day.

sapo_description: Com um coração que nunca desiste, um estômago que não para de dar horas e a promessa de proteger o seu território, ele é Paul Blart o Segurança do Shopping. Com o seu bigode impecavelmente aparado, o seu transporte pessoal e uma atitude de entrega total, Blart parece o único a levar o seu trabalho a sério. Tudo muda, porém, quando uma equipa de bandidos assume o controlo, fazendo reféns.

title: The Walk
imdb_description: Directed by Robert Zemeckis.  With Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Charlotte Le Bon, Guillaume Baillargeon, Émilie Leclerc. In 1974, high-wire artist Philippe Petit recruits a team of people to help him realize his dream: to walk the immense void between the World Trade Center towers.

title: A Dangerous Method

A arma de Jung é o método utilizado pelo seu mestre, o célebre Sigmund Freud (Viggo Mortensen). Ambos acabarão por cair no feitiço de Sabina.

title: The Ides of March
imdb_description: Directed by George Clooney.  With Paul Giamatti, George Clooney, Philip Seymour Hoffman, Ryan Gosling. An idealistic staffer for a new presidential candidate gets a crash course on dirty politics during his stint on the campaign trail.

title: Dare to Be Wild
imdb_description: Directed by Vivienne De Courcy.  With Emma Greenwell, Tom Hughes, Alex Macqueen, Janie Dee. Irishwoman Mary Reynold's journey from rank outsider to winner of a Gold Medal at the Chelsea Flower Show.

title: The Last Song
imdb_description: Directed by Julie Anne Robinson.  With Miley Cyrus, Liam Hemsworth, Greg Kinnear, Bobby Coleman. A rebellious girl is sent to a Southern beach town for the summer to stay with her father. Through their mutual love of music, the estranged duo learn to reconnect.

Um filme com argumento de Nicholas Sparks, que o escreveu ainda antes de editar o livro com o mesmo nome, escrito a pensar em Miley Cirus, a protagonista principal.

title: Deliver Us from Evil

No entanto, quando o Coronel Trautman é raptado pelos Russos na fronteira do Afeganistão, e o Governo Americano é incapaz de agir oficialmente, Rambo decide agir por sua conta e risco. Entre a vida e a morte, com a alma fora do corpo, ela observa os pais mortos e o seu próprio corpo inerte a ser socorrido por uma equipa médica.

sapo_description: A fome e a violência foram erradicadas da Terra, bem como os problemas climáticos do planeta foram resolvidos. Estes feitos foram conquistados graças aos seres alienígenas conhecidos como almas, que ocupam corpos humanos como se fossem parasitas.

title: Jack Ryan: Shadow Recruit
imdb_description: Directed by Kenneth Branagh.  With Chris Pine, Kevin Costner, Keira Knightley, Kenneth Branagh. Jack Ryan, as a young covert CIA analyst, uncovers a Russian plot to crash the U.S. economy with a terrorist attack.
writer: Adam Cozad, David Koepp, Tom Clancy (based on characters created by)
plot: Jack Ryan, as a young covert CIA analyst, uncovers a Russian plot to crash the U.S. economy with a terrorist attack.
actors: Chris Pine, Keira Knightley, Kevin Costner, Kenneth Branagh
sapo_description: Jack Ryan, é um analista financeiro de Wall Street, recrutado por William Harper com o intuito de investigar o terrorismo financeiro a nível global. Quando um acontecimento que ameaça a Economia Americana é descoberto, Jack tem de se aventurar, viajando para Moscovo para confrontar Viktor Cherevin, um empresário russo que se encontra por detrás de toda a trama.

title: Shooter
imdb_description: Directed by Antoine Fuqua.  With Mark Wahlberg, Michael Peña, Rhona Mitra, Danny Glover. A marksman living in exile is coaxed back into action after learning of a plot to kill the President. Ultimately double-crossed and framed for the attempt, he goes on the run to find the real killer and the reason he was set up.
plot: A marksman living in exile is coaxed back into action after learning of a plot to kill the President. Ultimately double-crossed and framed for the attempt, he goes on the run to find the real killer and the reason he was set up.
actors: Mark Wahlberg, Michael Peña, Danny Glover, Kate Mara
sapo_description: Um ex-atirador de grande perícia retirado depois de ter sido alvo de traição, é chamado para uma importante missão: proteger a vida do Presidente dos EUA.

title: Footloose
imdb_description: Directed by Herbert Ross.  With Kevin Bacon, Lori Singer, John Lithgow, Dianne Wiest. A city teenager moves to a small town where rock music and dancing have been banned, and his rebellious spirit shakes up the populace.
awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 1 win & 4 nominations.
plot: A city teenager moves to a small town where rock music and dancing have been banned, and his rebellious spirit shakes up the populace.
sapo_title: Footloose - A Música Está do teu Lado
actors: Kevin Bacon, Lori Singer, John Lithgow, Dianne Wiest
sapo_description: Ren McCormick é um rapaz criado na cidade grande que se muda para uma cidade pequena do interior. Disposto a organizar um baile de formatura, Ren acaba descobrindo que dançar não é permitido na cidade. Apaixonado por música, Ren decide lutar pela restauração da dança na cidade e, em meio a isso, acaba conquistando o coração de Ariel Moore.

title: Dead Poets Society
imdb_description: Directed by Peter Weir.  With Robin Williams, Robert Sean Leonard, Ethan Hawke, Josh Charles. English teacher John Keating inspires his students to look at poetry with a different perspective of authentic knowledge and feelings.
plot: English teacher John Keating inspires his students to look at poetry with a different perspective of authentic knowledge and feelings.
actors: Robin Williams, Robert Sean Leonard, Ethan Hawke, Josh Charles
sapo_description: A existência dos alunos de um colégio interno de grande prestígio é alterada pelas aulas do novo professor de Inglês. Um homem que irá mostrar-lhes a sociedade secreta do clube dos poetas mortos e que os animará a lutar contra o sistema estabelecido.

title: Jumanji
imdb_description: Directed by Joe Johnston.  With Robin Williams, Kirsten Dunst, Bonnie Hunt, Jonathan Hyde. When two kids find and play a magical board game, they release a man trapped for decades in it and a host of dangers that can only be stopped by finishing the game.
writer: Jonathan Hensleigh (screenplay), Greg Taylor (screenplay), Jim Strain (screenplay), Greg Taylor (screen story), Jim Strain (screen story), Chris Van Allsburg (screen story), Chris Van Allsburg (book)
plot: When two kids find and play a magical board game, they release a man trapped for decades in it and a host of dangers that can only be stopped by finishing the game.
actors: Robin Williams, Jonathan Hyde, Kirsten Dunst, Bradley Pierce
sapo_description: Alan Parris, de 12 anos, descobre o misterioso jogo Jumanji. Quando um dia se põe a jogar com a sua amiga Sarah é repentinamente assolado por estranhos fenómenos. Ao atirar os dados do jogo, Alan é transportado para o selvático reino de Jumanji, onde fica preso durante 26 anos.

title: TRON
imdb_description: Directed by Steven Lisberger.  With Jeff Bridges, Bruce Boxleitner, David Warner, Cindy Morgan. A computer hacker is abducted into the digital world and forced to participate in gladiatorial games where his only chance of escape is with the help of a heroic security program.
writer: Steven Lisberger (screenplay), Steven Lisberger (story), Bonnie MacBird (story)
awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 2 wins & 6 nominations.
plot: A computer hacker is abducted into the digital world and forced to participate in gladiatorial games where his only chance of escape is with the help of a heroic security program.
actors: Jeff Bridges, Bruce Boxleitner, David Warner, Cindy Morgan
sapo_description: Kevin Flynn (Jeff Bridges) é um jovem engenheiro de softwares que trabalha na ENCOM. Sua maior diversão, e também seu trabalho, é elaborar novos jogos de videogame. Kevin sonha em fundar sua própria companhia, mas seus projetos são roubados por Ed Dillinger (David Warner), que os apresenta como se fossem seus.

title: The Odd Life of Timothy Green
imdb_description: Directed by Peter Hedges.  With Jennifer Garner, Joel Edgerton, CJ Adams, Odeya Rush. A childless couple bury a box in their backyard, containing all of their wishes for an infant. Soon, a child is born, though Timothy Green is not all that he appears.
plot: A childless couple bury a box in their backyard, containing all of their wishes for an infant. Soon, a child is born, though Timothy Green is not all that he appears.
imdb_title: The Odd Life of Timothy Green (2012)
sapo_title: A Extraordinária Vida de Timothy Green
actors: Jennifer Garner, Joel Edgerton, CJ Adams, Odeya Rush
sapo_description: Cindy e Jim formam um casal feliz, mas que não pode ter filhos biológicos. Tudo muda quando, inesperadamente, o jovem Timothy lhes aparece à porta e eles o acolhem. Mas Timothy é um miúdo bem diferente do que eles podiam estar à espera.

title: Gothika
imdb_description: Directed by Mathieu Kassovitz.  With Halle Berry, Penélope Cruz, Robert Downey Jr., Charles S. Dutton. A repressed female psychiatrist wakes up as a patient in the asylum where she worked, with no memory of why she is there or what she has done.
plot: A repressed female psychiatrist wakes up as a patient in the asylum where she worked, with no memory of why she is there or what she has done.
actors: Halle Berry, Robert Downey Jr., Charles S. Dutton, John Carroll Lynch
sapo_description: Miranda Grey, uma psicóloga que trabalha com delinquentes, acorda certo dia numa das celas da prisão onde trabalha. Julgam-na responsável pela morte do marido, mas ela não se lembra de nada. Enquanto procura recuperar a memória e descobrir a verdade, coisas estranhas vão acontecer.

title: Salvador
imdb_description: Directed by Oliver Stone.  With James Woods, Jim Belushi, Michael Murphy, John Savage. An American photojournalist gets caught in a political struggle at El Salvador in 1980.
awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 3 wins & 7 nominations.
plot: An American photojournalist gets caught in a political struggle at El Salvador in 1980.
actors: James Woods, Jim Belushi, Michael Murphy, John Savage
sapo_description: Em 1980, mulheres e crianças estão a ser brutalmente assassinados numa guerra civil em El Salvador. O cenário é horrível, mas perfeito para Richard Boyle, um fotojornalista em busca de um novo fôlego na carreira, que, apesar de toda a sua experiência, vai ter dificuldade em lidar com aquilo que vê.

title: Pride of Lions
imdb_description: Directed by Sidney J. Furie.  With Bo Svenson, Margot Kidder, Louis Gossett Jr., Seymour Cassel. Four retired ex-military personnel and another retiree attempt the unthinkable and dust off their old uniforms for one last explosive mission to rescue their grandchildren.
plot: Four retired ex-military personnel and another retiree attempt the unthinkable and dust off their old uniforms for one last explosive mission to rescue their grandchildren.
actors: Bo Svenson, Margot Kidder, Louis Gossett Jr., Seymour Cassel
sapo_description: Cinco soldados americanos são feitos prisioneiros no Afeganistão pelos talibã. Como o exército norte-americano é demasiado lento a intervir, os avós dos capturados, quase todos ex-militares na reforma, voltam a colocar a farda e voam até à Ásia para os salvar.

title: The Pirates! Band of Misfits
imdb_description: Directed by Peter Lord, Jeff Newitt.  With Hugh Grant, Salma Hayek, Jeremy Piven, Martin Freeman. Pirate Captain sets out on a mission to defeat his rivals Black Bellamy and Cutlass Liz for the Pirate of the year Award. The quest takes Captain and his crew from the shores of Blood Island to the foggy streets of Victorian London.
plot: Pirate Captain sets out on a mission to defeat his rivals Black Bellamy and Cutlass Liz for the Pirate of the year Award. The quest takes Captain and his crew from the shores of Blood Island to the foggy streets of Victorian London.
actors: Hugh Grant, Martin Freeman, Imelda Staunton, David Tennant
sapo_description: Com uma tripulação maltrapilha a seu lado, o Capitão dos Piratas tem um sonho: derrotar os seus rivais Black Bellamy e Liz Lâmina e ganhar o Prémio de Pirata do Ano. Para tal, lança-se numa aventura que o leva da costa da exótica Ilha Sangrenta até às ruas enevoadas da Londres Vitoriana.

title: Miami Vice
imdb_description: Directed by Michael Mann.  With Colin Farrell, Jamie Foxx, Li Gong, Naomie Harris. Based on the 1980s TV action/drama, this update focuses on vice detectives Crockett and Tubbs as their respective personal and professional lives become dangerously intertwined.
plot: Based on the 1980s TV action/drama, this update focuses on vice detectives Crockett and Tubbs as their respective personal and professional lives become dangerously intertwined.
actors: Colin Farrell, Jamie Foxx, Li Gong, Naomie Harris
sapo_description: Sonny Crockett e Ricardo Tubbs descobrem que uma fuga de informação conduziu à chacina de agentes federais infiltrados e ao homicídio da família de um informador amigo. A investigação leva-os até uma sofisticada rede global de traficantes.

title: Proof of Life
imdb_description: Directed by Taylor Hackford.  With Meg Ryan, Russell Crowe, David Morse, Pamela Reed. Alice hires a professional negotiator to obtain the release of her engineer husband, who has been kidnapped by anti-government guerrillas in South America.
writer: Tony Gilroy, William Prochnau (article), Thomas Hargrove (book)
plot: Alice hires a professional negotiator to obtain the release of her engineer husband, who has been kidnapped by anti-government guerrillas in South America.

sapo_description: Alice contrata um negociador profissional para conseguir a libertação do marido, um engenheiro que foi raptado pelas guerrilhas anti-governanentais da América do Sul.

title: Selma
imdb_description: Directed by Ava DuVernay.  With David Oyelowo, Carmen Ejogo, Tim Roth, Lorraine Toussaint. A chronicle of Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr.'s campaign to secure equal voting rights via an epic march from Selma to Montgomery, Alabama, in 1965.
plot: A chronicle of Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr.'s campaign to secure equal voting rights via an epic march from Selma to Montgomery, Alabama, in 1965.

title: Jurassic World
imdb_description: Directed by Colin Trevorrow.  With Chris Pratt, Bryce Dallas Howard, Ty Simpkins, Judy Greer. A new theme park, built on the original site of Jurassic Park, creates a genetically modified hybrid dinosaur, which escapes containment and goes on a killing spree.

sapo_description: Em 1993, milhões de espectadores em todo o mundo ficaram de respiração suspensa perante as imagens de uma ilha repleta de dinossauros. No filme, as criaturas tinham sido resgatadas da extinção através da clonagem, graças à mente visionária do multimilionário John Hammond (Richard Attenborough). Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Mike and Dave Need Wedding Dates
imdb_description: Directed by Jake Szymanski.  With Zac Efron, Adam Devine, Anna Kendrick, Aubrey Plaza. Two hard-partying brothers place an online ad to find the perfect dates for their sister's Hawaiian wedding. Hoping for a wild getaway, the boys instead find themselves out-hustled by an uncontrollable duo.
plot: Two hard-partying brothers place an online ad to find the perfect dates for their sister's Hawaiian wedding. Hoping for a wild getaway, the boys instead find themselves out-hustled by an uncontrollable duo.

sapo_description: Dave e Mike Stangle são dois irmãos que, obrigados pelos pais, precisam de levar companhia para o casamento da irmã no Havai (EUA). Isto porque é frequente, sempre que a família se junta, fazerem 30 por uma linha e destruírem tudo na busca por diversão e festa. Para isso, põem um anúncio online e vão à televisão. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Resident Evil: Afterlife
imdb_description: Directed by Paul W.S. Anderson.  With Milla Jovovich, Ali Larter, Wentworth Miller, Kim Coates. While still out to destroy the evil Umbrella Corporation, Alice joins a group of survivors living in a prison surrounded by the infected who also want to relocate to the mysterious but supposedly unharmed safe haven known only as Arcadia.
plot: While still out to destroy the evil Umbrella Corporation, Alice joins a group of survivors living in a prison surrounded by the infected who also want to relocate to the mysterious but supposedly unharmed safe haven known only as Arcadia.

Na sequência de uma experiência secreta, ocorre um surto epidémico de um vírus que transforma os infetados em zombies. Classificação etária: M/16.

title: Star Trek: Into Darkness
imdb_description: Directed by J.J. Abrams.  With Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto, Zoe Saldana, Benedict Cumberbatch. After the crew of the Enterprise find an unstoppable force of terror from within their own organization, Captain Kirk leads a manhunt to a war-zone world to capture a one-man weapon of mass destruction.

Com o Capitão Kirk a liderar o grupo de resistentes, terão de encontrar o responsável pelo sucedido e restaurar a paz e equilíbrio à civilização. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Seeking Justice
imdb_description: Directed by Roger Donaldson.  With Nicolas Cage, January Jones, Guy Pearce, Harold Perrineau. After his wife is assaulted, a husband enlists the services of a vigilante group to help him settle the score. Then he discovers they want a 'favor' from him in return.

title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
imdb_description: Directed by David Fincher.  With Daniel Craig, Rooney Mara, Christopher Plummer, Stellan Skarsgård. Journalist Mikael Blomkvist is aided in his search for a woman who has been missing for forty years by Lisbeth Salander, a young computer hacker.

title: Brave
imdb_description: Directed by Mark Andrews, Brenda Chapman, Steve Purcell.  With Kelly Macdonald, Billy Connolly, Emma Thompson, Julie Walters. title: The Oranges
imdb_description: Directed by Julian Farino.  With Leighton Meester, Hugh Laurie, Catherine Keener, Allison Janney. The enduring friendship between the Walling and Ostroff families is tested when Nina, the prodigal Ostroff daughter, returns home for the holidays after a five-year absence and enters into an affair with David, head of the Walling family.

title: Wild Hogs
imdb_description: Directed by Walt Becker.  With Tim Allen, Martin Lawrence, John Travolta, William H. Macy. A group of suburban biker wannabes looking for adventure hit the open road, but get more than they bargained for when they encounter a New Mexico gang called the Del Fuegos.

title: Saving Mr. Banks
imdb_description: Directed by John Lee Hancock.  With Emma Thompson, Tom Hanks, Annie Rose Buckley, Colin Farrell. Author P.L. Travers reflects on her childhood after reluctantly meeting with Walt Disney, who seeks to adapt her Mary Poppins books for the big screen.

title: Oceans Rising
imdb_description: Directed by Adam Lipsius.  With Jason Tobias, Summer Spiro, DeJean Brown, Paola Menacho. A scientist builds a boat after his warnings of an Earth-destroying flood are ignored. But when it's evident the disaster will occur, those who maligned the scientist now turn to him in desperation, boarding the boat and seeking his answers before the world drowns in a never ending sea.

title: Renegades
imdb_description: Directed by Steven Quale.  With J.K. Simmons, Sullivan Stapleton, Charlie Bewley, Sylvia Hoeks. A team of Navy SEALs discover an underwater treasure in a Bosnian lake.

title: American Assassin

Seria o batom vermelho ou a recusa em recitar a Prece Matinal? Ou a maneira como olhava para o seu irmão Jason... como se ele fosse a sobremesa? Classificação etária: M/12.

Depois das aventuras do passado, Percy vê-se a braços com uma enorme responsabilidade: a salvação dos da sua raça. Classificação etária: M/12.

Classificação etária: M/12.

Lançado para uma batalha entre a luz (o bem) e a escuridão (o mal) o nosso herói embarca numa viagem no tempo e atravessa séculos para encontrar seis símbolos (madeira, bronze, ferro, água, fogo e pedra) que liberta a luz e impede que o mal se erga.

title: Jalouse

title: Cult of Chucky

title: Replace

Classificação etária: M/12.

imdb_description: Directed by Pieter Jan Brugge.  With Robert Redford, Willem Dafoe, Helen Mirren, Alessandro Nivola. As an executive is held captive by an employee, it's up to his wife to deliver the ransom.

Subitamente, Eileen vê a sua casa repleta de agentes do FBI. Numa terrível luta pela libertação, Wayne e Eileen ganham uma nova perceção do seu casamento e das suas vidas.

title: Savages
imdb_description: Directed by Oliver Stone.  With Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Taylor Kitsch, Blake Lively, Benicio Del Toro. Pot growers Ben and Chon face off against the Mexican drug cartel who kidnapped their shared girlfriend.

Só que um violento cartel mexicano, liderado pela impiedosa Elena e o seu braço direito Lado, quer forçar uma parceria e vai pôr à prova a amizade entre eles.

title: Step Up
imdb_description: Directed by Anne Fletcher.  With Channing Tatum, Jenna Dewan, Damaine Radcliff, De'Shawn Washington. title: Along Came Polly
imdb_description: Directed by John Hamburg.  With Ben Stiller, Jennifer Aniston, Debra Messing, Philip Seymour Hoffman. A buttoned up newlywed finds his too organized life falling into chaos when he falls in love with an old classmate.

sapo_description: Reuben, um homem obcecado pela ordem e que detesta o risco, descobre que a mulher o trai na lua-de-mel e apaixona-se por Polly. Só que ela gosta de adrenalina e de experiências novas, e ele vai ter de provar que é capaz de resistir a tudo para a ter ao seu lado.

title: Inconceivable
imdb_description: Directed by Jonathan Baker.  With Gina Gershon, Nicky Whelan, Nicolas Cage, Sienna Soho Baker. A mother looks to escape her abusive past by moving to a new town where she befriends another mother, who grows suspicious of her.

plot: A woman interprets a kiss at a high school reunion as an invitation to follow her ex across the country and supplant his current family.
actors: Natasha Henstridge, Marguerite Moreau, Jason Gerhardt, Sammi Hanratty
sapo_description: Quando Gary Emerson revê a sua namorada do Secundário numa reunião, ele pensa em reconectar-se. Embora ele esteja feliz no seu casamento com Jenna. Gary e Valerie concordam em ficar amigos, mas Gary não tem ideia de que Valerie já mudou de casa para reacender sua antiga paixão. No momento em que Gary e Jenna percebem que Val está obcecada, ela já se infiltrou nas suas vidas e está a persegui-los implacavelmente. Eles tentam de tudo para se livrar dela, mesmo recorrendo a uma ordem de restrição judicial. Irritada com a rejeição, Valerie vai atrás da família com os olhos postos num assassinato. Gary é emboscado uma noite enquanto caminhava até ao carro e fica gravemente ferido. Com o marido no hospital e a segurança de seus dois filhos pequenos em jogo, Jenna decide resolver o problema com as próprias mãos e acabar com o reinado de terror de Valerie de uma vez por todas.

title: The Good Mistress
plot: A woman's one-night stand turns out to be her friend's husband, and a local political candidate.

title: The Wrestler
imdb_description: Directed by Darren Aronofsky.  With Mickey Rourke, Marisa Tomei, Evan Rachel Wood, Mark Margolis. A faded professional wrestler must retire, but finds his quest for a new life outside the ring a dispiriting struggle.

Vinte anos mais tarde, é uma estrela caída em desgraça, que vive numa roulote, sem contacto com a filha e que conta apenas com a amizade de uma stripper. Classificação etária: M/16.

title: Australia

Steve (Matthew Broderick), pai e amante do Natal, leva uma vida decidida, bem planeada e organizada.

Antes que Annalise a consiga encontrar, a rapariga foi atraída para uma rede de tráfico humano. Cabe a Annalise resgatá-la antes que seja tarde demais. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Romans
imdb_description: Directed by Ludwig Shammasian, Paul Shammasian.  With Janet Montgomery, Orlando Bloom, Charlie Creed-Miles, Anne Reid. An adult victim of childhood sexual abuse confronts the horrors of his past.

imdb_description: Directed by Geoffrey Sax.  With Halle Berry, Stellan Skarsgård, Phylicia Rashad, Chandra Wilson. A drama centered on a go-go dancer with multiple personality disorder who struggles to remain her true self and begins working with a psychotherapist to uncover the mystery of the inner ghosts that haunt her.

title: River
plot: In the south of Laos, an American volunteer doctor becomes a fugitive after he intervenes in the sexual assault of a young woman. When the assailant's body is pulled from the Mekong River, things quickly spiral out of control.
actors: Rossif Sutherland, Douangmany Soliphanh, Sara Botsford, Ted Atherton
sapo_description: No sul do Laos, um médico voluntário americano torna-se fugitivo depois de ajudar uma jovem brutalmente atacada. Quando o corpo do agressor aparece à beira do Rio Mekong, as coisas ganham rapidamente proporções inesperadas.

title: The Expendables 2
imdb_description: Directed by Simon West.  With Sylvester Stallone, Liam Hemsworth, Randy Couture, Jean-Claude Van Damme. Mr. Church reunites the Expendables for what should be an easy paycheck, but when one of their men is murdered on the job, their quest for revenge puts them deep in enemy territory and up against an unexpected threat.
writer: Richard Wenk (screenplay), Sylvester Stallone (screenplay), Ken Kaufman (story), David Agosto (story), Richard Wenk (story), Dave Callaham (characters)
plot: Mr. Church reunites the Expendables for what should be an easy paycheck, but when one of their men is murdered on the job, their quest for revenge puts them deep in enemy territory and up against an unexpected threat.
actors: Sylvester Stallone, Jason Statham, Jet Li, Dolph Lundgren
sapo_description: Quando Mr. Church decide reunir o velho grupo de Mercenários, a operação, apesar de perigosa, parece relativamente simples. Porém, quando inesperadamente um deles acaba por ser barbaramente assassinado, o que era uma missão igual a tantas outras torna-se, para cada um deles, numa missão de honra e vingança. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Kidnapped: The Hannah Anderson Story
imdb_description: Directed by Peter Sullivan.  With Jessica Amlee, Scott Patterson, Brian McNamara, Jay Pickett. Follows the abduction of 16 year old girl in California in 2013.
writer: Jeffrey Schenck (story by), Peter Sullivan (story by), Hanz Wasserburger (story by,  screenplay by)
plot: Follows the abduction of 16 year old girl in California in 2013.
imdb_title: Kidnapped: The Hannah Anderson Story (TV Movie 2015)
actors: Jessica Amlee, Scott Patterson, Brian McNamara, Jay Pickett
sapo_description: Uma drama baseado em factos reais sobre o rapto de uma rapariga de 16 anos em Agosto de 2013. Hannah Anderson foi levada após os treinos da claque, num subúrbio de San Diego, por um amigo da família. Os corpos da sua mãe e irmão foram encontrados mais tarde nesse dia na casa queimada de James DiMaggio. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Just Go with It
imdb_description: Directed by Dennis Dugan.  With Adam Sandler, Jennifer Aniston, Brooklyn Decker, Nicole Kidman. On a weekend trip to Hawaii, a plastic surgeon convinces his loyal assistant to pose as his soon-to-be-divorced wife in order to cover up a careless lie he told to his much-younger girlfriend.
writer: Allan Loeb (screenplay), Timothy Dowling (screenplay), I.A.L. Diamond (screenplay "Cactus Flower"), Abe Burrows (stage play), Pierre Barillet (French play), Jean-Pierre Grédy (French play)
plot: On a weekend trip to Hawaii, a plastic surgeon convinces his loyal assistant to pose as his soon-to-be-divorced wife in order to cover up a careless lie he told to his much-younger girlfriend.
actors: Adam Sandler, Jennifer Aniston, Nicole Kidman, Nick Swardson
sapo_description: Danny (Adam Sandler) é um jovem e bem-sucedido cirurgião plástico que, embora solteiro, usa um estratagema de engate muito pouco convencional: diz que é casado, evitando assim envolvimentos mais profundos. Isto, até se apaixonar perdidamente por Palmer (Brooklyn Decker), a sua mais recente conquista. Mas, infelizmente, a rapariga julga que ele é casado. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Neighbors
plot: After they are forced to live next to a fraternity house, a couple with a newborn baby do whatever they can to take them down.
actors: Seth Rogen, Rose Byrne, Elise Vargas, Zoey Vargas
sapo_description: A viver num bairro tranquilo, Mac e Kelly Radner estão ainda no processo de adaptação à sua nova condição de pais. Apesar de algumas frustrações e percalços, o casal estava longe de imaginar o inferno que lhe estava destinado quando a casa ao lado da sua se transformou numa residência universitária. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Into the Woods
imdb_description: Directed by Rob Marshall.  With Anna Kendrick, Meryl Streep, Chris Pine, Emily Blunt. A witch tasks a childless baker and his wife with procuring magical items from classic fairy tales to reverse the curse put on their family tree.
writer: James Lapine (screenplay by), James Lapine (based on the musical by)
awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 11 wins & 71 nominations.

sapo_description: Uma abordagem moderna aos contos dos irmãos Grimm, combinando algumas histórias clássicas como Cinderela ou Capuchinho Vermelho. Uma história original que envolve um padeiro e a sua mulher, o seu desejo de iniciarem família e a bruxa que os amaldiçoou.

title: The Uninvited
imdb_description: Directed by Charles Guard, Thomas Guard.  With Emily Browning, Arielle Kebbel, Elizabeth Banks, David Strathairn. Anna returns home after a stint in a mental hospital, but her recovery is jeopardized by her cruel stepmother and ghastly visions of her dead mother.

sapo_description: Anna regressa a casa para junto da sua irmã depois de internada numa instituição psiquiátrica. Mas a sua recuperação corre algum perigo por causa da sua cruel madrasta e da presença de um fantasma em sua casa.

title: If I Had Wings
imdb_description: If I Had Wings (2013) on IMDb: Movies, TV, Celebs, and more...

title: The Starving Games
imdb_description: Directed by Jason Friedberg, Aaron Seltzer.  With Maiara Walsh, Brant Daugherty, Cody Christian, Lauren Bowles. In this Hunger Games spoof, Kantmiss Evershot must fight for her life in the 75th annual Starving Games, where she could also win an old ham, a coupon for a foot-long sub, and a partially eaten pickle.
plot: In this Hunger Games spoof, Kantmiss Evershot must fight for her life in the 75th annual Starving Games, where she could also win an old ham, a coupon for a foot-long sub, and a partially eaten pickle.

title: Devil's Knot
imdb_description: Directed by Atom Egoyan.  With Colin Firth, Reese Witherspoon, Alessandro Nivola, James Hamrick. The savage murders of three young children sparks a controversial trial of three teenagers accused of killing the kids as part of a Satanic ritual.

title: War, Inc.
imdb_description: Directed by Joshua Seftel.  With John Cusack, Marisa Tomei, Hilary Duff, Joan Cusack. A corporation hires a professional assassin to pose as its trade show representative who must organize the wedding of a Middle Eastern pop star, which will allow him the opportunity to kill a Middle Eastern politician.

title: Detroit
imdb_description: Directed by Kathryn Bigelow.  With John Boyega, Anthony Mackie, Algee Smith, Jacob Latimore. Fact-based drama set during the 1967 Detroit riots in which a group of rogue police officers respond to a complaint with retribution rather than justice on their minds.

sapo_description: Uma vaga de protestos ocorre em Detroit, no ano de 1967, quando uma operação policial não autorizada provoca a revolta entre a população. Os agentes da autoridade intervêm, mas a justiça da sua forma de atuar é questionável. Baseada em factos reais.

title: Just Getting Started
imdb_description: Directed by Ron Shelton.  With Morgan Freeman, Tommy Lee Jones, Rene Russo, Joe Pantoliano. A two-hander action comedy in the vein of Midnight Run (1988), about an ex-F.B.I. Agent (Tommy Lee Jones) and an ex-mob lawyer in the Witness Protection Program (Morgan Freeman) having to put aside their petty rivalry on the golf course to fend off a mob hit.

title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales

title: Loveless
imdb_description: Directed by Andrey Zvyagintsev.  With Maryana Spivak, Aleksey Rozin, Matvey Novikov, Marina Vasileva. A couple going through a divorce must team up to find their son who has disappeared during one of their bitter arguments.

title: The Square
imdb_description: Directed by Ruben Östlund.  With Claes Bang, Elisabeth Moss, Dominic West, Terry Notary. A prestigious Stockholm museum's chief art curator finds himself in times of both professional and personal crisis as he attempts to set up a controversial new exhibit.

title: On Body and Soul

When slaughterhouse workers Endre and Mária discover they share the same dreams - where they meet in a forest as deer and fall in love - they decide to make their dreams come true but it's difficult in real life.

title: The Deadline
imdb_description: Directed by Lambert Hillyer.  With Buck Jones, Loretta Sayers, Robert Ellis, Edward LeSaint. On parole from prison for a murder he did not commit, and not allowed to carry a gun, Buck sets out to find the real killer. His clue is a corner torn off a wanted poster with some handwriting on it.
writer: Lambert Hillyer (scenario), Lambert Hillyer (story and dialogue)

sapo_description: Este documentário mostra a luta dos habitantes de St. Louis, no Missouri, para manter as suas famílias em segurança, sabendo que as terras daquela região serviram de aterro ilegal para material radiativo, resultante da produção das primeiras armas nucleares.

title: Dark Skull
imdb_description: Directed by Kiro Russo.  With Narciso Choquecallata, Anastasia Daza López, Felix Espejo Espejo, Israel Hurtado. 'There is nothing inside but you, a jorney deep inside yourself, a darker kind of journey.'

title: Based on a True Story
imdb_description: Directed by Roman Polanski.  With Emmanuelle Seigner, Eva Green, Vincent Perez, Dominique Pinon. A writer goes through a tough period after the release of her latest book, as she gets involved with an obsessive admirer.

title: The Violent Men

title: Six Degrees of Separation

title: The Thing Called Love

title: Philomena

title: The Autopsy of Jane Doe

title: Public Enemies
imdb_description: Directed by Michael Mann.  With Christian Bale, Johnny Depp, Christian Stolte, Jason Clarke. The Feds try to take down notorious American gangsters John Dillinger, Baby Face Nelson and Pretty Boy Floyd during a booming crime wave in the 1930s.

title: Witching and Bitching

Mas este lindo menino está prestes a bater no fundo quando uma acrobacia aérea para um filme corre mal, e o pomposo cão se encontra sozinho e abandonado numa cidade que não lhe é familiar.
