Carl Hanratty é um agente do FBI, cuja única missão consiste em seguir a sua pista e capturá-lo para levá-lo á justiça, mas Frank vai sempre um passo mais à frente.

Há apenas um problema; o cartão que usa para financiar estes seus desvaneios tem o nome 'Sandy Bigelow Patterson'...

Rapidamente, a sua vida é virada do avesso e já ninguém percebe o que é real e o que é encenado...

imdb_description: Directed by Paul Verhoeven.  With Arnold Schwarzenegger, Sharon Stone, Michael Ironside, Rachel Ticotin. When a man goes for virtual vacation memories of the planet Mars, an unexpected and harrowing series of events forces him to go to the planet for real - or does he?
writer: Philip K. Dick (short story "We Can Remember It For You Wholesale"), Ronald Shusett (screen story), Dan O'Bannon (screen story), Jon Povill (screen story), Ronald Shusett (screenplay), Dan O'Bannon (screenplay), Gary Goldman (screenplay)

actors: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Rachel Ticotin, Sharon Stone, Ronny Cox

Ele tem esperança de vir a descobrir mais sobre o seu sonho e por isso marca uma estadia na Rekall Inc. onde se vendem memórias artificias. Mas algo não corre bem durante o processo de implantação e Quaid agora recorda ser um agente secreto em luta contra Cohaagen, o cruel administrador de Marte.

title: Spy Time
imdb_description: Directed by Javier Ruiz Caldera.  With Imanol Arias, Quim Gutiérrez, Alexandra Jiménez, Berto Romero. Adolfo, a thirty something security guard, is going through a bad patch. Not only his lifetime girlfriend has just to finished with him to be a guy with no ambition but, moreover, he becomes the target of a series of thugs led by Vázquez, a dangerous criminal who has just escaped from jail. Also he discovers that his father has a double identity. He is not a farmer engaged in the production of ...

title: The Other Guys
imdb_description: Directed by Adam McKay.  With Will Ferrell, Mark Wahlberg, Derek Jeter, Eva Mendes. Two mismatched New York City detectives seize an opportunity to step up like the city's top cops, whom they idolize, only things don't quite go as planned.
plot: Two mismatched New York City detectives seize an opportunity to step up like the city's top cops, whom they idolize, only things don't quite go as planned.

sapo_description: Os detetives da polícia de Nova Iorque, Christopher Danson e P. K. Highsmith são os mais respeitados e adorados polícias da cidade. No mesmo departamento, trabalham Allen Gamble e Terry Hoitz. Eles não são heróis - são os Agentes de Reserva. Mas todos os polícias têm o seu dia, e Gamble e Hoitz vêem-se envolvidos num caso complicado, em que mais ninguém quis pegar.

title: Insidious: Chapter 2
imdb_description: Directed by James Wan.  With Patrick Wilson, Rose Byrne, Barbara Hershey, Lin Shaye. The Lamberts believe that they have defeated the spirits that have haunted their family, but they soon discover that evil is not beaten so easily.

title: To Live and Die in L.A.

title: No Good Deed
imdb_description: Directed by Sam Miller.  With Taraji P. Henson, Idris Elba, Leslie Bibb, Kate del Castillo. An unstable escaped convict terrorizes a woman who is alone with her two children.
plot: An unstable escaped convict terrorizes a woman who is alone with her two children.
actors: Idris Elba, Taraji P. Henson, Leslie Bibb, Kate del Castillo

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
imdb_description: Directed by Peter Jackson.  With Elijah Wood, Ian McKellen, Viggo Mortensen, Orlando Bloom. While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

sapo_title: O Senhor Dos Anéis - As Duas Torres

sapo_description: A Irmandade desfez-se mas a demanda para destruir o Anel prossegue. Frodo e Sam terão de confiar as suas vidas a Gollum para conseguirem encontrar o caminho para Mordor. Com a aproximação do exército de Saruman, os sobreviventes da Irmandade preparam-se para a batalha. Começou a Guerra do Anel.

title: Hairspray
imdb_description: Directed by Adam Shankman.  With John Travolta, Queen Latifah, Nikki Blonsky, Michelle Pfeiffer. Pleasantly plump teenager Tracy Turnblad teaches 1962 Baltimore a thing or two about integration after landing a spot on a local TV dance show.

sapo_description: Tracy Turnblad, uma rapariga grande e com um coração ainda maior, tem o sonho de aparecer no programa de dança da televisão de Baltimore. Mas quando dizem que sua figura está fora das normas, ela acaba por ensinar a todos uma lição sobre integração numa época em que ser diferente começava a ser bom.

title: At Risk
imdb_description: Directed by Tom McLoughlin.  With Andie MacDowell, Daniel Sunjata, Annabeth Gish, Barclay Hope. A district attorney wants to further her political dreams by solving an old murder.
plot: A district attorney wants to further her political dreams by solving an old murder.
actors: Andie MacDowell, Daniel Sunjata, Annabeth Gish, Barclay Hope
sapo_description: Uma promotora quer aprofundar os seus sonhos políticos ao resolver um velho homicídio. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Love on the Air
imdb_description: Directed by Kristoffer Tabori.  With Alison Sweeney, Jonathan Scarfe, Crystal Balint, David Lewis. Competing radio personalities in Chicago find common ground when they have to work together.
writer: Sharon Soboil (teleplay), Tippi Dobrofsky (teleplay), Neal H. Dobrofsky (teleplay), Sharon Soboil (story)
plot: Competing radio personalities in Chicago find common ground when they have to work together.
actors: Alison Sweeney, Jonathan Scarfe, Crystal Balint, David Lewis
sapo_description: Depois de a locutora de rádio Sonia ser deixada pelo seu noivo em directo, durante um programa sobre relações amorosas, os seus conselhos amorosos passaram a ser azedos. Os responsáveis da rádio, decidem arranjar-lhe um novo parceiro, para apresentar o programa com ela, no entanto, as suas opiniões são muito diferentes e há muito atrito entre ambos. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: You, Me and Dupree
imdb_description: Directed by Anthony Russo, Joe Russo.  With Kate Hudson, Owen Wilson, Matt Dillon, Michael Douglas. A best man (Wilson) stays on as a houseguest with the newlyweds, much to the couple's annoyance.

actors: Owen Wilson, Kate Hudson, Matt Dillon, Michael Douglas
sapo_description: Carl (Matt Dillon) e Molly (Kate Hudson) estão a começar as suas vidas como casal. Têm uma boa casa, empregos estáveis e uma vizinhança pacata. Neste mundo perfeito, só há uma falha - Dupree (Owen Wilson), o melhor amigo de Carl e um eterno solteirão. Dupree acaba de perder a casa e o emprego, e Carl decide convidá-lo a ficar no sofá durante uns dias... Classificação etária: M/12.

title: RED 2
imdb_description: Directed by Dean Parisot.  With Bruce Willis, Helen Mirren, John Malkovich, Anthony Hopkins. Retired C.I.A. Agent Frank Moses reunites his unlikely team of elite operatives for a global quest to track down a missing portable nuclear device.
writer: Jon Hoeber, Erich Hoeber, Warren Ellis (characters), Cully Hamner (characters)
plot: Retired C.I.A. Agent Frank Moses reunites his unlikely team of elite operatives for a global quest to track down a missing portable nuclear device.

sapo_description: O reformado agente da CIA Frank Moses reúne a sua equipa de improváveis agentes de elite para a missão de descobrir um dispositivo letal de última geração desaparecido, que pode alterar o equilíbrio do poder mundial. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Road House
imdb_description: Directed by Rowdy Herrington.  With Patrick Swayze, Kelly Lynch, Sam Elliott, Ben Gazzara. A tough bouncer is hired to tame a dirty bar.
writer: R. Lance Hill (story), R. Lance Hill (screenplay), Hilary Henkin (screenplay)
plot: A tough bouncer is hired to tame a dirty bar.
actors: Patrick Swayze, Kelly Lynch, Sam Elliott, Ben Gazzara
sapo_description: Um especialista em resolver desordens em bares chega a uma pequena cidade para melhorar o ambiente num clube, mas dará também um novo ambiente à cidade. Classificação etária: M/16.

title: House at the End of the Street
imdb_description: Directed by Mark Tonderai.  With Jennifer Lawrence, Elisabeth Shue, Max Thieriot, Gil Bellows. After moving with her mother to a small town, a teenager finds that an accident happened in the house at the end of the street. Things get more complicated when she befriends a boy who was the only survivor of the accident.
plot: After moving with her mother to a small town, a teenager finds that an accident happened in the house at the end of the street. Things get more complicated when she befriends a boy who was the only survivor of the accident.
imdb_title: House at the End of the Street (2012)
sapo_title: A Casa do Fim da Rua
actors: Jennifer Lawrence, Max Thieriot, Elisabeth Shue, Gil Bellows
sapo_description: Mãe e filha mudam-se para uma nova comunidade e vão morar ao lado de uma casa onde uma jovem psicótica assassinou os pais. Mas rapidamente, as duas descobrem que a história da sinistra casa está longe de terminar.

title: The Immigrant
imdb_description: Directed by James Gray.  With Marion Cotillard, Joaquin Phoenix, Jeremy Renner, Dagmara Dominczyk. 1921. An innocent immigrant woman is tricked into a life of burlesque and vaudeville until a dazzling magician tries to save her and reunite her with her sister who is being held in the confines of Ellis Island.
plot: 1921. An innocent immigrant woman is tricked into a life of burlesque and vaudeville until a dazzling magician tries to save her and reunite her with her sister who is being held in the confines of Ellis Island.
actors: Marion Cotillard, Joaquin Phoenix, Jeremy Renner, Dagmara Dominczyk
sapo_description: Em 1921, Ewa Cybulski e sua irmã Magda saem da Polónia rumo a Nova Iorque em busca de um novo começo e do sonho americano. Quando chegam a Ellis Island, os médicos descobrem que Magda está doente e as duas são separadas.

title: Upside Down
imdb_description: Directed by Juan Solanas.  With Jim Sturgess, Kirsten Dunst, Timothy Spall, Blu Mankuma. Adam and Eden fell in love as teens despite the fact that they live on twinned worlds with gravities that pull in opposite directions. Ten years after a forced separation, Adam sets out on a dangerous quest to reconnect with his love.
writer: Juan Solanas (screenplay), Juan Solanas (adaptation), Santiago Amigorena (adaptation), Pierre Magny (adaptation)
plot: Adam and Eden fell in love as teens despite the fact that they live on twinned worlds with gravities that pull in opposite directions. Ten years after a forced separation, Adam sets out on a dangerous quest to reconnect with his love.
actors: Jim Sturgess, Kirsten Dunst, Timothy Spall, Blu Mankuma
sapo_description: Adam e Eden apaixonaram-se, mas vivem uma relação complicada. Estão separados não só pela classe social e sistema político, mas também por uma insólita condição planetária: vivem em mundos geminados, com gravidades que os puxam em direções opostas.

title: Top Secret!
imdb_description: Directed by Jim Abrahams, David Zucker, Jerry Zucker.  With Val Kilmer, Lucy Gutteridge, Peter Cushing, Jeremy Kemp. Parody of WWII spy movies in which an American rock and roll singer becomes involved in a Resistance plot to rescue a scientist imprisoned in East Germany.
writer: Jim Abrahams, David Zucker, Jerry Zucker, Martyn Burke
plot: Parody of WWII spy movies in which an American rock and roll singer becomes involved in a Resistance plot to rescue a scientist imprisoned in East Germany.
director: Jim Abrahams, David Zucker, Jerry Zucker
actors: Val Kilmer, Lucy Gutteridge, Peter Cushing, Jeremy Kemp
sapo_description: A estrela americana do Rock, Nick Rivers, defronta o temível Alto Comando da Alemanha de Leste. É uma corrida contra o tempo que Nick tem de fazer, para ajudar Hillary Flammond a encontrar o seu pai antes que ele consiga criar a definitiva super arma...

title: Alice in Wonderland
imdb_description: Directed by Tim Burton.  With Mia Wasikowska, Johnny Depp, Helena Bonham Carter, Anne Hathaway. Nineteen-year-old Alice returns to the magical world from her childhood adventure, where she reunites with her old friends and learns of her true destiny: to end the Red Queen's reign of terror.
plot: Nineteen-year-old Alice returns to the magical world from her childhood adventure, where she reunites with her old friends and learns of her true destiny: to end the Red Queen's reign of terror.
actors: Johnny Depp, Mia Wasikowska, Helena Bonham Carter, Anne Hathaway
sapo_description: Alice com 19 anos de idade regressa ao excêntrico mundo que encontrou pela primeira vez quando era criança, numa fantástica viagem para encontrar o seu verdadeiro destino e acabar com o reino de terror da Rainha Vermelha...

title: Tropic Thunder
imdb_description: Directed by Ben Stiller.  With Ben Stiller, Jack Black, Robert Downey Jr., Jeff Kahn. Through a series of freak occurrences, a group of actors shooting a big-budget war movie are forced to become the soldiers they are portraying.

awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 10 wins & 43 nominations.
plot: Through a series of freak occurrences, a group of actors shooting a big-budget war movie are forced to become the soldiers they are portraying.
actors: Jeff Kahn, Robert Downey Jr., Anthony Ruivivar, Jack Black
sapo_description: Cinco atores muito diferentes são confrontados com traficantes de heroína verdadeiros, quando se encontram a filmar uma nova obra na selva vietnamita.

title: Killer Elite
imdb_description: Directed by Gary McKendry.  With Jason Statham, Clive Owen, Robert De Niro, Dominic Purcell. When his mentor is taken captive by a disgraced Arab sheik, a killer-for-hire is forced into action. His mlission: kill three members of Britain's elite Special Air Service responsible for the death of his sons.
plot: When his mentor is taken captive by a disgraced Arab sheik, a killer-for-hire is forced into action. His mlission: kill three members of Britain's elite Special Air Service responsible for the death of his sons.

sapo_description: Ao envolver-se numa intriga que o obriga a sair de um exilio autoimposto, Danny volta a reunir a sua equipa de especialistas para executar uma missão quase impossível - resgatar Hunter, o seu antigo mentor e parceiro.

title: Day Watch
imdb_description: Directed by Timur Bekmambetov.  With Konstantin Khabenskiy, Mariya Poroshina, Vladimir Menshov, Galina Tyunina. A man who serves in the war between the forces of Light and Dark comes into possession of a device that can restore life to Moscow, which was nearly destroyed by an apocalyptic event.

plot: A man who serves in the war between the forces of Light and Dark comes into possession of a device that can restore life to Moscow, which was nearly destroyed by an apocalyptic event.
actors: Konstantin Khabenskiy, Mariya Poroshina, Vladimir Menshov, Galina Tyunina
sapo_description: A antiga guerra entre as forças da Luz e da Escuridão está perto do fim. Cada lado ganhou um poderoso guardião, que se dirigem para um conflito decisivo. De um lado está o filho de Anton Gorodetsky (Konstantin Khabensky), Yegor (Dmitry Martynov), que se uniu às forças da Escuridão.

title: Brain on Fire
imdb_description: Directed by Gerard Barrett.  With Chloë Grace Moretz, Thomas Mann, Richard Armitage, Carrie-Anne Moss. A young, capable professional cannot explain her newly erratic behavior.
plot: A young, capable professional cannot explain her newly erratic behavior.

actors: Chloë Grace Moretz, Thomas Mann, Richard Armitage, Carrie-Anne Moss
sapo_description: A história verídica de Susannah Cahalan, já publicada em livro, uma jovem jornalista com uma carreira promissora, que descobre que possui uma doença misteriosa que a irá começar a levar à loucura.

title: Murder on the Orient Express
imdb_description: Directed by Kenneth Branagh.  With Kenneth Branagh, Penélope Cruz, Willem Dafoe, Judi Dench. When a murder occurs on the train he's travelling on, celebrated detective Hercule Poirot is recruited to solve the case.
writer: Michael Green (screenplay by), Agatha Christie (based upon the novel by)
plot: When a murder occurs on the train he's travelling on, celebrated detective Hercule Poirot is recruited to solve the case.

actors: Paapa Essiedu, Yassine Zeroual, Asan N'Jie, Michael Rouse
sapo_description: Baseado no best-seller de Agatha Christie, ´Um Crime no Expresso do Oriente´ conta a história de 13 estranhos presos num comboio onde ocorreu um crime e onde todos são suspeitos. Caberá ao célebre detetive Hercule Poirot descobrir o culpado.

title: Days of Darkness
imdb_description: Directed by Denys Arcand.  With Marc Labrèche, Diane Kruger, Sylvie Léonard, Caroline Néron. Jean-Marc Leblanc (Labrèche), a desperate civil servant, escapes reality as we all know it, to imagine himself as the hero in imaginary adventures.
plot: Jean-Marc Leblanc (Labrèche), a desperate civil servant, escapes reality as we all know it, to imagine himself as the hero in imaginary adventures.
actors: Marc Labrèche, Diane Kruger, Sylvie Léonard, Caroline Néron
sapo_description: Jean é um homem com uma vida insignificante, desprezado por todos que, sempre que pode, foge da realidade para uma vida cheia de coisas excitantes que apenas existem na sua imaginação. Mas um dia decide mudar e dar uma hipótese à vida real.

title: Ali and Nino
imdb_description: Directed by Asif Kapadia.  With Adam Bakri, María Valverde, Mandy Patinkin, Connie Nielsen. Love story of a Muslim Azerbaijani boy and Christian Georgian girl in Baku from 1918 to 1920.
plot: Love story of a Muslim Azerbaijani boy and Christian Georgian girl in Baku from 1918 to 1920.
sapo_title: Ali e Nino: Uma História de Amor
actors: Adam Bakri, María Valverde, Mandy Patinkin, Connie Nielsen
sapo_description: Azerbeijão, 1918: apesar de ele ser muçulmano e ela cristã, Ali e Nino vão contra a vontade dos pais e casam-se. Ao início, parece que a sua paixão será suficiente para neutralizar as suas diferenças, mas a união do casal é rapidamente posta à prova.

title: The Gunman
imdb_description: Directed by Pierre Morel.  With Sean Penn, Idris Elba, Jasmine Trinca, Javier Bardem. A sniper on a mercenary assassination team, kills the minister of mines of the Congo. Terrier's successful kill shot forces him into hiding. Returning to the Congo years later, he becomes the target of a hit squad himself.
writer: Jean-Patrick Manchette (novel), Don MacPherson (screenplay), Pete Travis (screenplay), Sean Penn (screenplay)
plot: A sniper on a mercenary assassination team, kills the minister of mines of the Congo. Terrier's successful kill shot forces him into hiding. Returning to the Congo years later, he becomes the target of a hit squad himself.
actors: Sean Penn, Jasmine Trinca, Javier Bardem, Ray Winstone
sapo_description: Jim Terrier é um ex-agente governamental cujo passado regressa para o atormentar quando é atraiçoado e se vê no centro de uma conspiração que pretende vê-lo morto. Para sobreviver, Terrier tem de destruir uma poderosa organização mundial.

title: Into the Blue
imdb_description: Directed by John Stockwell.  With Paul Walker, Jessica Alba, Scott Caan, Ashley Scott. A group of divers find themselves in deep trouble with a drug lord after they come upon the illicit cargo of a sunken airplane.
plot: A group of divers find themselves in deep trouble with a drug lord after they come upon the illicit cargo of a sunken airplane.
actors: Paul Walker, Jessica Alba, Scott Caan, Ashley Scott
sapo_description: Paul Walker e Jessica Alba aquecem o ecrã como dois mergulhadores que sonham encontrar tesouros escondidos. Quando levam alguns amigos (Scott Caan e Ashley Scott) numa aventura de desportos radicais, a última coisa que esperam ver, sob as águas infestadas de tubarões, é um barco de piratas lendário, que conterá milhões de dólares em ouro.

title: The Magnificent Seven
imdb_description: Directed by Antoine Fuqua.  With Denzel Washington, Chris Pratt, Ethan Hawke, Vincent D'Onofrio. Seven gunmen in the old west gradually come together to help a poor village against savage thieves.
writer: Akira Kurosawa (based on the screenplay by), Shinobu Hashimoto (based on the screenplay by), Hideo Oguni (based on the screenplay by), Nic Pizzolatto (screenplay), Richard Wenk (screenplay)
plot: Seven gunmen in the old west gradually come together to help a poor village against savage thieves.
actors: Denzel Washington, Chris Pratt, Ethan Hawke, Vincent D'Onofrio
sapo_description: Uma aldeia mexicana é aterrorizada pelo bandido Calvera (Eli Wallach) e os seus capangas armados. Sete mercenários Americanos são contratados para proteger a aldeia. O grupo treina os aldeões a usarem armas, enquanto montam uma armadilha a Calvera. Os bandidos sofrem baixas depois de um assalto, mas reorganizam-se para capturarem os sete pistoleiros.

title: The Colony
imdb_description: Directed by Jeff Renfroe.  With Kevin Zegers, Laurence Fishburne, Bill Paxton, Charlotte Sullivan. Forced underground by the next ice age, a struggling outpost of survivors must fight to preserve humanity against a threat even more savage than nature.
writer: Jeff Renfroe (screenplay), Svet Rouskov (screenplay), Patrick Tarr (screenplay), Patrick Tarr (story), Pascal Trottier (screenplay), Pascal Trottier (story)
plot: Forced underground by the next ice age, a struggling outpost of survivors must fight to preserve humanity against a threat even more savage than nature.
actors: Kevin Zegers, Laurence Fishburne, Bill Paxton, Charlotte Sullivan
sapo_description: No futuro, uma nova Era do Gelo afeta a Terra, destruindo quase toda a população do planeta. Os raros sobreviventes encontram abrigos subterrâneos, onde a vida é precária. Mas logo um pequeno grupo de resistentes vai descobrir uma ameaça ainda mais perigosa do que o clima hostil.

title: Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol
imdb_description: Directed by Brad Bird.  With Tom Cruise, Jeremy Renner, Simon Pegg, Paula Patton. The IMF is shut down when it's implicated in the bombing of the Kremlin, causing Ethan Hunt and his new team to go rogue to clear their organization's name.
writer: Bruce Geller (television series "Mission: Impossible"), Josh Appelbaum, André Nemec
plot: The IMF is shut down when it's implicated in the bombing of the Kremlin, causing Ethan Hunt and his new team to go rogue to clear their organization's name.
country: USA, United Arab Emirates, Czech Republic, Russia, India, Canada
actors: Tom Cruise, Paula Patton, Simon Pegg, Jeremy Renner
sapo_description: Acusado do atentado terrorista ao Kremlin, o operacional do FMI Ethan Hunt é renegado bem como o resto da agência, quando o Presidente inicia a Operação Fantasma. Sem recursos ou apoios, Ethan terá de encontrar uma forma de limpar o nome da agência e prevenir outro ataque.

title: Bat*21
imdb_description: Bat*21 (1988) on IMDb: Movies, TV, Celebs, and more...
writer: William C. Anderson (book), William C. Anderson (screenplay), George Gordon (screenplay)
plot: During the Vietnam War, Colonel Hambleton's aircraft is shot down over enemy territory and a frantic rescue operation ensues.
actors: Gene Hackman, Danny Glover, Jerry Reed, David Marshall Grant
sapo_description: Durante a guerra do Vietname, um avião de reconhecimento americano é abatido por um míssil de ataque. O único sobrevivente da tripulação, o Tenente Coronel Iceal Hambleton, é um especialista em armamento e os seus conhecimentos neste campo são imprescindíveis para o exército americano. Os seus colegas vão tentar resgatá-lo antes de que o Vietcong o encontre.

title: Lakeview Terrace
imdb_description: Directed by Neil LaBute.  With Samuel L. Jackson, Patrick Wilson, Kerry Washington, Ron Glass. Based on a true story, a troubled and racist African-American L.A.P.D. Officer will stop at nothing to force out a friendly interracial couple who just moved in next door to him.
writer: David Loughery (screenplay), Howard Korder (screenplay), David Loughery (story)
plot: A troubled and racist African-American LAPD officer will stop at nothing to force out a friendly interracial couple who just moved in next door to him.
actors: Samuel L. Jackson, Patrick Wilson, Kerry Washington, Ron Glass
sapo_description: Um jovem casal muda-se para a sua casa de sonho na Califórnia e tornam-se o alvo do vizinho do lado, que não suporta que sejam o casal inter-racial.

title: A Wolf at the Door
imdb_description: Directed by Fernando Coimbra.  With Leandra Leal, Milhem Cortaz, Fabiula Nascimento, Tamara Taxman. A journey to the dark cutting edge of desires, lies and wickedness of a love triangle, from the moment a child is mysteriously kidnapped.

Logo descobre que Bernardo mantinha uma amante, Rosa (Leandra Leal), que é levada à delegacia para averiguações.

Classificação etária: M/16.

A guerra entre Gesser, o Senhor da Luz, e Zavulon, o General das Trevas, é travada há mais de mil anos e está prestes a começar na Rússia dos dias de hoje.

Após divorciar-se da sua esposa Robin, Lee começa a encontrar-se com muita gente rica e bonita, parcialmente através do jornalismo, parcialmente porque tem um argumento para apresentar. Mas a vida nessas esferas é difícil e o sucesso transforma-se sempre em derrota.

Classificação etária: M/16.

À medida que a contagem descendente para a destruição começa, Bond terá de viajar até à Jamaica onde vai encontrar a bela Honey Ryder (Ursula Andress) e confrontar o megalómano vilão na ilha do seu maciço quartel-general. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Kedi

title: Category 5
imdb_description: Directed by Rob King.  With Burt Reynolds, C. Thomas Howell, Lisa Sheridan, 'Magic' Matt Alan. After a family survives Hurricane Katrina, there is another storm but this one is much worse.

title: Northern Lights
imdb_description: Directed by Mike Robe.  With LeAnn Rimes, Eddie Cibrian, Greg Lawson, Rosanna Arquette. Nate Burns accepts a job as chief of police in Lunacy, Alaska, hoping to to get away from the traumatic death of his partner back in Baltimore. He meets Meg, an independent bush pilot, whose father is found dead in a mountain cave.

title: Stop the Wedding
imdb_description: Directed by Anne Wheeler.  With Rachel Boston, Niall Matter, Lini Evans, Alan Thicke. A meddling man and woman determined to stop a wedding for the good of the bride and groom instead wind up falling in love with each other.

Anna voa para Seattle para travar o casamento e conhece Clay, o filho de Martin, que também quer impedir o casamento do pai. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Striking Distance
imdb_description: Directed by Rowdy Herrington.  With Bruce Willis, Sarah Jessica Parker, Dennis Farina, Tom Sizemore. Coming from a police family, Tom Hardy ends up fighting his uncle after the murder of his father. Tom believes the killer is another cop, and goes on the record with his allegations. Demoted then to river duty, the killer taunts Tom.
plot: Coming from a police family, Tom Hardy ends up fighting his uncle after the murder of his father. Tom believes the killer is another cop, and goes on the record with his allegations. Demoted then to river duty, the killer taunts Tom.

title: That Awkward Moment
imdb_description: Directed by Tom Gormican.  With Zac Efron, Michael B. Jordan, Miles Teller, Imogen Poots. Three best friends find themselves where we've all been - at that confusing moment in every dating relationship when you have to decide "So...where is this going?"

title: Jurassic Park III
imdb_description: Directed by Joe Johnston.  With Sam Neill, William H. Macy, Téa Leoni, Alessandro Nivola. A decidedly odd couple with ulterior motives convince Dr. Grant to go to Isla Sorna, resulting in an unexpected landing, and unexpected new inhabitants on the island.

title: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor

title: Footloose
imdb_description: Directed by Craig Brewer.  With Kenny Wormald, Julianne Hough, Dennis Quaid, Andie MacDowell. City teenager Ren MacCormack moves to a small town where rock music and dancing have been banned, and his rebellious spirit shakes up the populace.

Ela vive numa cabana ali perto e faz questão que ele conheça a sua neta orfã, a teimosa dona de restaurante Lena. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Wedding Bells
imdb_description: Directed by Gary Yates.  With Danica McKellar, Kavan Smith, Tammy Gillis, Christopher Russell. Nick também não está entusiasmado com a ideia de trabalhar com Molly, mas decide fazê-lo para bem de James, o noivo. Classificação etária: M/12.

Classificação etária: M/12.

Agora, quando volta para a zona de quarentena para expor os arquitetos da epidemia, vai descobrir um segredo ainda pior do que poderia ter imaginado.

Damien and Leito return to District 13 on a mission to bring peace to the troubled sector that is controlled by five different gang bosses, before the city's secret services take drastic measures to solve the problem.

title: Mean Machine

imdb_description: Directed by Andrew de Villiers.  With Meredith Monroe, Rick Ravanello, Nicole LaPlaca, Lochlyn Munro. A woman travels from Los Angeles to Seattle to try to prevent her sister from going to prison for murder.

sapo_description: Após sofrer um choque traumático, Ellie parece ter a habilidade de ver pessoas e ouvir vozes que os outros não conseguem. Inicialmente aterrorizada, ela rapidamente se apercebe que poderá usar este dom para ajudar pessoas com a perda de entes queridos. Rapidamente fica envolvida com um homem e o seu jovem filho, que está em fuga após ser acusado de matar a sua esposa. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Men in Black II
imdb_description: Men in Black II (2002) on IMDb: Movies, TV, Celebs, and more...

J e K voltam a unir-se para criar a melhor defesa contra o que poderá vir a constituir o maior desafio numa missão dos Homens de Negro: proteger a Terra da nova escória do universo.

title: Men in Black 3
imdb_description: Directed by Barry Sonnenfeld.  With Will Smith, Tommy Lee Jones, Josh Brolin, Jemaine Clement. Agent J travels in time to M.I.B.'s early days in 1969 to stop an alien from assassinating his friend Agent K and changing history.

Mas quando a vida de K e o destino do planeta estão em jogo, o agente J terá que viajar para trás no tempo para remediar as coisas.

title: Analyze This
imdb_description: Directed by Harold Ramis.  With Robert De Niro, Billy Crystal, Lisa Kudrow, Chazz Palminteri. A comedy about a psychiatrist whose number one patient is an insecure mob boss.

No entanto não é fácil dizer-lhe que 'os seus 40 minutos de consulta acabaram', porque este está habituado a ter os seus assalariados a seu mando.

imdb_description: Directed by Kurt Wimmer.  With Milla Jovovich, Cameron Bright, Nick Chinlund, Sebastien Andrieu. Assim, compreendendo que o tempo não espera, tomam uma decisão absolutamente inesperada: terem um filho, com todas as vantagens de uma amizade e sem os aborrecimentos de uma relação convencional.

title: The Constant Gardener
imdb_description: Directed by Fernando Meirelles.  With Ralph Fiennes, Rachel Weisz, Danny Huston, Hubert Koundé. A widower is determined to get to the bottom of a potentially explosive secret involving his wife's murder, big business, and corporate corruption.

O seu marido Justin, assombrado pelo remorso e revoltado com rumores sobre as infidelidades dela, embarca numa perigosa odisseia em busca da verdade que revelará uma conspiração a nível global.

Sobrevive à custa de todo o tipo de biscates e negócios de contrafação até ser descoberto por Harvey Boarden (Terrence Howard), um conhecido marginal da zona, que reconhece nele um talento inato para as lutas de rua. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Bridal Boot Camp
imdb_description: Directed by Jake Helgren.  With Spencer Locke, Jake Sandvig, Aeriél Miranda, Cameron Richardson. When pretty dress-maker Andy joins a motley crew of brides-to-be for a grueling bridal boot camp, where young ladies learn how to become "better" brides, she thinks she's found the perfect place to become the perfect bride. But when Andy meets Casey, a handsome delivery man who doesn't believe in marriage, she starts to question her picture perfect image of her current engagement and what ...
plot: When pretty dress-maker Andy joins a motley crew of brides-to-be for a grueling bridal boot camp, where young ladies learn how to become "better" brides, she thinks she's found the perfect ...

No entanto, depois de falar com a sua melhor amiga Felice, Andy começa a questionar-se sobre a sua capacidade de manter um casamento forte e duradouro. Apesar de estar relutante, Andy decide ir a um boot camp para noivas. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Tribute

A former child star buys her grandmother's house to rescue it from ruin but her hope for serenity is soon eclipsed by haunting dreams of her famous grandmother, who died of a supposed overdose in the house more than 30 years ago.

Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Burlesque
imdb_description: Directed by Steve Antin.  With Cher, Christina Aguilera, Alan Cumming, Eric Dane. A small-town girl ventures to Los Angeles and finds her place in a neo-burlesque club run by a former dancer.

Um dia decide deixar a sua vida para trás e partir para Los Angeles, onde percebe que as oportunidades de mostrar o seu talento são raras. Até que descobre o Burlesque, um cabaré em decadência gerido por Tess (Cher), para quem o espectáculo é a sua vida. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Wonder

title: Rescue Dawn

title: Summer Villa

A sua melhor amiga e editora, Leslie, deixa-a ficar na quinta da sua família em França para organizar as ideias e inspirar-se. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: You Only Live Twice

A sua emocionante missão leva-o ao Japão, onde ele enfrenta a terrível organização SPECTRE e o seu diabólico líder Ernst Stavro Blofeld (Donald Pleasence)! Classificação etária: M/12.

imdb_description: Directed by Peter R. Hunt.  With George Lazenby, Diana Rigg, Telly Savalas, Gabriele Ferzetti. James Bond woos a mob boss's daughter and goes undercover to uncover the true reason for Blofeld's allergy research in the Swiss Alps that involves beautiful women from around the world.

Mas o poderoso líder do grupo, Ernst Stavro Blofeld (Telly Savalas) prepara o maior plano da sua vida: uma guerra biológica capaz de matar milhões. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: The Bourne Identity
imdb_description: Directed by Doug Liman.  With Franka Potente, Matt Damon, Chris Cooper, Clive Owen. A man is picked up by a fishing boat, bullet-riddled and suffering from amnesia, before racing to elude assassins and attempting to regain his memory.

Meio morto e completamente amnésico, não tem qualquer lembrança do passado ou documento de identidade. No entanto, fala várias línguas e possui uma série de conhecimentos de luta e autodefesa que deixam adivinhar um passado perigoso. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Hunt to Kill

Tudo piora quando uma tripulação de fugitivos faz de Jim e da sua filha reféns. Classificação etária: M/16.

title: 2 Lava 2 Lantula!

title: Dear White People

plot: The lives of four black students at an Ivy League college.

sapo_description: Quatro estudantes negros entram numa universidade da Ivy League, onde um tumulto irrompe depois de uma festa temática ´afro-americana´ promovida por estudantes brancos. Uma sátira ao racismo e ao pensamento condescendente sobre a diversidade racial.

title: The Outsider
imdb_description: Directed by Randa Haines.  With Tim Daly, Naomi Watts, Keith Carradine, David Carradine. A western love story revolving around the forbidden love between a young widow from a Mennonite-like religious group and a cold-blooded gunslinger whom she takes into her home after he is wounded.
plot: A western love story revolving around the forbidden love between a young widow from a Mennonite-like religious group and a cold-blooded gunslinger whom she takes into her home after he is wounded.

title: Jobs

A bordo vai o detetive Hercule Poirot, que terá de descobrir qual dos extravagantes passageiros presos no comboio é o assassino.

awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 16 wins & 8 nominations.
plot: A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.
actors: Martin Balsam, John Fiedler, Lee J. Cobb, E.G. Marshall
sapo_description: Doze jurados tentam chegar a um veredito num julgamento, em que um adolescente é acusado de ter esfaqueado o próprio pai até à morte.

title: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen
imdb_description: Directed by Michael Bay.  With Shia LaBeouf, Megan Fox, Josh Duhamel, Tyrese Gibson. Sam Witwicky leaves the Autobots behind for a normal life. But when his mind is filled with cryptic symbols, the Decepticons target him and he is dragged back into the Transformers' war.
writer: Ehren Kruger, Roberto Orci, Alex Kurtzman
awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 15 wins & 27 nominations.
plot: Sam Witwicky leaves the Autobots behind for a normal life. But when his mind is filled with cryptic symbols, the Decepticons target him and he is dragged back into the Transformers' war.
actors: Shia LaBeouf, Megan Fox, Josh Duhamel, Tyrese Gibson
sapo_description: Sam Witwicky deixa os Autobots para ter uma vida normal. Mas, quando a sua mente começa a ser preenchida com símbolos enigmáticos, os Decepticons tornam-no num algo e ele é arrastado para a guerra do Transformers.

title: Phantom Thread
imdb_description: Directed by Paul Thomas Anderson.  With Vicky Krieps, Daniel Day-Lewis, Lesley Manville, Julie Vollono. Set in 1950's London, Reynolds Woodcock is a renowned dressmaker whose fastidious life is disrupted by a young, strong-willed woman, Alma, who becomes his muse and lover.
plot: Set in 1950's London, Reynolds Woodcock is a renowned dressmaker whose fastidious life is disrupted by a young, strong-willed woman, Alma, who becomes his muse and lover.
actors: Vicky Krieps, Daniel Day-Lewis, Lesley Manville, Julie Vollono
sapo_description: O costureiro Reynolds Woodcock é o mais requisitado nome da moda britânica no pós guerra. As mulheres entram e saem da sua vida, até que se cruza com uma jovem perseverante, Alma, que rapidamente se torna uma fixação na sua vida, como musa e amante.

title: Finding Forrester
imdb_description: Directed by Gus Van Sant.  With Sean Connery, Rob Brown, F. Murray Abraham, Anna Paquin. A young writing prodigy finds a mentor in a reclusive author.
plot: A young writing prodigy finds a mentor in a reclusive author.
actors: Sean Connery, Rob Brown, F. Murray Abraham, Anna Paquin
sapo_description: Um estudante pobre é acusado de plágio e um velho escritor vai defendê-lo reemergindo de uma vida de retiro.

title: Goodbye Christopher Robin
imdb_description: Directed by Simon Curtis.  With Domhnall Gleeson, Margot Robbie, Kelly Macdonald, Vicki Pepperdine. The relationship between writer AA Milne and his son, Christopher Robin, and how this became the inspiration for Winnie the Pooh.
plot: The relationship between writer AA Milne and his son, Christopher Robin, and how this became the inspiration for Winnie the Pooh.

title: G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra
imdb_description: Directed by Stephen Sommers.  With Dennis Quaid, Channing Tatum, Marlon Wayans, Adewale Akinnuoye-Agbaje. An elite military unit comprised of special operatives known as G.I. Joe, operating out of The Pit, takes on an evil organization led by a notorious arms dealer.
writer: Stuart Beattie (screenplay), David Elliot (screenplay), Paul Lovett (screenplay), Michael B. Gordon (story), Stuart Beattie (story), Stephen Sommers (story)
plot: An elite military unit comprised of special operatives known as G.I. Joe, operating out of The Pit, takes on an evil organization led by a notorious arms dealer.
imdb_title: G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra (2009)
sapo_title: G.I. Joe - O Ataque dos Cobra
actors: Adewale Akinnuoye-Agbaje, Christopher Eccleston, Grégory Fitoussi, Joseph Gordon-Levitt
sapo_description: Do deserto do Egipto às profundezas geladas dos polos, a equipa de elite G.I. JOE é dotada da mais avançada tecnologia de espionagem e equipamento militar para enfrentar o corrupto traficante de armas Destro e a crescente ameaça das misteriosa organização dos Cobra de forma a evitar que o mundo se afunde no caos.

title: Cloverfield
imdb_description: Directed by Matt Reeves.  With Mike Vogel, Jessica Lucas, Lizzy Caplan, T.J. Miller. A group of friends venture deep into the streets of New York on a rescue mission during a rampaging monster attack.
plot: A group of friends venture deep into the streets of New York on a rescue mission during a rampaging monster attack.
actors: Lizzy Caplan, Jessica Lucas, T.J. Miller, Michael Stahl-David
sapo_description: Cinco jovens de Nova Iorque organizam uma festa de despedida para um amigo, na mesma noite em que um monstro, do tamanho de um arranha-céus, arrasa a cidade. Visto da perspetiva da camara de vídeo de um deles, o filme é um testemunho da sua tentativa de sobreviver ao mais irreal e aterrorizador acontecimento das suas vidas.

title: Seven Pounds
imdb_description: Directed by Gabriele Muccino.  With Will Smith, Rosario Dawson, Woody Harrelson, Michael Ealy. A man with a fateful secret embarks on an extraordinary journey of redemption by forever changing the lives of seven strangers.
plot: A man with a fateful secret embarks on an extraordinary journey of redemption by forever changing the lives of seven strangers.
actors: Will Smith, Rosario Dawson, Woody Harrelson, Michael Ealy
sapo_description: Tudo começa com uma lista de sete nomes: Ben Thomas, Holly Apelgren, Connie Tepos, George Ristuccia, Nicholas Adams, Ezra Turner e Emily Posa. A única coisa que eles têm em comum é que todos chegaram a um ponto de viragem na sua vida, e cada um precisa de ajuda em diferentes sentidos: finanças, espiritual, saúde.

title: The Princess Diaries
imdb_description: Directed by Garry Marshall.  With Julie Andrews, Anne Hathaway, Hector Elizondo, Heather Matarazzo. Mia Thermopolis has just found out that she is the heir apparent to the throne of Genovia. With her friends Lilly and Michael Moscovitz in tow, she tries to navigate through the rest of her sixteenth year.
plot: Mia Thermopolis has just found out that she is the heir apparent to the throne of Genovia. With her friends Lilly and Michael Moscovitz in tow, she tries to navigate through the rest of her sixteenth year.
actors: Julie Andrews, Anne Hathaway, Hector Elizondo, Heather Matarazzo
sapo_description: Mia vive com sua mãe em Manhattan e repentinamente descobre que seu pai é na verdade o Príncipe de Genovia, um pequeno país europeu. Ela recebe então a visita de sua avó recém-descoberta, que passa a lhe dar aulas de etiqueta, ensinando-a como se deve portar uma princesa.

title: Cutting Class
imdb_description: Cutting Class (1989) on IMDb: Movies, TV, Celebs, and more...
plot: A murderer is loose in a high school in this 'whodunit' movie.
actors: Donovan Leitch Jr., Jill Schoelen, Brad Pitt, Roddy McDowall
sapo_description: Há dois colegas a disputar a atenção de Paula no liceu: Dwight, um miúdo rebelde, e Brian, um jovem perturbado que acaba de sair de um hospício onde dera entrada após a morte suspeita do pai. Só que há vários crimes a acontecer na escola, e um dos jovens pode ser o culpado.

title: Role Models
imdb_description: Directed by David Wain.  With Paul Rudd, Seann William Scott, Elizabeth Banks, Christopher Mintz-Plasse. Wild behavior forces a pair of energy drink reps to enroll in a Big Brother program.
writer: Timothy Dowling (story), W. Blake Herron (story), Paul Rudd (screenplay), David Wain (screenplay), Ken Marino (screenplay), Timothy Dowling (screenplay)
plot: Wild behavior forces a pair of energy drink reps to enroll in a Big Brother program.
actors: Seann William Scott, Paul Rudd, Christopher Mintz-Plasse, Bobb'e J. Thompson
sapo_description: Após serem presos por conduta desordeira, Danny e Wheeler, dois vendedores de bebidas energéticas, têm de cumprir 150 horas de serviço comunitário num programa de mentores: um fica encarregue de um geek apaixonado por torneios medievais e o outro fica a seu cargo com um miúdo hiper-malcriado...

title: Reservation Road
imdb_description: Directed by Terry George.  With Joaquin Phoenix, Mark Ruffalo, Jennifer Connelly, Elle Fanning. The lives of two families change forever after a fatal tragedy takes place on Reservation Road.
writer: John Burnham Schwartz (screenplay), Terry George (screenplay), John Burnham Schwartz (novel)
plot: The lives of two families change forever after a fatal tragedy takes place on Reservation Road.
actors: Joaquin Phoenix, Elle Fanning, Jennifer Connelly, Sean Curley
sapo_description: Dwight atropela sem querer um garoto mas foge da cena do acidente dizendo ao filho que bateu num tronco de árvore e ocultando o sucedido. Ethan é o pai do rapaz que acaba por morrer no acidente e, insatisfeito com a inação da polícia, contrata um advogado… que é nem mais nem menos que Dwight.

title: Trainwreck
imdb_description: Directed by Judd Apatow.  With Amy Schumer, Bill Hader, Brie Larson, Colin Quinn. Having thought that monogamy was never possible, a commitment-phobic career woman may have to face her fears when she meets a good guy.
awards: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 5 wins & 25 nominations.
plot: Having thought that monogamy was never possible, a commitment-phobic career woman may have to face her fears when she meets a good guy.
actors: Colin Quinn, Devin Fabry, Carla Oudin, Amy Schumer
sapo_description: Amy encara cada relacionamento com mesma a leviandade com que troca de roupa. A sua fobia ao compromisso tem origem nas crenças do pai, que se viu enredado em centenas de relacionamentos por nunca ter encontrado sentido na monogamia. Jornalista numa revista masculina, ela assume-se como é, sem romantismos ou expectativas na forma como se relaciona com o sexo oposto. Classificação etária: M/14.

title: The Mechanic
writer: Lewis John Carlino (screenplay), Lewis John Carlino (story)
plot: An aging hitman befriends a young man who wants to be a professional killer. Eventually it becomes clear that someone has betrayed them.
actors: Charles Bronson, Jan-Michael Vincent, Keenan Wynn, Jill Ireland
sapo_description: Um assassino profissional envelhecido torna-se amigo de um jovem que quer ser assassino profissional. Classificação etária: M/16.

title: Fun Size
plot: Wren's Halloween plans go awry when she's made to babysit her brother, who disappears into a sea of trick-or-treaters. With her best friend and two nerds at her side, she needs to find her brother before her mom finds out he's missing.
actors: Victoria Justice, Jackson Nicoll, Chelsea Handler, Josh Pence
sapo_description: Os planos de Wren para o Halloween vão por água abaixo, quando a mãe lhe pede para tomar conta do irmão, que acaba por desaparecer numa multidão de foliões.

title: Mr. & Mrs. Smith
imdb_description: Directed by Doug Liman.  With Brad Pitt, Angelina Jolie, Adam Brody, Vince Vaughn. A bored married couple is surprised to learn that they are both assassins hired by competing agencies to kill each other.
plot: A bored married couple is surprised to learn that they are both assassins hired by competing agencies to kill each other.
actors: Brad Pitt, Angelina Jolie, Vince Vaughn, Adam Brody
sapo_description: Ambos os membros de um casal são assassinos contratados e descobrem que são o alvo um do outro.

title: Cirque du Freak: The Vampire's Assistant
imdb_description: Directed by Paul Weitz.  With Chris Massoglia, John C. Reilly, Salma Hayek, Josh Hutcherson. Teenager Darren Shan meets a mysterious man at a freak show who turns out to be a vampire. After a series of events, Darren must leave his normal life and go on the road with the Cirque du Freak and become a vampire.
writer: Paul Weitz (screenplay), Brian Helgeland (screenplay), Darren Shan (series of books)
plot: Teenager Darren Shan meets a mysterious man at a freak show who turns out to be a vampire. After a series of events, Darren must leave his normal life and go on the road with the Cirque du Freak and become a vampire.

sapo_title: Circo dos Horrores: O Assistente do Vampiro

sapo_description: Darren Shan (Chris Massoglia) era um rapaz de 16 anos igual a todos os outros, até mesmo na maneira como se aborrecia com o excesso de normalidade da sua vida. Até ao dia em que um Circo dos Horrores itinerante chega à cidade com as suas aberrações e a sua vida muda drasticamente.

title: Molly's Game
imdb_description: Directed by Aaron Sorkin.  With Jessica Chastain, Idris Elba, Kevin Costner, Michael Cera. The true story of Molly Bloom, an Olympic-class skier who ran the world's most exclusive high-stakes poker game and became an FBI target.

sapo_description: Baseado na história verídica de Molly Bloom, uma esquiadora Olímpica que, durante uma década, organizou os jogos de poker de alto risco mais exclusivos do mundo, até se tornar num alvo a abater pelo FBI.

title: Mother
awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 3 wins & 4 nominations.
plot: A neurotic, twice-divorced sci-fi writer moves back in with his mother to solve his personal problems.

title: 47 Metres Down
imdb_description: Directed by Johannes Roberts. Five backpackers, diving in a ruined underwater city, quickly learn they are not alone in the submerged caves.
plot: Two sisters vacationing in Mexico are trapped in a shark cage at the bottom of the ocean. With less than an hour of oxygen left and great white sharks circling nearby, they must fight to survive.
actors: Mandy Moore, Claire Holt, Chris Johnson, Yani Gellman
sapo_description: Numa viagem ao México, duas irmãs aventuram-se num mergulho para observar os tubarões, mas tudo corre terrivelmente mal quando o cabo que prendia a jaula de observação se parte e ambas ficam presas no fundo do oceano a 47 metros de profundidade...

title: Bram Stoker's Dracula
imdb_description: Directed by Francis Ford Coppola.  With Gary Oldman, Winona Ryder, Anthony Hopkins, Keanu Reeves. The centuries old vampire Count Dracula comes to England to seduce his barrister Jonathan Harker's fiancée Mina Murray and inflict havoc in the foreign land.
plot: The centuries old vampire Count Dracula comes to England to seduce his barrister Jonathan Harker's fiancée Mina Murray and inflict havoc in the foreign land.
actors: Gary Oldman, Winona Ryder, Anthony Hopkins, Keanu Reeves
sapo_description: Conde Drácula, um centenário vampiro da Transilvânia, chega a Inglaterra para seduzir Mina Murray, a noiva do seu solicitador Jonathan Harker, que ele acredita ser a reencarnação da sua amada, que morreu quatro séculos antes.

title: High Plains Drifter
imdb_description: Directed by Clint Eastwood.  With Clint Eastwood, Verna Bloom, Marianna Hill, Mitchell Ryan. A gunfighting stranger comes to the small settlement of Lago and is hired to bring the townsfolk together in an attempt to hold off three outlaws who are on their way.
plot: A gunfighting stranger comes to the small settlement of Lago and is hired to bring the townsfolk together in an attempt to hold off three outlaws who are on their way.
actors: Clint Eastwood, Verna Bloom, Marianna Hill, Mitchell Ryan
sapo_description: Um misterioso pistoleiro chega à pequena povoação de Lago e é contratado pela população local para deter três fora-da-lei que vão a caminho da aldeia.

title: The House Bunny
imdb_description: Directed by Fred Wolf.  With Anna Faris, Colin Hanks, Emma Stone, Kat Dennings. After Playboy bunny Shelley is kicked out of the playboy mansion, she finds a job as the house mother for a sorority full of socially awkward girls.
plot: After Playboy bunny Shelley is kicked out of the playboy mansion, she finds a job as the house mother for a sorority full of socially awkward girls.
actors: Anna Faris, Colin Hanks, Emma Stone, Kat Dennings
sapo_description: Shelley Darlington é uma encantadora Coelhinha da Playboy que, depois de ser expulsa da mansão de Hugh Hefner, vai parar a uma casa de estudantes, onde ensina um grupo de raparigas introvertidas a seduzir homens… e acaba por aprender muito com elas também.

title: Do No Harm
imdb_description: Directed by Philippe Gagnon.  With Deanna Russo, Paul Greene, Sarah Allen, Jason Blicker. Emily Edmunds has a great job and a great guy, Mark. But when Mark is killed in a plane crash, a distraught Emily attempts suicide.
plot: Emily Edmunds has a great job and a great guy, Mark. But when Mark is killed in a plane crash, a distraught Emily attempts suicide.
actors: Deanna Russo, Lauren Holly, Paul Greene, Sarah Allen
sapo_description: Emily Edmunds tem um óptimo emprego e o companheiro perfeito, Mark. Mas, quando Mark morre num acidente de avião, Emily fica desesperada e tenta suicidar-se. O seu psiquiatra, Dr. Thorne, tenta tirá-la do estado caótico em que se encontra, mas depressa desenvolve uma obsessão por Emily, que o recorda da sua filha que faleceu num acidente. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Moonraker
imdb_description: Directed by Lewis Gilbert.  With Roger Moore, Lois Chiles, Michael Lonsdale, Richard Kiel. James Bond investigates the mid-air theft of a space shuttle, and discovers a plot to commit global genocide.
awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 1 win & 4 nominations.
plot: James Bond investigates the mid-air theft of a space shuttle, and discovers a plot to commit global genocide.

Roger Moore protagoniza pela quarta vez o Agente 007 e une forças com a cientista da NASA Holly Goodhead (Lois Chiles) para prevenir que um industrial, sedento de poder, destrua toda a vida humana da Terra. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Finding Your Feet
imdb_description: Directed by Richard Loncraine.  With Imelda Staunton, Celia Imrie, Timothy Spall, Joanna Lumley. On the eve of retirement a middle class, judgmental snob discovers her husband has been having an affair with her best friend and is forced into exile with her bohemian sister who lives on an impoverished inner-city council estate.
plot: On the eve of retirement a middle class, judgmental snob discovers her husband has been having an affair with her best friend and is forced into exile with her bohemian sister who lives on an impoverished inner-city council estate.
actors: Imelda Staunton, Celia Imrie, Timothy Spall, Joanna Lumley
sapo_description: Depois de descobrir que o marido a traía com a sua melhor amiga, Lady Abbot muda-se para casa da irmã, que vive num bairro social.

title: Shutter Island
imdb_description: Directed by Martin Scorsese.  With Leonardo DiCaprio, Emily Mortimer, Mark Ruffalo, Ben Kingsley. In 1954, a U.S. Marshal investigates the disappearance of a murderer, who escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane.
plot: In 1954, a U.S. Marshal investigates the disappearance of a murderer, who escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane.
actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Mark Ruffalo, Ben Kingsley, Max von Sydow
sapo_description: 1954, o pico da Guerra Fria, os agentes Teddy Daniels e Chuck Aule são convocados a Shutter Island para investigar o improvável desaparecimento de uma criminosa do impenetrável Ashecliffe Hospital.

title: K-19: The Widowmaker
imdb_description: Directed by Kathryn Bigelow.  With Harrison Ford, Sam Spruell, Peter Stebbings, Christian Camargo. When Russia's first nuclear submarine malfunctions on its maiden voyage, the crew must race to save the ship and prevent a nuclear disaster.
plot: When Russia's first nuclear submarine malfunctions on its maiden voyage, the crew must race to save the ship and prevent a nuclear disaster.
actors: Sam Spruell, Peter Stebbings, Christian Camargo, Roman Podhora

title: Mallrats
imdb_description: Mallrats (1995) on IMDb: Movies, TV, Celebs, and more...
plot: Both dumped by their girlfriends, two best friends seek refuge in the local mall.
actors: Shannen Doherty, Jeremy London, Jason Lee, Claire Forlani
sapo_description: Quando Brodie e T.S. são abandonados pelas respetivas namoradas, o único local onde os dois amigos conseguem encontrar consolo é no centro comercial local, onde está a ser filmado um concurso televisivo.

title: Bulletproof
imdb_description: Directed by Ernest R. Dickerson.  With Damon Wayans, Adam Sandler, James Caan, Jeep Swenson. Two criminals, Keats and Moses, end their friendship, when Keats turns out to be an undercover cop. Many years later, the two are forced to work together when Keats is assigned to protect Moses as a witness.
writer: Joe Gayton (story), Joe Gayton (screenplay), Lewis Colick (screenplay)
plot: Two criminals, Keats and Moses, end their friendship, when Keats turns out to be an undercover cop. Many years later, the two are forced to work together when Keats is assigned to protect Moses as a witness.
actors: Damon Wayans, Adam Sandler, James Caan, Jeep Swenson
sapo_description: Keats e Moses são dois criminosos cuja amizade termina quando o primeiro revela ser afinal um polícia disfarçado. Anos mais tarde, os dois são forçados a trabalhar juntos quando Keats recebe a missão de proteger Moses, que vai ser vir de testemunha num caso importante.

title: Golden Years
writer: John Miller, Nick Knowles, Jeremy Sheldon
plot: Fate, the pensions crisis and a steadfast refusal to accept the injustice of old age have contrived to force law abiding, retired couple, Arthur and Martha Goode into a life of crime. ...

title: A Sister's Obsession
imdb_description: Directed by David Langlois.  With Lindsay Hartley, Jason Cermak, Candice Hunter, Peter Flemming. Kendra has been given an Educator of the Year award and now must prepare a speech to give at a banquet in her honor. She has the support of her husband (and is trying to start a family with him) and best friend Monica, but her life is starting to unravel. Kendra will discover the cause is a long lost twin sister, Amber, who resents her twin's "entitled" position. Kendra must fight her vindictive ...

actors: Lindsay Hartley, Jason Cermak, Candice Hunter, Peter Flemming
sapo_description: Kendra recebeu uma distinção de Educadora do ano e agora tem de preparar um discurso para o banquete em sua honra. Ela tem o apoio do seu marido (e está a tentar começar uma família com ele) e da sua melhor amiga Monica, mas a sua vida começa a tomar um rumo inesperado. Kendra descobre que a causa é a sua irmã gémea há muito perdida, Amber, que tem inveja da posição 'privilegiada' da irmã. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Look Again
imdb_description: Directed by Jean-Marc Piché.  With Morena Baccarin, Paul Christie, Sadie LeBlanc, Chris William Martin. Just as her life is coming together, a young woman experiences a terrible tragedy when her boyfriend is murdered by an intruder from whom the woman herself barely escapes. The police capture a man they believe to be the killer, but the young woman, still unsettled, has her doubts. Things take a frightening turn when she meets her friend's new boyfriend and suspects him to be the killer.

actors: Morena Baccarin, Paul Christie, Sadie LeBlanc, Chris William Martin
sapo_description: Uma jovem mulher experiencia uma terrível tragédia, quando o seu namorado é assassinado por um intruso de quem a própria mulher escapa por pouco. A polícia captura um homem em que acredita ser o assassino, mas a jovem, ainda instável, tem dúvidas. As coisas tomam um rumo assustador quando ela conhece o novo namorado da sua amiga e suspeita que ele é o assassino. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: For Your Eyes Only
imdb_description: Directed by John Glen.  With Roger Moore, Carole Bouquet, Topol, Lynn-Holly Johnson. Agent 007 is assigned to hunt for a lost British encryption device and prevent it from falling into enemy hands.
awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 2 wins & 4 nominations.

Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Rapid Fire
imdb_description: Directed by Dwight H. Little.  With Brandon Lee, Powers Boothe, Nick Mancuso, Raymond J. Barry. When student Jake Lo witnesses a killing, he finds himself caught between two feuding drug lords. Quando o programa de proteção de testemunhas falha, Jake tem de se proteger com as únicas armas que possui - as suas mãos. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Catch .44
imdb_description: Directed by Aaron Harvey.  With Malin Akerman, Nikki Reed, Deborah Ann Woll, Forest Whitaker. For Tes (Akerman) and her two cohorts Kara (Nikki Reed) and Dawn (Deborah Ann Woll), the job sounded simple enough: intercept a double-cross drug shipment for their crime boss Mel (Willis) at an isolated diner. title: Welcome to the Jungle
imdb_description: Directed by Peter Berg.  With Dwayne Johnson, Seann William Scott, Christopher Walken, Rosario Dawson. A tough aspiring chef is hired to bring home a mobster's son from the Amazon but becomes involved in the fight against an oppressive town operator and the search for a legendary treasure.

title: The Trip

title: Fair Game

Entretanto, o marido de Valerie, Joe, é enviado a África para investigar rumores de uma eventual comercialização de urânio enriquecido ao Iraque.

title: Pushing Tin
imdb_description: Directed by Mike Newell.  With John Cusack, Billy Bob Thornton, Cate Blanchett, Angelina Jolie. A feud develops between two air traffic controllers: one cocky and determined while the other is restrained and laidback, which inevitably affects their lives.

Russell e Mary Bell, sua esposa, não se ajustam totalmente à comunidade de controladores e suas esposas e logo surge uma rivalidade entre Nick e Bell.

title: Babel
imdb_description: Directed by Alejandro G. Iñárritu.  With Brad Pitt, Cate Blanchett, Gael García Bernal, Mohamed Akhzam. Tragedy strikes a married couple on vacation in the Moroccan desert, touching off an interlocking story involving four different families.

title: Quantum of Solace

Mas M (Judi Dench) e Bond percebem que a organização que a chantageou é muito mais complexa e perigosa do que tinham imaginado. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Ex-Wife Killer
imdb_description: Directed by Danny J. Boyle.  With Marguerite Moreau, Jordan Belfi, Jessica Blackmore, Arianne Zucker. Tensions boil over when Laura breaks into Josie's house and Michael is forced to kill her out of self-defense. Only after Josie's eyewitness testimony gets Michael off the hook for murder, does Josie realize that the entire series ...

title: 50 First Dates
imdb_description: Directed by Peter Segal.  With Adam Sandler, Drew Barrymore, Rob Schneider, Sean Astin. Henry Roth is a man afraid of commitment up until he meets the beautiful Lucy. plot: Henry Roth is a man afraid of commitment up until he meets the beautiful Lucy. They hit it off and Henry think he's finally found the girl of his dreams, until he discovers she has short-term memory loss and forgets him the next day.

title: A View to a Kill
imdb_description: Directed by John Glen.  With Roger Moore, Christopher Walken, Tanya Roberts, Grace Jones. An investigation of a horse-racing scam leads 007 to a mad industrialist who plans to create a worldwide microchip monopoly by destroying California's Silicon Valley.

As a stealthy, one-man assault team, he will take on street gangs, mobsters, and politicians with extreme prejudice until his mission is complete. His former protégé, William Porter, teams up with the local police department to bring his former commander to justice and prevent him from further vigilantism.

É então que começa uma violenta demanda, que transforma Sikes num dos homens mais procurados dos Estados Unidos. Porter, um agente do FCI, ajudado por uma testemunha do assassinato, procura encontrar Sikes antes que a polícia, ou a máfia, o capture. Classificação etária: M/14.

title: Little Fockers
imdb_description: Directed by Paul Weitz.  With Ben Stiller, Teri Polo, Robert De Niro, Owen Wilson. Family-patriarch Jack Byrnes wants to appoint a successor. Does his son-in-law, the male nurse Greg Focker, have what it takes?

title: The Others

plot: A woman who lives in a darkened old house with her two photosensitive children becomes convinced that her family home is haunted.

Sozinha num enorme casarão vitoriano, numa ilha isolada, educa os seus filhos segundo rígidas normas religiosas. Como as crianças têm uma estranha doença e não podem ser expostas diretamente à luz do dia, também os criados têm de se submeter a várias regras vitais.

title: Four Weddings and a Funeral

sapo_description: Esta é uma comédia romântica que se passa inteiramente em…quatro casamentos e um funeral. É a história de 8 amigos, 5 padres, 11 vestidos de casamento, 16 sogros, 2000 copos de champanhe e 2 pessoas que deviam estar juntas, mas que insistem em não estar.É a história de Charles (Hugh Grant), divertido e encantador, que aos 32 anos de idade é um monógamo em série.

title: Crimson Tide
imdb_description: Directed by Tony Scott.  With Gene Hackman, Denzel Washington, Matt Craven, George Dzundza. On a U.S. nuclear missile sub, a young First Officer stages a mutiny, to prevent his trigger happy Captain from launching his missiles, before confirming his orders to do so.

Quando chegam ao lugar, o sistema de rádio do submarino avaria-se, sem que a tripulação conheça as ordens daquilo que devem fazer. O resultado é um motim a bordo.

title: 28 Days
imdb_description: Directed by Betty Thomas.  With Sandra Bullock, Viggo Mortensen, Dominic West, Elizabeth Perkins. A big-city newspaper columnist is forced to enter a drug and alcohol rehab center after ruining her sister's wedding and crashing a stolen limousine.
plot: A big-city newspaper columnist is forced to enter a drug and alcohol rehab center after ruining her sister's wedding and crashing a stolen limousine.

title: Morning Glory
imdb_description: Directed by Roger Michell.  With Rachel McAdams, Harrison Ford, Diane Keaton, Noah Bean. An upstart television producer accepts the challenge of reviving a struggling morning show program with warring co-hosts.

Decidida a marcar a diferença, resolve contratar Mike Pomeroy, um jornalista veterano cujo carisma é proporcional ao seu mau feitio.

title: Street Wars: Part 2
writer: Steven Seagal (creator), Joe Halpin (developed by), Steven Seagal, Joe Halpin

title: Impostor?
plot: N/A

Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Transformers: Dark of the Moon

title: Wonder Wheel
imdb_description: Directed by Woody Allen.  With Justin Timberlake, Juno Temple, Robert C. Kirk, Kate Winslet. On Coney Island in the 1950s, a lifeguard tells the story of a middle-aged carousel operator, his beleaguered wife, and the visitor who turns their lives upside-down.

title: G.I. Joe: Retaliation
imdb_description: Directed by Jon M. Chu.  With Dwayne Johnson, Channing Tatum, Adrianne Palicki, Byung-Hun Lee. The G.I. Joes are not only fighting their mortal enemy Cobra; they are forced to contend with threats from within the government that jeopardize their very existence.
plot: The G.I. Joes are not only fighting their mortal enemy Cobra; they are forced to contend with threats from within the government that jeopardize their very existence.

Joe são os verdadeiros inimigos da nação e que apenas com a ajuda do seu grupo de Cobras, poderão ser vencidos. Agora, cabe à equipa G.I. Joe a difícil missão de frustrar os seus planos e salvar o mundo da sua total destruição.

title: Reasonable Doubt
imdb_description: Directed by Peter Howitt.  With Dominic Cooper, Samuel L. Jackson, Gloria Reuben, Ryan Robbins. A District Attorney has his life turned upside down when he's involved in a hit and run and another man is arrested for his crime and charged with murder.
plot: A District Attorney has his life turned upside down when he's involved in a hit and run and another man is arrested for his crime and charged with murder.

Porém, ao descobrir que os verdadeiros proprietários foram assassinados e impostores tomaram seu lugar, Lauren percebe que foi vítima de um golpe e está decidida a descobrir quem a enganou.

title: Groundhog Day

title: The Girl in the Book
imdb_description: Directed by Marya Cohn.  With Emily VanCamp, Courtney Daniels, Jordan Lage, Ana Mulvoy Ten. Set in the world of New York publishing, a young book editor is forced to confront a troubling chapter from her past when a bestselling author re-enters her life.

title: The Descendants

Quando, após um acidente de barco, a sua mulher fica em estado vegetativo, tudo parece perder o sentido. Em desespero e sem saber o que fazer, decide investir na relação com as filhas Scottie (Amara Miller) e Alexandra (Shailene Woodley), com quem sempre manteve uma relação difícil. Classificação etária: M/12.

title: Like Crazy

title: The Mountain Between Us

title: The River Murders
